[03] 111^b^.^eb^ ^b^masaarako^eb^ti ^a^V0.0035^ea^ ma~ncapaade vijjhitvaa tattha a.taniyo pavesetvaa kato. ^b^bundikaabaddho^eb^ti a.taniihi ma~ncapaade .da.msaapetvaa palla"nkasa"nkhepena kato. ^b^ku.liirapaadako^eb^ti ^a^P4.0774^ea^ assame.n.dakaadiina.m paadasadisehi paadehi kato. yo vaa pana koci va"nkapaadako, aya.m vuccati ku.liirapaadako. ^b^aahaccapaadako^eb^ti aya.m pana ``aahaccapaadako naama ma~nco a"nge vijjhitvaa kato hotii''ti eva.m parato paa.liya.myeva vutto, tasmaa a.taniyo vijjhitvaa tattha paadasikha.m pavesetvaa upari aa.ni.m datvaa katama~nco ``aahaccapaadako''ti veditabbo. pii.thepi eseva nayo. ^b^anto sa.mve.thetvaa baddha.m hotii^eb^ti he.t.thaa ca upari ca vitthata.m majjhe sa"nkhitta.m pa.navasa.n.thaana.m katvaa baddha.m hoti, ta.m kira majjhe siihabyagghacammaparikkhittampi karonti. akappiyacamma.m naamettha natthi. senaasana~nhi sova.n.namayampi va.t.tati, tasmaa ta.m mahaggha.m hoti. ^b^anupasampanna.m santharaapeti tassa palibodho^eb^ti yena santharaapita.m, tassa palibodho. ^b^le.d.dupaata.m atikkamantassa aapatti paacittiyassaa^eb^ti thaamamajjhimassa purisassa le.d.dupaata.m atikkamantassa paacittiya.m.

[03]aya.m panettha vinicchayo -- thero bhojanasaalaaya.m bhattakicca.m katvaa dahara.m aa.naapeti ``gaccha divaa.t.thaane ma~ncapii.tha.m pa~n~napehii''ti. so tathaa katvaa nisinno. thero yathaaruci.m vicaritvaa tattha gantvaa thavika.m vaa uttaraasa"nga.m vaa .thapeti, tato pa.t.thaaya therassa palibodho. nisiiditvaa saya.m ^a^M0.0040^ea^ gacchanto neva uddharati, na uddharaapeti, le.d.dupaataatikkame paacittiya.m. sace pana thero tattha thavika.m vaa uttaraasa"nga.m vaa a.t.thapetvaa ca"nkamantova dahara.m ``gaccha tva''nti bha.nati, tena ``ida.m bhante ma~ncapii.tha''nti aacikkhitabba.m. sace thero vatta.m jaanaati ``tva.m gaccha, aha.m paakatika.m karissaamii''ti vattabba.m. sace baalo hoti anuggahitavatto ``gaccha, maa idha ti.t.tha, neva nisiiditu.m na nipajjitu.m demii''ti dahara.m tajjetiyeva. daharena ``bhante sukha.m sayathaa''ti kappa.m labhitvaa vanditvaa gantabba.m. tasmi.m gate therasseva palibodho. purimanayeneva cassa aapatti veditabbaa.

[03]atha pana aa.nattikkha.neyeva daharo ``mayha.m bhante bha.n.dakadhovanaadi ki~nci kara.niiya.m atthii''ti vadati, thero ca na.m ``tva.m pa~n~napetvaa gacchaahii''ti vatvaa bhojanasaalato nikkhamitvaa a~n~nattha gacchati, paaduddhaarena kaaretabbo. sace tattheva gantvaa nisiidati purimanayeneva cassa le.d.dupaataatikkame aapatti. sace pana thero saama.nera.m aa.naapeti ^a^P4.0775^ea^, saama.nere tattha ma~ncapii.tha.m pa~n~napetvaa nisinnepi bhojanasaalato a~n~nattha gacchanto paaduddhaarena kaaretabbo. gantvaa nisinno puna gamanakaale le.d.dupaataatikkame aapattiyaa kaaretabbo. sace pana ^a^V0.0036^ea^ aa.naapento ma~ncapii.tha.m pa~n~napetvaa tattheva nisiidaati aa.naapeti, yatricchati tatra gantvaa aagantu.m labhati. saya.m pana paakatika.m akatvaa gacchantassa le.d.dupaataatikkame paacittiya.m. antarasannipaate ma~ncapii.thaani pa~n~napetvaa nisinnehi gamanakaale aaraamikaana.m ima.m pa.tisaamethaati vattabba.m, avatvaa gacchantaana.m le.d.dupaataatikkame aapatti.

[03]mahaadhammasavana.m naama hoti tattha uposathaagaaratopi bhojanasaalatopi aaharitvaa ma~ncapii.thaani pa~n~napenti. aavaasikaana.myeva palibodho. sace aagantukaa ``ida.m amhaaka.m upajjhaayassa ida.m aacariyassaa''ti ga.nhanti, tato pa.t.thaaya tesa.myeva palibodho. gamanakaale paakatika.m akatvaa le.d.dupaata.m atikkamantaana.m aapatti. mahaapaccariya.m puna vutta.m -- ``yaava a~n~ne na nisiidanti, taava yehi pa~n~natta.m, tesa.m bhaaro. a~n~nesu aagantvaa nisinnesu nisinnakaana.m bhaaro. sace te anuddharitvaa vaa anuddharaapetvaa vaa gacchanti, dukka.ta.m. kasmaa? anaa.nattiyaa pa~n~napitattaa''ti. dhammaasane pa~n~natte yaava ussaarako vaa ^a^M0.0041^ea^ dhammakathiko vaa naagacchati, taava pa~n~naapakaana.m palibodho, tasmi.m aagantvaa nisinne tassa palibodho. sakala.m ahoratta.m dhammasavana.m hoti, a~n~no ussaarako vaa dhammakathiko vaa u.t.thahati, a~n~no nisiidati, yo yo aagantvaa nisiidati, tassa tassa bhaaro. u.t.thahantena pana ``idamaasana.m tumhaaka.m bhaaro''ti vatvaa gantabba.m. sacepi itarasmi.m anaagateyeva pa.thama.m nisinno u.t.thaaya gacchati, tasmi~nca antoupacaara.t.theyeva itaro aagantvaa nisiidati, u.t.thaaya gato aapattiyaa na kaaretabbo. sace pana itarasmi.m anaagateyeva pa.thama.m nisinno u.t.thaayaasanaa le.d.dupaata.m atikkamati, aapattiyaa kaaretabbo. sabbattha ca ``le.d.dupaataatikkame pa.thamapaade dukka.ta.m, dutiye paacittiya''nti aya.m nayo mahaapaccariya.m vutto.

[03] 112^b^.^eb^ ^b^cimilika.m vaa^eb^tiaadiisu ^b^cimilikaa^eb^ naama sudhaadiparikammakataaya bhuumiyaa va.n.naanurakkha.nattha.m kataa hoti ^a^P4.0776^ea^, ta.m he.t.thaa pattharitvaa upari ka.tasaaraka.m pattharanti. ^b^uttaratthara.na.m^eb^ naama ma~ncapii.thaana.m upari attharitabbaka.m paccatthara.na.m. ^b^bhuumatthara.na.m^eb^ naama bhuumiya.m attharitabbaa ka.tasaarakaadivikati. ^b^ta.t.tika.m^eb^ naama taalapa.n.nehi vaa vaakehi vaa katata.t.tikaa. ^b^cammakha.n.do^eb^ naama siihabyagghadiipitaracchacammaadiisupi ya.mki~nci camma.m. a.t.thakathaasu hi senaasanaparibhoge pa.tikkhittacamma.m naama na dissati, tasmaa siihacammaadiina.m parihara.neyeva pa.tikkhepo veditabbo. ^b^paadapu~nchanii^eb^ naama rajjukehi vaa pilotikaahi vaa paadapu~nchanattha.m kataa. ^b^phalakapii.tha.m^eb^ naama phalakamaya.m pii.tha.m. atha vaa phalaka~nceva daarumayapii.tha~nca; etena sabbampi daarubha.n.daadi sa"ngahita.m. mahaapaccariya.m pana vitthaareneva vutta.m -- ``aadhaaraka.m pattapidhaana.m paadakathalika.m taalava.n.ta.m biijaniipattaka.m ^a^V0.0037^ea^ ya.mki~nci daarubha.n.da.m antamaso paaniiyau.lu"nka.m paaniiyasa"nkha.m ajjhokaase nikkhipitvaa gacchantassa dukka.ta''nti. mahaaa.t.thakathaaya.m pana esa nayo dutiyasikkhaapade dassito. ajjhokaase rajana.m pacitvaa rajanabhaajana.m rajanau.lu"nko rajanado.nikaati sabba.m aggisaalaaya pa.tisaametabba.m. sace aggisaalaa natthi, anovassake pabbhaare nikkhipitabba.m. tasmimpi asati yattha olokentaa bhikkhuu passanti, taadise .thaane .thapetvaapi gantu.m va.t.tati.

[03]^b^a~n~nassa^eb^ ^a^M0.0042^ea^ ^b^puggalike^eb^ti yasmi.m vissaasaggaaho na ruhati, tassa santake dukka.ta.m. yasmi.m pana vissaaso ruhati, tassa santaka.m attano puggalikamiva hotiiti mahaapaccariyaadiisu vutta.m.

[03] 113^b^.^eb^ ^b^aapuccha.m gacchatii^eb^ti yo bhikkhu vaa saama.nero vaa aaraamiko vaa lajjii hoti, attano palibodha.m viya ma~n~nati, yo tathaaruupa.m aapucchitvaa gacchati, tassa anaapatti. ^b^otaapento gacchatii^eb^ti aatape otaapento aagantvaa uddharissaamiiti gacchati; eva.m gacchato anaapatti. ^b^kenaci palibuddha.m hotii^eb^ti senaasana.m kenaci upadduta.m hotiiti attho. sacepi hi vu.d.dhataro bhikkhu u.t.thaapetvaa ga.nhaati, sacepi yakkho vaa peto vaa aagantvaa nisiidati, koci vaa issaro aagantvaa ga.nhaati, senaasana.m palibuddha.m hoti, siihabyagghaadiisu vaa pana ta.m padesa.m aagantvaa ^a^P4.0777^ea^ .thitesupi senaasana.m palibuddha.m hotiyeva. eva.m kenaci palibuddhe anuddharitvaapi gacchato anaapatti. ^b^aapadaasuu^eb^ti jiivitabrahmacariyantaraayesu. sesa.m uttaanamevaati.

[03]kathinasamu.t.thaana.m -- kaayavaacato kaayavaacaacittato ca samu.t.thaati, kiriyaakiriya.m, nosa~n~naavimokkha.m, acittaka.m, pa.n.nattivajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, ticitta.m, tivedananti.
[06] pa.thamasenaasanasikkhaapada.m catuttha.m.

[03] 116^b^.^eb^ dutiyasenaasanasikkhaapade -- ^b^bhisii^eb^ti ma~ncakabhisi vaa pii.thakabhisi vaa. cimilikaadiinipi purimasikkhaapade vuttappakaaraaniyeva. ^b^nisiidana^eb^nti sadasa.m veditabba.m. ^b^paccatthara.na^eb^nti paavaaro kojavoti ettakameva vutta.m. ^b^ti.nasanthaaro^eb^ti yesa.m kesa~nci ti.naana.m santhaaro ^a^V0.0038^ea^. esa nayo pa.n.nasanthaare. ^b^parikkhepa.m atikkamantassaa^eb^ti ettha pa.thamapaada.m atikkaamentassa dukka.ta.m, dutiyaatikkame paacittiya.m. aparikkhittassa upacaaro naama senaasanato dve le.d.dupaataa.

[03]^b^anaapuccha.m^eb^ ^a^M0.0043^ea^ ^b^vaa gaccheyyaa^eb^ti ettha bhikkhumhi sati bhikkhu aapucchitabbo. tasmi.m asati saama.nero, tasmi.m asati aaraamiko, tasmimpi asati yena vihaaro kaarito so vihaarasaamiko, tassa vaa kule yo koci aapucchitabbo. tasmimpi asati catuusu paasaa.nesu ma~nca.m .thapetvaa ma~nce avasesama~ncapii.thaani aaropetvaa upari bhisiaadika.m dasavidhampi seyya.m raasi.m karitvaa daarubha.n.da.m mattikaabha.n.da.m pa.tisaametvaa dvaaravaatapaanaani pidahitvaa gamiyavatta.m puuretvaa gantabba.m. sace pana senaasana.m ovassati, chadanattha~nca ti.na.m vaa i.t.thakaa vaa aaniitaa honti, sace ussahati, chaadetabba.m. no ce sakkoti, yo okaaso anovassako, tattha ma~ncapii.thaadiini nikkhipitvaa gantabba.m. sace sabbampi ovassati, ussahantena antogaame upaasakaana.m ghare .thapetabba.m. sace tepi ``sa"nghika.m naama bhante bhaariya.m, aggidaahaadiina.m bhaayaamaa''ti na sampa.ticchanti, ajjhokaasepi paasaa.naana.m upari ma~nca.m .thapetvaa sesa.m pubbe vuttanayeneva nikkhipitvaa ti.nehi ca pa.n.nehi ca pa.ticchaadetvaa gantu.m va.t.tati. ya~nhi tattha a"ngamattampi avasissati, ta.m a~n~nesa.m tattha aagataana.m bhikkhuuna.m upakaara.m bhavissatiiti ^a^P4.0778^ea^.

[03] 117^b^.^eb^ ^b^vihaarassa upacaare^eb^tiaadiisu vihaarassuupacaaro naama parive.na.m. ^b^upa.t.thaanasaalaa^eb^ti parive.nabhojanasaalaa. ^b^ma.n.dapo^eb^ti parive.nama.n.dapo. ^b^rukkhamuula^eb^nti parive.narukkhamuula.m. aya.m taava nayo kurunda.t.thakathaaya.m vutto. ki~ncaapi vutto, atha kho vihaaroti antogabbho vaa a~n~na.m vaa sabbaparicchanna.m guttasenaasana.m veditabba.m. ^b^vihaarassa upacaare^eb^ti tassa bahi aasanne okaase. ^b^upa.t.thaanasaalaaya.m vaa^eb^ti bhojanasaalaaya.m vaa. ^b^ma.n.dape vaa^eb^ti aparicchanne paricchanne vaapi bahuuna.m sannipaatama.n.dape. rukkhamuule vattabba.m natthi. ^b^aapatti dukka.tassaa^eb^ti vuttappakaara~nhi dasavidha.m seyya.m antogabbhaadimhi gutta.t.thaane pa~n~napetvaa gacchantassa yasmaa seyyaapi senaasanampi upacikaahi palujjati, vammikaraasiyeva hoti, tasmaa paacittiya.m vutta.m. bahi pana upa.t.thaanasaalaadiisu pa~n~napetvaa gacchantassa seyyaamattameva nasseyya, .thaanassa aguttataaya ^a^M0.0044^ea^ na senaasana.m, tasmaa ettha dukka.ta.m vutta.m. ^b^ma~nca.m vaa pii.tha.m vaa^eb^ti ettha yasmaa na sakkaa ma~ncapii.tha.m sahasaa upacikaahi khaayitu.m, tasmaa ta.m vihaarepi santharitvaa gacchantassa dukka.ta.m vutta.m. vihaaruupacaare pana ta.m vihaaracaarika.m aahi.n.dantaapi disvaa pa.tisaamessanti.

[03] 118^b^.^eb^ ^b^uddharitvaa^eb^ ^a^V0.0039^ea^ ^b^gacchatii^eb^ti ettha uddharitvaa gacchantena ma~ncapii.thakavaa.ta.m sabba.m apanetvaa sa.mharitvaa ciivarava.mse laggetvaa gantabba.m. pacchaa aagantvaa vasanakabhikkhunaapi puna ma~ncapii.tha.m vaa pa~n~napetvaa sayitvaa gacchantena tatheva kaatabba.m. antoku.t.tato seyya.m bahiku.t.te pa~n~napetvaa vasantena gamanakaale gahita.t.thaaneyeva pa.tisaametabba.m. uparipaasaadato oropetvaa he.t.thaapaasaade vasantassapi eseva nayo. ratti.t.thaanadivaa.t.thaanesu ma~ncapii.tha.m pa~n~napetvaapi gamanakaale puna gahita.t.thaaneyeva .thapetabba.m.

[03]^b^aapuccha.m gacchatii^eb^ti etthaaya.m aapucchitabbaanaapucchitabbavinicchayo -- yaa taava bhuumiya.m diighasaalaa vaa pa.n.nasaalaa ^a^P4.0779^ea^ vaa hoti, ya.m vaa rukkhatthambhesu, katageha.m upacikaana.m u.t.thaana.t.thaana.m hoti, tato pakkamantena taava aapucchitvaava pakkamitabba.m. tasmi~nhi katipayaani divasaani ajaggiyamaane vammikaava santi.t.thanti. ya.m pana paasaa.napi.t.thiya.m vaa paasaa.natthambhesu vaa katasenaasana.m siluccayale.na.m vaa sudhaalittasenaasana.m vaa yattha upacikaasa"nkaa natthi, tato pakkamantassa aapucchitvaapi anaapucchitvaapi gantu.m va.t.tati, aapucchana.m pana vatta.m. sace taadisepi senaasane ekena passena upacikaa aarohanti, aapucchitvaava gantabba.m. yo pana aagantuko bhikkhu sa"nghika.m senaasana.m gahetvaa vasanta.m bhikkhu.m anuvattanto attano senaasana.m aggahetvaa vasati, yaava so na ga.nhaati, taava ta.m senaasana.m purimabhikkhusseva palibodho. yadaa pana so senaasana.m gahetvaa attano issariyena vasati, tato pa.t.thaaya aagantukasseva palibodho. sace ubhopi vibhajitvaa ga.nhanti, ubhinnampi palibodho. mahaapaccariya.m pana vutta.m -- ``sace dve tayo ekato hutvaa pa~n~napenti, gamanakaale sabbehipi aapucchitabba.m. tesu ce pa.thama.m gacchanto `pacchimo jaggissatii'ti aabhoga.m katvaa gacchati va.t.tati. pacchimassa aabhogena mutti natthi. bahuu eka.m pesetvaa santharaapenti, gamanakaale sabbehi vaa aapucchitabba.m ^a^M0.0045^ea^, eka.m vaa pesetvaa aapucchitabba.m. a~n~nato ma~ncapii.thaadiini aanetvaa a~n~natra vasitvaapi gamanakaale tattheva netabbaani. sace a~n~naavaasato aanetvaa vasamaanassa a~n~no vu.d.dhataro aagacchati, na pa.tibaahitabbo, `mayaa bhante a~n~naavaasato aaniita.m, paakatika.m kareyyaathaa'ti vattabba.m. tena `eva.m karissaamii'ti sampa.ticchite itarassa gantu.m va.t.tati. evama~n~nattha haritvaapi sa"nghikaparibhogena paribhu~njantassa na.t.tha.m vaa ji.n.na.m vaa corehi vaa ha.ta.m giivaa na hoti, puggalikaparibhogena paribhu~njantassa pana giivaa hoti. a~n~nassa ma~ncapii.tha.m pana sa"nghikaparibhogena vaa puggalikaparibhogena vaa paribhu~njantassa na.t.tha.m giivaayeva''.

[03]^b^kenaci palibuddha.m hotii^eb^ti vu.d.dhatarabhikkhuuissariyayakkhasiihavaa.lamigaka.nhasappaadiisu yena kenaci ^a^V0.0040^ea^ senaasana.m palibuddha.m hoti. ^b^saapekkho gantvaa tattha .thito aapucchati, kenaci palibuddho hotii^eb^ti ajjeva aagantvaa pa.tijaggissaamiiti eva.m saapekkho ^a^P4.0780^ea^ nadiipaara.m vaa gaamantara.m vaa gantvaa yatthassa gamanacitta.m uppanna.m, tattheva .thito ka~nci pesetvaa aapucchati, nadiipuuraraajacoraadiisu vaa kenaci palibuddho hoti upadduto, na sakkoti paccaagantu.m, eva.mbhuutassapi anaapatti. sesa.m pa.thamasikkhaapade vuttanayameva saddhi.m samu.t.thaanaadiihiiti.
[06] dutiyasenaasanasikkhaapada.m pa~ncama.m.

[03] 119^b^.^eb^ cha.t.thasikkhaapade -- ^b^palibundhentii^eb^ti pa.thamatara.m gantvaa pattaciivara.m atiharitvaa rumbhitvaa ti.t.thanti. ^b^theraa bhikkhuu vu.t.thaapentii^eb^ti ``amhaaka.m aavuso paapu.naatii''ti vassaggena gahetvaa vu.t.thaapenti. ^b^anupakhajja seyya.m kappentii^eb^ti ``tumhaaka.m bhante ma~nca.t.thaana.myeva paapu.naati, na sabbo vihaaro. amhaaka.m daani ida.m .thaana.m paapu.naatii''ti anupavisitvaa ma~ncapii.tha.m pa~n~napetvaa nisiidantipi nipajjantipi sajjhaayampi karonti.

[03] 120^b^.^eb^ ^b^jaana^eb^nti ``anu.t.thaapaniiyo aya''nti jaananto; tenevassa vibha"nge ``vu.d.dhoti jaanaatii''tiaadi vutta.m. vu.d.dho hi attano vu.d.dhataaya anu.t.thaapaniiyo ^a^M0.0046^ea^, gilaano gilaanataaya, sa"ngho pana bha.n.daagaarikassa vaa dhammakathikavinayadharaadiina.m vaa ga.navaacakaaacariyassa vaa bahuupakaarata.m gu.navisi.t.thata~nca sallakkhento dhuvavaasatthaaya vihaara.m sammannitvaa deti, tasmaa yassa sa"nghena dinno, sopi anu.t.thaapaniiyo. kaama~ncettha gilaanassaapi sa"nghoyeva anucchavika.m senaasana.m deti, gilaano pana ``apaloketvaa sa"nghena adinnasenaasanopi na pii.letabbo anukampitabbo''ti dassetu.m visu.m vutto.

[03] 121^b^.^eb^ ^b^upacaare^eb^ti ettha ma~ncapii.thaana.m taava mahallake vihaare samantaa diya.d.dho hattho upacaaro, khuddake yato pahoti tato diya.d.dho hattho, paade dhovitvaa pavisantassa passaavatthaaya nikkhamantassa ca yaava dvaare nikkhittapaadadhovanapaasaa.nato passaava.t.thaanato ca ma~ncapii.tha.m, taava diya.d.dhahatthavitthaaro maggo upacaaro naama. tasmi.m ma~ncassa vaa pii.thassa vaa upacaare .thitassa vaa bhikkhuno pavisantassa vaa nikkhamantassa vaa upacaare yo anupakhajja seyya.m kappetukaamo seyya.m santharati vaa santharaapeti vaa, aapatti dukka.tassa.

[03]^b^abhinisiidati^eb^ ^a^P4.0781^ea^ ^a^V0.0041^ea^ ^b^vaa abhinipajjati vaa^eb^ti ettha abhinisiidanamattena abhinipajjanamatteneva vaa paacittiya.m. sace pana dvepi karoti, dve paacittiyaani. u.t.thaayu.t.thaaya nisiidato vaa nipajjato vaa payoge payoge paacittiya.m.

[03] 122^b^.^eb^ ^b^upacaara.m .thapetvaa seyya.m santharati vaa santharaapeti vaa^eb^ti imasmi.m ito pare ca ``vihaarassa upacaare''tiaadike dukka.tavaarepi yathaa idha abhinisiidanamatte abhinipajjanamatte ubhayakara.ne payogabhede ca paacittiyappabhedo vutto, eva.m dukka.tappabhedo veditabbo. evaruupena hi visabhaagapuggalena ekavihaare vaa ekaparive.ne vaa vasantena attho natthi, tasmaa sabbatthevassa nivaaso vaarito. ^b^a~n~nassa puggalike^eb^ti idhaapi vissaasikassa puggalika.m attano puggalikasadisameva, tattha anaapatti.

[03] 123^b^.^eb^ ^b^aapadaasuu^eb^ti ^a^M0.0047^ea^ sace bahi vasantassa jiivitabrahmacariyantaraayo hoti, evaruupaasu aapadaasu yo pavisati, tassaapi anaapatti. sesa.m uttaanamevaati. pa.thamapaaraajikasamu.t.thaana.m, kiriya.m, sa~n~naavimokkha.m, sacittaka.m, lokavajja.m, kaayakamma.m, akusalacitta.m, dukkhavedananti.
[06] anupakhajjasikkhaapada.m cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 126^b^.^eb^ sattamasikkhaapade -- ^b^ekena payogena bahukepi dvaare atikkaametii^eb^ti ye catubhuumakapa~ncabhuumakaa paasaadaa chasattako.t.thakaani vaa catussaalaani, taadisesu senaasanesu hatthesu vaa giivaaya vaa gahetvaa antaraa a.t.thapento ekena payogena atikkaameti, ekameva paacittiya.m. .thapetvaa .thapetvaa naanaapayogehi atikkaamentassa dvaaraga.nanaaya paacittiyaani. hatthena anaamasitvaa ``nikkhamaa''ti vatvaa vaacaaya nikka.d.dhantassaapi eseva nayo.

[03]^b^a~n~na.m aa.naapetii^eb^ti ettha ``ima.m nikka.d.dhaa''ti aa.nattimatte dukka.ta.m. sace so saki.m aa.natto bahukepi dvaare atikkaameti, eka.m paacittiya.m. sace pana ``ettakaani dvaaraani nikka.d.dhaahii''ti vaa ``yaava mahaadvaara.m taava nikka.d.dhaahii''ti vaa eva.m niyaametvaa aa.natto hoti, dvaaraga.nanaaya paacittiyaani.

[03]^b^tassa^eb^ ^a^V0.0042^ea^ ^b^parikkhaara^eb^nti ya.mki~nci tassa santaka.m pattaciivaraparissaavanadhamakara.nama~ncapii.thabhisibimbohanaadibheda.m, antamaso rajanachallimpi; yo nikka.d.dhati vaa nikka.d.dhaapeti vaa; tassa vatthuga.nanaaya dukka.taani ^a^P4.0782^ea^. gaa.lha.m bandhitvaa .thapitesu pana ekaava aapattiiti mahaapaccariya.m vutta.m.
[03] 127^b^.^eb^ ^b^a~n~nassa puggalike^eb^ti idhaapi vissaasikapuggalika.m attano puggalikasadisameva. yathaa ca idha; eva.m sabbattha. yatra pana viseso bhavissati, tatra vakkhaama.

[03] 128^b^.^eb^ ^b^alajji.m nikka.d.dhati vaa^eb^tiaadiisu bha.n.danakaarakakalahakaarakameva sakalasa"nghaaraamato nikka.d.dhitu.m labhati, so hi pakkha.m labhitvaa sa"nghampi ^a^M0.0048^ea^ bhindeyya. alajjiiaadayo pana attano vasana.t.thaanatoyeva nikka.d.dhitabbaa, sakalasa"nghaaraamato nikka.d.dhitu.m na va.t.tati. ^b^ummattakassaa^eb^ti saya.m ummattakassa anaapatti. sesa.m uttaanamevaati.

[03]tisamu.t.thaana.m -- kaayacittato vaacaacittato kaayavaacaacittato ca samu.t.thaati, kiriya.m, sa~n~naavimokkha.m, sacittaka.m, lokavajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, akusalacitta.m, dukkhavedananti.
[06] nikka.d.dhanasikkhaapada.m sattama.m.

[03] 129^b^.^eb^ a.t.thamasikkhaapade -- ^b^uparivehaasaku.tiyaa^eb^ti upari acchannatalaaya dvibhuumikaku.tiyaa vaa tibhuumikaadiku.tiyaa vaa. ^b^ma~nca.m sahasaa abhinisiidii^eb^ti ma~nca.m sahasaa abhibhavitvaa ajjhottharitvaa nisiidi. bhummatthe vaa eta.m upayogavacana.m; ma~nce nisiidiiti attho. ^b^abhii^eb^ti ida.m pana padasobhanattha.m upasaggamattameva. ^b^nippatitvaa^eb^ti nipatitvaa nikkhamitvaa vaa. tassa hi upari aa.niipi na dinnaa, tasmaa nikkhanto. ^b^vissaramakaasii^eb^ti viruupa.m aaturassaramakaasi.

[03] 131^b^.^eb^ ^b^vehaasaku.ti naama majjhimassa purisassa asiisagha.t.taa^eb^ti yaa pamaa.namajjhimassa purisassa sabbahe.t.thimaahi tulaahi siisa.m na gha.t.teti, etena idha adhippetaa vehaasaku.ti dassitaa hoti, na vehaasaku.tilakkha.na.m. yaa hi kaaci upari acchinnatalaa dvibhuumikaa ku.ti tibhuumikaadiku.ti ^a^V0.0043^ea^ vaa ``vehaasaku.tii''ti vuccati. idha pana asiisagha.t.taa adhippetaa. abhinisiidanaadiisu pubbe vuttanayeneva payogavasena aapattibhedo veditabbo.

[03] 133^b^.^eb^ ^b^avehaasaku.tiyaa^eb^ti bhuumiya.m katapa.n.nasaalaadiisu anaapatti. na hi sakkaa ^a^P4.0783^ea^ tattha parassa pii.laa kaatu.m. ^b^siisagha.t.taayaa^eb^ti yaaya.m siisagha.t.taa hoti, tatthaapi anaapatti. na hi sakkaa tattha he.t.thaapaasaade ano.natena vicaritu.m, tasmaa asa~ncara.na.t.thaanattaa parapii.laa na bhavissati ^a^M0.0049^ea^. ^b^he.t.thaa aparibhoga.m hotii^eb^ti yassaa he.t.thaa dabbasambhaaraadiina.m nikkhittattaa aparibhoga.m hoti, tatthaapi anaapatti. ^b^padarasa~ncita.m hotii^eb^ti yassaa uparimatala.m daaruphalakehi vaa ghanasanthata.m hoti, sudhaadiparikammakata.m vaa tatthaapi anaapatti. ^b^pa.taa.ni dinnaa hotii^eb^ti ma~ncapii.thaana.m paadasikhaasu aa.nii dinnaa hoti, yattha nisiidantepi na nippatanti, taadise ma~ncapii.the nisiidatopi anaapatti. ^b^tasmi.m .thito^eb^ti aahaccapaadake ma~nce vaa pii.the vaa .thito upari naagadantakaadiisu laggitaka.m ciivara.m vaa ki~nci vaa ga.nhaati vaa, a~n~na.m vaa laggeti, tassaapi anaapatti. sesa.m uttaanameva. e.lakalomasamu.t.thaana.m -- kaayato ca kaayacittato ca samu.t.thaati, kiriya.m, nosa~n~naavimokkha.m, acittaka.m, pa.n.nattivajja.m, kaayakamma.m, ticitta.m, tivedananti.
[06] vehaasaku.tisikkhaapada.m a.t.thama.m.

[03] 135^b^.^eb^ navamasikkhaapade -- ^b^yaava dvaarakosaa^eb^ti ettha dvaarakoso naama pi.t.thasa"nghaa.tassa samantaa kavaa.tavitthaarappamaa.no okaaso. mahaapaccariya.m pana ``dvaarabaahato pa.t.thaaya diya.d.dho hattho''ti vutta.m. kurundiya.m pana ``dvaarassa ubhosu passesu kavaa.tappamaa.na''nti. mahaaa.t.thakathaaya.m ``kavaa.ta.m naama diya.d.dhahatthampi hoti dvihatthampi a.d.dhateyyahatthampii''ti vutta.m, ta.m suvutta.m. tadeva hi sandhaaya bhagavataapi ``pi.t.thasa"nghaa.tassa samantaa hatthapaasaa''ti aya.m ukka.t.thaniddeso kato. ^b^agga.la.t.thapanaayaa^eb^ti sakavaa.takadvaarabandha.t.thapanaaya; sakavaa.takassa dvaarabandhassa niccalabhaavatthaayaati attho. dvaara.t.thapanaayaati idampi hi padabhaajana.m imamevattha.m sandhaaya bhaasita.m. aya.m panettha adhippaayo -- kavaa.ta~nhi lahupariva.t.taka.m vivara.nakaale bhitti.m aahanati, pidahanakaale dvaarabandha.m. tena aahananena bhitti ^a^P4.0784^ea^ kampati, tato mattikaa calati, calitvaa sithilaa vaa hoti patati vaa. tenaaha bhagavaa ``yaava dvaarakosaa agga.la.t.thapanaayaa''ti. tattha ki~ncaapi ``ida.m naama kattabba''nti ^a^V0.0044^ea^ neva maatikaaya.m na padabhaajane vutta.m, a.t.thuppattiya.m pana ``punappuna.m chaadaapesi punappuna.m lepaapesii''ti adhikaarato yaava dvaarakosaa agga.la.t.thapanaaya punappuna.m limpitabbo vaa lepaapetabbo vaati evamattho da.t.thabbo.

[03]ya.m ^a^M0.0050^ea^ pana padabhaajane ``pi.t.thasa"nghaa.tassa samantaa hatthapaasaa''ti vutta.m. tattha yassa vemajjhe dvaara.m hoti, uparibhaage uccaa bhitti, tassa tiisu disaasu samantaa hatthapaasaa upacaaro hoti, khuddakassa vihaarassa dviisu disaasu upacaaro hoti. tatraapi ya.m bhitti.m vivariyamaana.m kavaa.ta.m aahanati, saa aparipuuraupacaaraapi hoti. ukka.t.thaparicchedena pana tiisu disaasu samantaa hatthapaasaa dvaarassa niccalabhaavatthaaya lepo anu~n~naato. sace panassa dvaarassa adhobhaagepi lepokaaso atthi, tampi limpitu.m va.t.tati. ^b^aalokasandhiparikammaayaa^eb^ti ettha ^b^aalokasandhii^eb^ti vaatapaanakavaa.takaa vuccanti, tepi vivara.nakaale vidatthimattampi atirekampi bhittippadesa.m paharanti. upacaaro panettha sabbadisaasu labbhati, tasmaa sabbadisaasu kavaa.tavitthaarappamaa.no okaaso aalokasandhiparikammatthaaya limpitabbo vaa lepaapetabbo vaati ayamettha adhippaayo.
[03]^b^setava.n.na^eb^ntiaadika.m na maatikaaya padabhaajana.m. iminaa hi vihaarassa bhaarikatta.m naama natthiiti padabhaajaneyeva anu~n~naata.m, tasmaa sabbameta.m yathaasukha.m kattabba.m.

[03]eva.m lepakamme ya.m kattabba.m, ta.m dassetvaa puna chadane kattabba.m dassetu.m ^b^``dvatticchadanassaa''^eb^tiaadi vutta.m. tattha ^b^dvatticchadanassa pariyaaya^eb^nti chadanassa dvattipariyaaya.m; pariyaayo vuccati parikkhepo, parikkhepadvaya.m vaa parikkhepattaya.m vaa adhi.t.thaatabbanti attho. ^b^appaharite .thitenaa^eb^ti aharite .thitena. ^b^harita^eb^nti cettha sattadha~n~nabheda.m pubba.n.na.m muggamaasatilakulatthaalaabukumbha.n.daadibheda~nca apara.n.na.m adhippeta.m. tenevaaha -- ``harita.m naama pubba.n.na.m apara.n.na''nti.

[03]^b^sace harite .thito^eb^ ^a^P4.0785^ea^ ^b^adhi.t.thaati, aapatti dukka.tassaa^eb^ti ettha pana yasmimpi khette vutta.m biija.m na taava sampajjati, vasse vaa pana patite sampajjissati, tampi haritasa"nkhyameva gacchati. tasmaa evaruupe khettepi .thitena na adhi.t.thaatabba.m, ahariteyeva .thitena adhi.t.thaatabba.m. tatraapi aya.m paricchedo, pi.t.thiva.msassa vaa kuu.taagaaraka.n.nikaaya vaa upari thupikaaya vaa passe nisinno chadanamukhava.t.tiantena olokento yasmi.m bhuumibhaage .thita.m passati, yasmi~nca bhuumibhaage ^a^V0.0045^ea^ .thito, ta.m upari nisinnaka.m passati, tasmi.m ^a^M0.0051^ea^ .thaane adhi.t.thaatabba.m. tassa anto aharitepi .thatvaa adhi.t.thaatu.m na labbhati. kasmaa? vihaarassa hi patantassa aya.m patanokaasoti.

[03] 136^b^.^eb^ ^b^maggena chaadentassaa^eb^ti ettha maggena chaadana.m naama aparikkhipitvaa ujukameva chaadana.m; ta.m i.t.thakasilaasudhaahi labbhati. ^b^dve magge adhi.t.thahitvaa^eb^ti dve maggaa sace ducchannaa honti, apanetvaapi punappuna.m chaadetu.m labbhati, tasmaa yathaa icchati; tathaa dve magge adhi.t.thahitvaa tatiya.mmagga.m ``idaani eva.m chaadehii''ti aa.naapetvaa pakkamitabba.m. ^b^pariyaayenaa^eb^ti parikkhepena. eva.mchadana.m pana ti.napa.n.nehi labbhati. tasmaa idhaapi yathaa icchati tathaa dve pariyaaye adhi.t.thahitvaa tatiya.m pariyaaya.m ``idaani eva.m chaadehii''ti aa.naapetvaa pakkamitabba.m. sace na pakkamati, tu.nhiibhuutena .thaatabba.m. sabbampi ceta.m chadana.m chadanuupari veditabba.m. uparuuparicchanno hi vihaaro cira.m anovassako hotiiti ma~n~namaanaa eva.m chaadenti. ^b^tato ce uttari^eb^nti ti.n.na.m maggaana.m vaa pariyaayaana.m vaa upari catutthe magge vaa pariyaaye vaa.

[03] 137^b^.^eb^ ^b^kara.le kara.le^eb^ti ti.namu.t.thiya.m ti.namu.t.thiya.m. sesamettha uttaanamevaati. chasamu.t.thaana.m -- kiriya.m, nosa~n~naavimokkha.m, acittaka.m, pa.n.nattivajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, ticitta.m, tivedananti.
[06] mahallakavihaarasikkhaapada.m navama.m.

[03] 140^b^.^eb^ dasamasikkhaapade -- ^b^jaana.m sappaa.naka^eb^nti sappaa.naka.m etanti yathaa tathaa vaa jaananto. ^b^si~nceyya vaa si~ncaapeyya vaa^eb^ti tena ^a^P4.0786^ea^ udakena saya.m vaa si~nceyya, a~n~na.m vaa aa.naapetvaa si~ncaapeyya. paa.liya.m pana ``si~nceyyaati saya.m si~ncatii''ti iidisaana.m vacanaana.m attho pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbo.

[03]tattha dhaara.m avicchinditvaa si~ncantassa ekasmi.m udakagha.te ekaava aapatti. esa nayo sabbabhaajanesu. dhaara.m vicchindantassa pana payoge payoge aapatti ^a^M0.0052^ea^. maatika.m sammukha.m karoti, divasampi sandatu, ekaava aapatti. sace tattha tattha bandhitvaa a~n~nato a~n~nato neti, payoge ^a^V0.0046^ea^ payoge aapatti. saka.tabhaaramatta~ncepi ti.na.m ekapayogena udake pakkhipati, ekaava aapatti. ekeka.m ti.na.m vaa pa.n.na.m vaa pakkhipantassa payoge payoge aapatti. mattikaayapi a~n~nesupi ka.t.thagomayaadiisu eseva nayo. ida.m pana mahaaudaka.m sandhaaya na vutta.m, ya.m ti.ne vaa mattikaaya vaa pakkhittaaya pariyaadaana.m gacchati, aavila.m vaa hoti, yattha paa.nakaa maranti, taadisa.m udaka.m sandhaaya vuttanti veditabba.m. sesamettha uttaanamevaati.

[03]tisamu.t.thaana.m -- kaayacittato vaacaacittato kaayavaacaacittato ca samu.t.thaati, kiriya.m, sa~n~naavimokkha.m, sacittaka.m, pa.n.nattivajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, ticitta.m tivedananti.
[06] sappaa.nakasikkhaapada.m dasama.m.
[06] samatto va.n.nanaakkamena senaasanavaggo dutiyo.

[03] 141-144^b^.^eb^ bhikkhunivaggassa pa.thamasikkhaapade -- ^b^laabhino hontii^eb^ti ettha na tesa.m bhikkhuniyo denti, na daapenti, mahaakulehi pabbajitaa pana kuladhiitaro attano santika.m aagataana.m ~naatimanussaana.m ``kuto ayye ovaada.m uddesa.m paripuccha.m labhathaa''ti pucchantaana.m ``asuko ca asuko ca thero ovadatii''ti asiitimahaasaavake uddisitvaa kathaanusaarena tesa.m siilasutaacaarajaatigottaadibheda.m vijjamaanagu.na.m kathayanti. evaruupaa hi vijjamaanagu.naa kathetu.m va.t.tanti. tato pasannacittaa manussaa theraana.m ciivaraadibheda.m mahanta.m laabhasakkaara.m abhihari.msu. tena vutta.m -- ``laabhino honti ciivara...pe0... parikkhaaraana''nti.

[03]^b^bhikkhuniyo^eb^ ^a^M0.0053^ea^ ^b^upasa"nkamitvaa^eb^ti tesa.m kira santike taasu ekaa bhikkhuniipi na aagacchati, laabhata.nhaaya pana aaka.d.dhiyamaanahadayaa taasa.m upassaya.m agama.msu. ta.m ^a^P4.0787^ea^ sandhaaya vutta.m -- ``bhikkhuniyo upasa"nkamitvaa''ti. taapi bhikkhuniyo calacittataaya tesa.m vacana.m aka.msuyeva ^a^V0.0047^ea^. tena vutta.m -- ``atha kho taa bhikkhuniyo...pe0... nisiidi.msuu''ti. ^b^tiracchaanakatha^eb^nti saggamaggagamanepi tiracchaanabhuuta.m raajakathaadimanekavidha.m niratthakakatha.m. ^b^iddho^eb^ti samiddho, sahitattho gambhiiro bahuraso lakkha.napa.tivedhasa.myuttoti adhippaayo.

[03] 145-147^b^.^eb^ ^b^anujaanaami bhikkhave^eb^ti ettha yasmaa te bhikkhuu ``maa tumhe bhikkhave bhikkhuniyo ovaditthaa''ti vuccamaanaa adi.t.thasaccattaa tathaagate aaghaata.m bandhitvaa apaayupagaa bhaveyyu.m, tasmaa nesa.m ta.m apaayupagata.m pariharanto bhagavaa a~n~neneva upaayena te bhikkhunovaadato paribaahire kattukaamo ima.m bhikkhunovaadakasammuti.m anujaaniiti veditabbo. eva.m idha paribaahire kattukaamataaya anujaanitvaa parato karontova ^b^``anujaanaami bhikkhave a.t.thaha"ngehi samannaagata''^eb^ntiaadimaaha. imaani hi a.t.tha"ngaani chabbaggiyaana.m supinantenapi na bhuutapubbaaniiti.

[03]tattha siilamassa atthiiti ^b^siilavaa^eb^. idaani ya~nca ta.m siila.m, yathaa ca ta.m tassa atthi naama hoti, ta.m dassento ^b^``paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto''^eb^tiaadimaaha. tattha paatimokkhova sa.mvaro paatimokkhasa.mvaro. paatimokkhasa.mvarena sa.mvuto samannaagatoti ^b^paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvutaa^eb^e.
[03]^b^viharatii^eb^ti vattati. vutta~nheta.m vibha"nge --

[02] ``paatimokkhanti siila.m pati.t.thaa aadi cara.na.m sa.myamo sa.mvaro mokkha.m pamokkha.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa; sa.mvaroti kaayiko aviitikkamo vaacasiko aviitikkamo kaayikavaacasiko aviitikkamo. sa.mvutoti iminaa paatimokkhasa.mvarena upeto hoti samupeto upagato samupagato upapanno samupapanno sampanno samannaagato, tena vuccati `paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto'ti. viharatiiti iriyati vattati paaleti yapeti yaapeti carati viharati, tena vuccati `viharatii'''ti ^a^P4.0788^ea^ (vibha0 511-512).

[03]^b^aacaaragocarasampanno^eb^ti ^a^M0.0054^ea^ micchaajiivapa.tisedhakena na ve.ludaanaadinaa aacaarena, vesiyaadiagocara.m pahaaya saddhaasampannakulaadinaa ca gocarena sampanno. ^b^a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii^eb^ti appamattakesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, taani vajjaani bhayato dassanasiiloti vutta.m hoti. ^b^samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesuu^eb^ti adhisiilasikkhaadibhaavena tidhaa .thitesu sikkhaapadesu ta.m ta.m sikkhaapada.m samaadaaya sammaa aadaaya saadhuka.m gahetvaa avijahanto sikkhatiiti ^a^V0.0048^ea^ attho. ayamettha sa"nkhepo, vitthaaro pana yo icchati, tena visuddhimaggato gahetabbo.

[03]bahu sutamassaati ^b^bahussuto^eb^. suta.m dhaaretiiti ^b^sutadharo;^eb^ yadassa ta.m bahu suta.m naama, ta.m na sutamattameva; atha kho na.m dhaaretiiti attho. ma~njuusaaya.m viya ratana.m suta.m sannicitamasminti ^b^sutasannicayo^eb^. etena ya.m so suta.m dhaareti, tassa ma~njuusaaya gopetvaa sannicitaratanasseva cirakaalenaapi avinaasana.m dasseti. idaani ta.m suta.m saruupato dassento ^b^``ye te dhammaa''^eb^tiaadimaaha, ta.m vera~njaka.n.de vuttanayameva. ida.m panettha nigamana.m -- tathaaruupaassa dhammaa bahussutaa honti, tasmaa bahussuto. dhaataa, tasmaa sutadharo. vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa, di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa; tasmaa sutasannicayo. tattha ^b^vacasaa paricitaa^eb^ti vaacaaya pagu.naa kataa. ^b^manasaanupekkhitaa^eb^ti manasaa anupekkhitaa, aavajjantassa diipasahassena obhaasitaa viya honti. ^b^di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa^eb^ti atthato ca kaara.nato ca pa~n~naaya su.t.thu pa.tividdhaa supaccakkhakataa honti.

[03]aya.m pana bahussuto naama tividho hoti -- nissayamuccanako, parisupa.t.thaapako, bhikkhunovaadakoti. tattha ^b^nissayamuccanakena^eb^ upasampadaaya pa~ncavassena sabbantimena paricchedena dve maatikaa pagu.naa vaacuggataa kaatabbaa pakkhadivasesu dhammasaavanatthaaya suttantato cattaaro bhaa.navaaraa, sampattaana.m ^a^P4.0789^ea^ parikathanatthaaya andhakavindamahaaraahulovaadaamba.t.thasadiso eko kathaamaggo, sa"nghabhattama"ngalaama"ngalesu anumodanatthaaya tisso anumodanaa, uposathapavaara.naadijaananattha.m kammaakammavinicchayo ^a^M0.0055^ea^, sama.nadhammakara.nattha.m samaadhivasena vaa vipassanaavasena vaa arahattapariyosaanameka.m kamma.t.thaana.m, ettaka.m uggahetabba.m. ettaavataa hi aya.m bahussuto hoti caatuddiso, yattha katthaci attano issariyena vasitu.m labhati.

[03]^b^parisupa.t.thaapakena^eb^ upasampadaaya dasavassena sabbantimena paricchedena parisa.m abhivinaye vinetu.m dve vibha"ngaa pagu.naa vaacuggataa kaatabbaa, asakkontena tiihi janehi saddhi.m parivattanakkhamaa kaatabbaa, kammaakamma~nca khandhakavatta~nca uggahetabba.m. parisaaya pana abhidhamme vinayanattha.m sace majjhimabhaa.nako hoti muulapa.n.naasako uggahetabbo, diighabhaa.nakena mahaavaggo, sa.myuttabhaa.nakena he.t.thimaa vaa tayo vaggaa mahaavaggo vaa, a"nguttarabhaa.nakena he.t.thaa vaa upari vaa upa.d.dhanikaayo uggahetabbo, asakkontena tikanipaatato pa.t.thaaya he.t.thaa uggahetumpi va.t.tati. mahaapaccariya.m pana ``eka.m ugga.nhantena catukkanipaata.m vaa pa~ncakanipaata.m vaa gahetu.m va.t.tatii''ti ^a^V0.0049^ea^ vutta.m. jaatakabhaa.nakena saa.t.thakatha.m jaataka.m uggahetabba.m, tato ora.m na va.t.tati. dhammapadampi saha vatthunaa uggahetu.m va.t.tatiiti mahaapaccariya.m vutta.m. tato tato samuccaya.m katvaa muulapa.n.naasakamatta.m va.t.tati, na va.t.tatiiti? ``na va.t.tatii''ti kurunda.t.thakathaaya.m pa.tikkhitta.m, itaraasu vicaara.naayeva natthi. abhidhamme ki~nci uggahetabbanti na vutta.m. yassa pana saa.t.thakathampi vinayapi.taka.m abhidhammapi.taka~nca pagu.na.m, suttante ca vuttappakaaro gantho natthi, parisa.m upa.t.thaapetu.m na labhati. yena pana suttantato vinayato ca vuttappamaa.no gantho uggahito, aya.m parisupa.t.thaapako bahussuto hoti disaapaamokkho yenakaama"ngamo, parisa.m upa.t.thaapetu.m labhati.

[03]^b^bhikkhunovaadakena^eb^ ^a^P4.0790^ea^ pana saa.t.thakathaani tii.ni pi.takaani uggahetabbaani, asakkontena catuusu nikaayesu ekassa a.t.thakathaa pagu.naa kaatabbaa, ekanikaayena hi sesanikaayesupi pa~nha.m kathetu.m sakkhissati. sattasu pakara.nesu catuppakara.nassa a.t.thakathaa pagu.naa kaatabbaa, tattha laddhanayena hi sesapakara.nesu pa~nha.m kathetu.m sakkhissati. vinayapi.taka.m pana naanattha.m naanaakaara.na.m, tasmaa ta.m saddhi.m a.t.thakathaaya pagu.na.m kaatabbameva. ettaavataa hi bhikkhunovaadako bahussuto naama hotiiti.

[03]^b^ubhayaani^eb^ ^a^M0.0056^ea^ ^b^kho panassaa^eb^tiaadi pana yasmaa a~n~nasmi.m sakale nava"ngepi baahussacce sati saa.t.thakatha.m vinayapi.taka.m vinaa na va.t.tatiyeva, tasmaa visu.m vutta.m. tattha ^b^vitthaarenaa^eb^ti ubhatovibha"ngena saddhi.m. ^b^svaagataanii^eb^ti su.t.thu aagataani. yathaa aagataani pana svaagataani honti, ta.m dassetu.m ^b^``suvibhattaanii''^eb^tiaadi vutta.m. tattha ^b^suvibhattaanii^eb^ti su.t.thu vibhattaani padapaccaabha.t.thasa"nkaradosavirahitaani. ^b^suppavattiinii^eb^ti pagu.naani vaacuggataani. ^b^suvinicchitaani suttaso^eb^ti khandhakaparivaarato aaharitabbasuttavasena su.t.thu vinicchitaani. ^b^anubya~njanaso^eb^ti akkharapadapaaripuuriyaa ca suvinicchitaani akha.n.daani avipariitakkharaani. etena a.t.thakathaa diipitaa, a.t.thakathaato hi esa vinicchayo hotiiti.

[03]^b^kalyaa.navaaco^eb^ti sithiladhanitaadiina.m yathaavidhaanavacanena parima.n.dalapadabya~njanaaya poriyaa vaacaaya samannaagato vissa.t.thaaya anelaga.laaya atthassa vi~n~naapaniyaa. ^b^kalyaa.navaakkara.no^eb^ti madhurassaro, maatugaamo hi sarasampattirato, tasmaa parima.n.dalapadabya~njanampi vacana.m sarasampattirahita.m hii.leti. ^b^yebhuyyena bhikkhuniina.m piyo hoti manaapo^eb^ti sabbaasa.m piyo naama dullabho, bahutaraana.m pana pa.n.ditaana.m bhikkhuniina.m siilaacaarasampattiyaa piyo hoti manava.d.dhanako. ^b^pa.tibalo hoti bhikkhuniyo ovaditu^eb^nti sutta~nca kaara.na~nca dassento va.t.tabhayena tajjetvaa ^a^V0.0050^ea^ bhikkhuniyo ovaditu.m taadisa.m dhamma.m desetu.m samattho hoti. ^b^kaasaayavatthavasanaayaa^eb^ti kaasaayavatthanivatthaaya. ^b^garudhamma^eb^nti gihikaale bhikkhuniyaa kaayasa.msagga.m ^a^P4.0791^ea^ vaa sikkhamaanaasaama.neriisu methunadhamma.m vaa anajjhaapannapubbo hoti. maatugaamo hi pubbe katamanussaranto sa.mvare .thitassaapi dhammadesanaaya gaarava.m na karoti. atha vaa tasmiyeva asaddhamme citta.m uppaadeti. ^b^viisativasso vaa^eb^ti upasampadaaya viisativasso tato atirekavasso vaa. evaruupo hi visabhaagehi vatthuuhi punappuna.m samaagacchantopi daharo viya sahasaa siilavinaasa.m na paapu.naati, attano vaya.m paccavekkhitvaa ayutta.t.thaane chandaraaga.m vinetu.m pa.tibalo hoti, tena vutta.m -- ``viisativasso vaa hoti atirekaviisativasso vaa''ti.

[03]ettha ^a^M0.0057^ea^ ca ``siilavaa''tiaadi ekama"nga.m, ``bahussuto hotii''tiaadi dutiya.m, ``ubhayaani kho panassaa''tiaadi tatiya.m, ``kalyaa.navaaco hoti kalyaa.navaakkara.no''ti catuttha.m, ``yebhuyyena bhikkhuniina.m piyo hoti manaapo''ti pa~ncama.m, ``pa.tibalo hoti bhikkhuniyo ovaditu''nti cha.t.tha.m, ``na kho paneta''ntiaadi sattama.m, ``viisativasso''tiaadi a.t.thamanti veditabba.m.

[03] 148^b^.^eb^ ^b^~natticatutthenaa^eb^ti pubbe vatthusmi.m vutteneva. ^b^garudhammehii^eb^ti garukehi dhammehi, te hi gaarava.m katvaa bhikkhuniihi sampa.ticchitabbattaa garudhammaati vuccanti. ^b^ekatoupasampannaayaa^eb^ti ettha bhikkhuniina.m santike ekatoupasampannaaya, yo garudhammena ovadati, tassa dukka.ta.m. bhikkhuuna.m santike upasampannaaya pana yathaavatthukameva.

[03] 149^b^.^eb^ ^b^parive.na.m sammajjitvaa^eb^ti sace paato asamma.t.tha.m samma.t.thampi vaa puna ti.napa.n.naadiihi uklaapa.m paadappahaarehi ca viki.n.navaalika.m jaata.m, sammajjitabba.m. asamma.t.tha~nhi ta.m disvaa ``ayyo attano nissitake daharabhikkhuupi vattapa.tipattiya.m na yojeti, dhamma.myeva kathetii''ti taa bhikkhuniyo asotukaamaa viya bhaveyyu.m. tena vutta.m -- ``parive.na.m sammajjitvaa''ti. antogaamato pana bhikkhuniyo aagacchantiyo pipaasitaa ca kilantaa ca honti, taa paaniiya~nca hatthapaadamukhasiitalakara.na~nca paccaasiisanti, tasmi~nca asati purimanayeneva agaarava.m janetvaa asotukaamaapi honti ^a^P4.0792^ea^. tena vutta.m -- ^b^``paaniiya.m paribhojaniiya.m upa.t.thapetvaa''^eb^ti.

[03]^b^aasana^eb^nti niicapii.thakaphalakata.t.tikaka.tasaarakaadibheda.m antamaso saakhaabha"ngampi ``ida.m taasa.m aasana.m ^a^V0.0051^ea^ bhavissatii''ti eva.m aasana.m pa~n~napetvaa. dhammadesanaapattimocanattha.m pana dutiyo icchitabbo. tena vutta.m -- ^b^``dutiya.m gahetvaa nisiiditabba^eb^''nti. ^b^nisiiditabba^eb^nti na vihaarapaccante, atha kho vihaaramajjhe uposathaagaarassa vaa bhojanasaalaaya vaa dvaare sabbesa.m osara.na.t.thaane nisiiditabba.m. ^b^samaggaatthaa^eb^ti sabbaa aagatatthaati attho. ^b^vattantii^eb^ti aagacchanti; pagu.naa vaacuggataati attho. ^b^niyyaadetabbo^eb^ti appetabbo. ^b^osaaretabbo^eb^ti paa.li vattabbaa. ^b^vassasatuupasampannaayaa^eb^tiaadi vattabbapaa.lidassana.m.

[03]tattha ^a^M0.0058^ea^ ^b^saamiicikamma^eb^nti maggasampadaanabiijanapaaniiyaapucchanaadika.m anucchavikavatta.m. ettha ca bhikkhuniyaa bhikkhussa abhivaadana.m naama antogaame vaa bahigaame vaa antovihaare vaa bahivihaare vaa antaraghare vaa rathikaaya vaa antamaso raajussaara.naayapi vattamaanaaya deve vassamaane sakaddamaaya bhuumiyaa chattapattahatthaayapi hatthiassaadiihi anubaddhaayapi kaatabbameva. ekaabaddhaaya paa.liyaa bhikkhaacaara.m pavisante disvaa ekasmi.m .thaane ``vandaami ayyaa''ti vanditu.m va.t.tati. sace antarantaraa dvaadasahatthe mu~ncitvaa gacchanti, visu.m visu.m vanditabbaa. mahaasannipaate nisinne ekasmi.myeva .thaane vanditu.m va.t.tati. esa nayo a~njalikammepi. yattha katthaci nisinnaaya pana paccu.t.thaana.m kaatabba.m, tassa tassa saamiicikammassa anuruupe padese ca kaale ca ta.m ta.m kaatabba.m.

[03]^b^sakkatvaa^eb^ti yathaa kato sukato hoti, eva.m katvaa. ^b^garu.mkatvaa^eb^ti tattha gaarava.m janetvaa. ^b^maanetvaa^eb^ti manena piya.m katvaa. ^b^puujetvaa^eb^ti imesa.myeva ti.n.na.m kiccaana.m kara.nena puujetvaa. ^b^anatikkamaniiyo^eb^ti na atikkamitabbo.

[03]^b^abhikkhuke aavaase^eb^ti ettha sace bhikkhunupassayato a.d.dhayojanabbhantare ovaadadaayakaa bhikkhuu na vasanti, aya.m abhikkhuko ^a^P4.0793^ea^ aavaaso naama. ettha vassa.m na vasitabba.m. vutta~nheta.m -- ``abhikkhuko naama aavaaso na sakkaa hoti ovaadaaya vaa sa.mvaasaaya vaa gantu''nti (paaci0 1048). na ca sakkaa tato para.m pacchaabhatta.m gantvaa dhamma.m sutvaa aagantu.m. sace tattha vassa.m vasitu.m anicchamaanaa bhikkhuniyo ~naatakaa vaa upa.t.thaakaa vaa eva.mvadanti -- ``vasatha, ayye, maya.m bhikkhuu aanessaamaa''ti va.t.tati. sace pana vuttappamaa.ne padese vassa.m upagantukaamaa bhikkhuu aagantvaa saakhaama.n.dapepi ekaratta.m vutthaa honti; na nimantitaa hutvaa gantukaamaa. ettaavataapi sabhikkhuko aavaaso hoti, ettha vassa.m upagantu.m va.t.tati. upagacchantiihi ca pakkhassa terasiya.myeva bhikkhuu yaacitabbaa -- ``maya.m ayyaa tumhaaka.m ovaadena ^a^V0.0052^ea^ vasissaamaa''ti. yato pana ujunaa maggena a.d.dhayojane bhikkhuuna.m vasana.t.thaana.m, tena pana maggena gacchantiina.m jiivitantaraayo vaa brahmacariyantaraayo vaa hoti, a~n~nena maggena gacchantiina.m ^a^M0.0059^ea^ atireka.d.dhayojana.m hoti, aya.m abhikkhukaavaasa.t.thaaneyeva ti.t.thati. sace pana tato gaavutamatte a~n~no bhikkhunupassayo khema.t.thaane hoti, taahi bhikkhuniihi taa bhikkhuniyo yaacitvaa puna gantvaa bhikkhuu yaacitabbaa ``ayyaa amhaaka.m ujumagge antaraayo atthi, a~n~nena maggena atireka.d.dhayojana.m hoti. antaraamagge pana amhaaka.m upassayato gaavutamatte a~n~no bhikkhunupassayo atthi, ayyaana.m santikaa tattha aagataovaadena vasissaamaa''ti. tehi bhikkhuuhi sampa.ticchitabba.m. tato taahi bhikkhuniihi ta.m bhikkhunupassaya.m aagantvaa uposatho kaatabbo, taa vaa bhikkhuniyo disvaa attano upassayameva gantvaa kaatumpi va.t.tati.

[03]sace pana vassa.m upagantukaamaa bhikkhuu caatuddase vihaara.m aagacchanti, bhikkhuniihi ca ``idha ayyaa vassa.m vasissathaa''ti pucchitaa ``aamaa''ti vatvaa puna taahi ``tenahi ayyaa mayampi tumhaaka.m ovaada.m anujiivantiyo vasissaamaa''ti vuttaa dutiyadivase gaame bhikkhaacaarasampada.m apassantaa ``na sakkaa idha vasitu''nti pakkamanti. atha taa bhikkhuniyo uposathadivase vihaara.m gantvaa bhikkhuu na passanti, ettha ki.m kaatabbanti? yattha bhikkhuu vasanti, tattha gantvaa pacchimikaaya vassa.m upagantabba.m. ``pacchimikaaya vassa.m upagantu.m aagamissantii''ti vaa aabhoga.m katvaa aagataana.m ^a^P4.0794^ea^ santike ovaadena vasitabba.m. sace pana pacchimikaayapi na keci aagacchanti, antaraamagge ca raajabhaya.m vaa corabhaya.m vaa dubbhikkha.m vaa hoti, abhikkhukaavaase vasantiyaa aapatti, vassaccheda.m katvaa gacchantiyaapi aapatti, saa rakkhitabbaa. aapadaasu hi abhikkhuke aavaase vasantiyaa anaapatti vuttaa. sace aagantvaa vassa.m upagataa bhikkhuu puna kenaci kaara.nena pakkamanti, vasitabbameva. vutta~nheta.m -- ``anaapatti vassuupagataa bhikkhuu pakkantaa vaa honti vibbhantaa vaa kaala"nkataa vaa pakkhasa"nkantaa vaa aapadaasu ummattikaaya aadikammikaayaa''ti. pavaarentiyaa pana yattha bhikkhuu atthi, tattha gantvaa pavaaretabba.m.

[03]^b^anvaddhamaasa^eb^nti addhamaase addhamaase. ^b^dve dhammaa paccaasiisitabbaa^eb^ti dve dhammaa icchitabbaa. ^b^uposathapucchaka^eb^nti uposathapucchana.m, tattha pannarasike uposathe pakkhassa caatuddasiya.m caatuddasike terasiya.m gantvaa uposatho ^a^M0.0060^ea^ pucchitabbo. mahaapaccariya.m pana ``pakkhassa terasiya.myeva gantvaa `aya.m uposatho caatuddasiko pannarasiko'ti pucchitabba''nti vutta.m. uposathadivase ^a^V0.0053^ea^ ovaadatthaaya upasa"nkamitabba.m. paa.tipadadivasato pana pa.t.thaaya dhammasavanatthaaya gantabba.m. iti bhagavaa a~n~nassa kammassa okaasa.m adatvaa nirantara.m bhikkhuniina.m bhikkhuuna.m santike gamanameva pa~n~napesi. kasmaa? mandapa~n~nattaa maatugaamassa. mandapa~n~no hi maatugaamo, tasmaa nicca.m dhammasavana.m bahuupakaara.m. eva~nca sati ``ya.m maya.m jaanaama, tameva ayyaa jaanantii''ti maana.m akatvaa bhikkhusa"ngha.m payiruupaasamaanaa saatthika.m pabbajja.m karissanti, tasmaa bhagavaa evamakaasi. bhikkhuniyopi ``yathaanusi.t.tha.m pa.tipajjissaamaa''ti sabbaayeva nirantara.m vihaara.m upasa"nkami.msu. vutta~nheta.m --

[02] ``tena kho pana samayena sabbo bhikkhunisa"ngho ovaada.m gacchati. manussaa ujjhaayanti khiyyanti vipaacenti `jaayaayo imaa imesa.m, jaariyo imaa imesa.m, idaanime imaahi saddhi.m abhiramissantii'ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m -- `na, bhikkhave, sabbena bhikkhunisa"nghena ovaado gantabbo, gaccheyya ce, aapatti dukka.tassa. anujaanaami bhikkhave catuuhi pa~ncahi bhikkhuniihi ^a^P4.0795^ea^ ovaada.m gantu'nti. punapi tatheva ujjhaayi.msu. puna bhagavaa `anujaanaami, bhikkhave, dve tisso bhikkhuniyo ovaada.m gantu'''nti aaha.

[03]tasmaa bhikkhunisa"nghena dve tisso bhikkhuniyo yaacitvaa pesetabbaa -- ``ethayye, bhikkhusa"ngha.m ovaaduupasa"nkamana.m yaacatha, bhikkhunisa"ngho ayyaa...pe0... ovaaduupasa"nkamana''nti (cuu.lava0 413). taahi bhikkhuniihi aaraama.m gantabba.m. tato ovaadapa.tiggaahaka.m eka.m bhikkhu.m upasa"nkamitvaa vanditvaa so bhikkhu ekaaya bhikkhuniyaa evamassa vacaniiyo ``bhikkhunisa"ngho, ayya, bhikkhusa"nghassa paade vandati, ovaaduupasa"nkamana~nca yaacati, labhatu kira ayya bhikkhunisa"ngho ovaaduupasa"nkamana''nti. tena bhikkhunaa paatimokkhuddesako bhikkhu upasa"nkamitvaa evamassa vacaniiyo ``bhikkhunisa"ngho bhante bhikkhusa"nghassa paade vandati, ovaaduupasa"nkamana~nca yaacati, labhatu kira bhante bhikkhunisa"ngho ovaaduupasa"nkamana''nti. paatimokkhuddesakena vattabbo ``atthi koci bhikkhu bhikkhunovaadako sammato''ti. sace hoti koci bhikkhu ^a^M0.0061^ea^ bhikkhunovaadako sammato, paatimokkhuddesakena vattabbo ``itthannaamo bhikkhu bhikkhunovaadako sammato, ta.m bhikkhunisa"ngho upasa"nkamatuu''ti.

[03]sace na hoti koci bhikkhu bhikkhunovaadako sammato, paatimokkhuddesakena vattabbo -- ``ko ^a^V0.0054^ea^ aayasmaa ussahati bhikkhuniyo ovaditu''nti. sace koci bhikkhu ussahati bhikkhuniyo ovaditu.m, so ca hoti a.t.thaha"ngehi samannaagato, sammannitvaa vattabbo -- ``itthannaamo bhikkhu bhikkhunovaadako sammato, ta.m bhikkhunisa"ngho upasa"nkamatuu''ti.

[03]sace pana koci na ussahati bhikkhuniyo ovaditu.m, paatimokkhuddesakena vattabbo -- ``natthi koci bhikkhu bhikkhunovaadako sammato, paasaadikena bhikkhunisa"ngho sampaadetuu''ti. ettaavataa hi sakala.m sikkhattayasa"ngaha.m saasanamaarocita.m hoti. tena bhikkhunaa ``saadhuu''ti sampa.ticchitvaa paa.tipade bhikkhuniina.m aarocetabba.m. bhikkhunisa"nghenapi taa bhikkhuniyo pesetabbaa ``gacchathayye, pucchatha `ki.m ^a^P4.0796^ea^ ayya labhati bhikkhunisa"ngho ovaaduupasa"nkamana'''nti. taahi ``saadhu ayye''ti sampa.ticchitvaa aaraama.m gantvaa ta.m bhikkhu.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vattabba.m -- ``ki.m ayya labhati bhikkhunisa"ngho ovaaduupasa"nkamana''nti. tena vattabba.m -- ``natthi koci bhikkhu bhikkhunovaadako sammato, paasaadikena bhikkhunisa"ngho sampaadetuu''ti. taahi ``saadhu ayyaa''ti sampa.ticchitabba.m. ekato aagataana.m vasena ceta.m vutta.m, taasu pana ekaaya bhikkhuniyaa vattabba~nca sampa.ticchitabba~nca, itaraa tassaa sahaayikaa.

[03]sace pana bhikkhunisa"ngho vaa bhikkhusa"ngho vaa na puurati, ubhayatopi vaa ga.namattameva puggalamatta.m vaa hoti, ekaa bhikkhunii vaa bahuuhi bhikkhunupassayehi ovaadatthaaya pesitaa hoti, tatraaya.m vacanakkamo -- ``bhikkhuniyo ayya bhikkhusa"nghassa paade vandanti, ovaaduupasa"nkamana~nca yaacanti, labhantu kira ayya bhikkhuniyo ovaaduupasa"nkamana''nti. ``aha.m ayya bhikkhusa"nghassa paade vandaami; ovaaduupasa"nkamana~nca yaacaami, labhaamaha.m ayya ovaaduupasa"nkamana''nti.

[03]``bhikkhunisa"ngho ^a^M0.0062^ea^ ayya ayyaana.m paade vandati, ovaaduupasa"nkamana~nca yaacati, labhatu kira ayya bhikkhuniisa"ngho ovaaduupasa"nkamana''nti. ``bhikkhuniyo ayya ayyaana.m paade vandanti, ovaaduupasa"nkamana~nca yaacanti, labhantu kira ayya bhikkhuniyo ovaaduupasa"nkamana''nti. ``aha.m ayya ayyaana.m paade vandaami, ovaaduupasa"nkamana~nca yaacaami, labhaamaha.m ayya ovaaduupasa"nkamana''nti.

[03]``bhikkhunisa"ngho ayya ayyassa paade vandati, ovaaduupasa"nkamana~nca yaacati, labhatu kira ayya bhikkhunisa"ngho ovaaduupasa"nkamana''nti. ``bhikkhuniyo ayya ayyassa paade vandanti ^a^V0.0055^ea^; ovaaduupasa"nkamana~nca yaacanti, labhantu kira ayya bhikkhuniyo ovaaduupasa"nkamana''nti. ``aha.m ayya ayyassa paade vandaami, ovaaduupasa"nkamana~nca yaacaami, labhaamaha.m ayya ovaaduupasa"nkamana''nti.

[03]``bhikkhunisa"ngho ca ayya bhikkhuniyo ca bhikkhunii ca bhikkhusa"nghassa ayyaana.m ayyassa paade vandati vandanti vandati, ovaaduupasa"nkamana~nca yaacati yaacanti yaacati, labhatu kira labhantu kira labhatu kira ayya bhikkhunisa"ngho ca bhikkhuniyo ca bhikkhunii ca ovaaduupasa"nkamana''nti.

[03]tenapi bhikkhunaa uposathakaale eva.m vattabba.m -- ``bhikkhuniyo bhante bhikkhusa"nghassa paade vandanti, ovaaduupasa"nkamana~nca yaacanti, labhantu kira bhante bhikkhuniyo ovaaduupasa"nkamana''nti. ``bhikkhunii bhante bhikkhusa"nghassa paade ^a^P4.0797^ea^ vandati, ovaaduupasa"nkamana~nca yaacati, labhatu kira bhante bhikkhunii ovaaduupasa"nkamana''nti.
[03]``bhikkhunisa"ngho bhante, bhikkhuniyo bhante, bhikkhunii bhante aayasmantaana.m paade vandati, ovaaduupasa"nkamana~nca yaacati, labhatu kira bhante bhikkhunii ovaaduupasa"nkamana''nti.

[03]``bhikkhunisa"ngho ca bhante, bhikkhuniyo ca bhikkhunii ca bhikkhusa"nghassa aayasmantaana.m paade vandati vandanti vandati, ovaaduupasa"nkamana~nca yaacati yaacanti yaacati, labhatu kira labhantu kira labhatu kira bhante bhikkhunisa"ngho ca bhikkhuniyo ca bhikkhunii ca ovaaduupasa"nkamana''nti.

[03]paatimokkhuddesakenaapi sace sammato bhikkhu atthi, purimanayeneva ta.m bhikkhuniyo, ta.m bhikkhunii, ta.m bhikkhunisa"ngho ca bhikkhuniyo ca bhikkhunii ca upasa"nkamantu upasa"nkamatu upasa"nkamatuuti vattabba.m. sace natthi, paasaadikena ^a^M0.0063^ea^ bhikkhunisa"ngho ca bhikkhuniyo ca bhikkhunii ca sampaadetu sampaadentu sampaadetuuti vattabba.m.

[03]ovaadapa.tiggaahakena paa.tipade paccaaharitvaa tatheva vattabba.m. ovaada.m pana baalagilaanagamike .thapetvaa a~n~no sacepi aara~n~nako hoti, appa.tiggahetu.m na labhati. vutta~nheta.m bhagavataa --
[02] ``anujaanaami ^a^V0.0056^ea^, bhikkhave, .thapetvaa baala.m .thapetvaa gilaana.m .thapetvaa gamika.m avasesehi ovaada.m gahetu''nti (cuu.lava0 414).

[03]tattha yo caatuddasikapannarasikesu vaa uposathesu paa.tipade vaa gantukaamo, so gamiko dutiyapakkhadivase gacchantopi aggahetu.m na labhati, ``na, bhikkhave, ovaado na gahetabbo, yo na ga.nheyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti (cuu.lava0 414) vutta.m aapatti.m aapajjatiyeva. ovaada.m gahetvaa ca uposathagge anaarocetu.m vaa paa.tipade bhikkhuniina.m apaccaaharitu.m vaa na va.t.tati. vutta~nheta.m ^a^P4.0798^ea^ --
[02] ``na, bhikkhave, ovaado na aarocetabbo. yo na aaroceyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti (cuu.lava0 415).
[03]aparampi vutta.m --
[02] ``na, bhikkhave, ovaado na paccaaharitabbo. yo na paccaahareyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti (cuu.lava0 415).

[03]tattha aara~n~nakena paccaahara.nattha.m sa"nketo kaatabbo. vutta~nheta.m -- ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, aara~n~nakena bhikkhunaa ovaada.m gahetu.m, sa"nketa~nca kaatu.m, atra pa.tiharissaamii''ti. tasmaa aara~n~nako bhikkhu sace bhikkhuniina.m vasanagaame bhikkha.m labhati, tattheva caritvaa bhikkhuniyo disvaa aarocetvaa gantabba.m. no cassa tattha bhikkhaa sulabhaa hoti, saamantagaame caritvaa bhikkhuniina.m gaama.m aagamma tatheva kaatabba.m. sace duura.m gantabba.m hoti, sa"nketo kaatabbo -- ``aha.m amuka.m naama tumhaaka.m gaamadvaare sabha.m vaa ma.n.dapa.m vaa rukkhamuula.m vaa upasa"nkamissaami, tattha aagaccheyyaathaa''ti ^a^M0.0064^ea^. bhikkhuniihi tattha gantabba.m, agantu.m na labbhati. vutta~nheta.m -- ``na, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyaa sa"nketa.m na gantabba.m. yaa na gaccheyya, aapatti dukka.tassaa''ti (cuu.lava0 415).
[03]^b^ubhatosa"nghe tiihi .thaanehi pavaaretabba^eb^nti ettha bhikkhuniihi caatuddase attanaa pavaaretvaa uposathe bhikkhusa"nghe pavaaretabba.m. vutta~nheta.m --
[02] ``anujaanaami ^a^V0.0057^ea^, bhikkhave, ajjatanaaya pavaaretvaa aparajju bhikkhusa"ngha.m pavaaretu''nti (cuu.lava0 427).
[03]bhikkhunikhandhake vuttanayeneva cettha vinicchayo veditabbo. vutta~nheta.m --

[02] ``tena kho pana samayena sabbo bhikkhunisa"ngho pavaarento kolaahalamakaasi. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, eka.m bhikkhuni.m byatta.m pa.tibala.m sammannitu.m bhikkhunisa"nghassa atthaaya bhikkhusa"ngha.m pavaaretu.m. eva~nca pana, bhikkhave, sammannitabbaa. pa.thama.m bhikkhunii yaacitabbaa, yaacitvaa byattaaya bhikkhuniyaa pa.tibalaaya sa"ngho ~naapetabbo --
[02] ``su.naatu me, ayye sa"ngho, yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m, sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhuni.m sammanneyya bhikkhunisa"nghassa atthaaya bhikkhusa"ngha.m pavaaretu.m. esaa ~natti.

[02] ``su.naatu me, ayye sa"ngho, sa"ngho itthannaama.m bhikkhuni.m sammanneyya bhikkhunisa"nghassa atthaaya bhikkhusa"ngha.m pavaaretu.m. yassaa ayyaaya khamati itthannaamaaya bhikkhuniyaa sammuti bhikkhunisa"nghassa atthaaya bhikkhusa"ngha.m ^a^P4.0799^ea^ pavaaretu.m, saa tu.nhassa; yassaa nakkhamati, saa bhaaseyya.
[02] ``sammataa sa"nghena itthannaamaa bhikkhunii bhikkhunisa"nghassa atthaaya bhikkhusa"ngha.m pavaaretu.m. khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti (cuu.lava0 427).

[03]taaya ^a^M0.0065^ea^ sammataaya bhikkhuniyaa bhikkhunisa"ngha.m aadaaya bhikkhusa"ngha.m upasa"nkamitvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa a~njali.m paggahetvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``bhikkhunisa"ngho ayya, bhikkhusa"ngha.m pavaareti -- di.t.thena vaa sutena vaa parisa"nkaaya vaa. vadatayya bhikkhusa"ngho bhikkhunisa"ngha.m anukampa.m upaadaaya, passanto pa.tikarissati. dutiyampi ayya, tatiyampi ayya, bhikkhunisa"ngho...pe0... pa.tikarissatii''ti.

[03]sace bhikkhunisa"ngho na puurati, ``bhikkhuniyo ayya bhikkhusa"ngha.m pavaarenti -- di.t.thena vaa sutena vaa parisa"nkaaya vaa, vadatayya bhikkhusa"ngho bhikkhuniyo anukampa.m upaadaaya, passantiyo ^a^V0.0058^ea^ pa.tikarissantii''ti ca, ``aha.m ayya bhikkhusa"ngha.m pavaaremi -- di.t.thena vaa sutena vaa parisa"nkaaya vaa, vadatu ma.m ayya bhikkhusa"ngho anukampa.m upaadaaya, passantii pa.tikarissaamii''ti ca eva.m tikkhattu.m vattabba.m.

[03]sace bhikkhusa"ngho na puurati, ``bhikkhunisa"ngho ayyaa ayye pavaareti -- di.t.thena vaa sutena vaa parisa"nkaaya vaa, vadantayyaa bhikkhunisa"ngha.m anukampa.m upaadaaya, passanto pa.tikarissatii''ti ca, ``bhikkhunisa"ngho ayya ayya.m pavaareti -- di.t.thena vaa sutena vaa parisa"nkaaya vaa, vadatayyo bhikkhunisa"ngha.m anukampa.m upaadaaya, passanto pa.tikarissatii''ti ca eva.m tikkhattu.m vattabba.m.

[03]ubhinna.m apaaripuuriyaa ``bhikkhuniyo ayyaa ayye pavaarenti -- di.t.thena vaa sutena vaa parisa"nkaaya vaa, vadantayyaa bhikkhuniyo anukampa.m upaadaaya, passantiyo pa.tikarissantii''ti ca, ``bhikkhuniyo ayya ayya.m pavaarenti -- di.t.thena vaa sutena vaa parisa"nkaaya vaa, vadatayyo bhikkhuniyo anukampa.m upaadaaya, passantiyo pa.tikarissantii''ti ca, ``aha.m ayyaa ayye pavaaremi -- di.t.thena vaa sutena vaa parisa"nkaaya vaa, vadantu ma.m ayyaa anukampa.m upaadaaya, passantii pa.tikarissaamii''ti ca, ``aha.m ayya ayya.m pavaaremi -- di.t.thena ^a^P4.0800^ea^ vaa sutena vaa parisa"nkaaya vaa, vadatu ma.m ayyo anukampa.m upaadaaya, passantii pa.tikarissaamii''ti ca eva.m tikkhattu.m vattabba.m.
[03]maanattacara.na~nca upasampadaapariyesanaa ca yathaa.thaaneyeva aavi bhavissati.

[03]^b^na^eb^ ^a^M0.0066^ea^ ^b^bhikkhuniyaa kenaci pariyaayenaa^eb^ti dasahi vaa akkosavatthuuhi a~n~nena vaa kenaci pariyaayena bhikkhu neva akkositabbo, na paribhaasitabbo, na bhayena tajjetabbo. ^b^ova.to^eb^ti pihito vaarito pa.tikkhitto. vacanayeva ^b^vacanapatho. anova.to^eb^ti apihito avaarito appa.tikkhitto. tasmaa bhikkhuniyaa aadhipacca.t.thaane je.t.thaka.t.thaane .thatvaa ``eva.m abhikkama, eva.m pa.tikkama, eva.m nivaasehi, eva.m paarupaahii''ti kenaci pariyaayena neva bhikkhu ovaditabbo, na anusaasitabbo. dosa.m pana disvaa ``pubbe mahaatheraa na eva.m abhikkamanti, na pa.tikkamanti, na nivaasenti, na paarupanti, iidisa.m kaasaavampi na dhaarenti, na eva.m akkhiini a~njentii''tiaadinaa nayena vijjamaanadosa.m dassetu.m va.t.tati. bhikkhuuhi pana ``aya.m vu.d.dhasama.nii eva.m nivaaseti, eva.m paarupati, maa eva.m nivaasehi, maa eva.m ^a^V0.0059^ea^ paarupaahi, maa tilakammapa.n.nakammaadiini karohii''ti yathaasukha.m bhikkhuni.m ovaditu.m anusaasitu.m va.t.tati.

[03]^b^samaggamhayyaati bha.nanta^eb^nti ``samaggaa amha ayya'' iti bha.nanta.m bhikkhunisa"ngha.m. ^b^a~n~na.m dhamma.m bha.natii^eb^ti a~n~na.m suttanta.m vaa abhidhamma.m vaa. samaggamhayyaati vacanena hi ovaada.m paccaasiisanti, tasmaa .thapetvaa ovaada.m a~n~na.m dhamma.m bha.nantassa dukka.ta.m. ^b^ovaada.m aniyyaadetvaa^eb^ti eso bhaginiyo ovaadoti avatvaa.

[03] 150^b^.^eb^ ^b^adhammakamme^eb^tiaadiisu bhikkhunovaadakasammutikamma.m kammanti veditabba.m. tattha adhammakamme dvinna.m navakaana.m vasena a.t.thaarasa paacittiyaani. dhammakamme dutiyassa navakassa avasaanapade anaapatti, sesesu sattarasa dukka.taani.

[03] 152^b^.^eb^ ^b^uddesa.m dento^eb^ti a.t.thanna.m garudhammaana.m paa.li.m uddisanto. ^b^paripuccha.m dento^eb^ti tassaayeva pagu.naaya garudhammapaa.liyaa a.t.thakatha.m kathentoti attho. ^b^osaarehi ayyaati vuccamaano osaaretii^eb^ti eva.m vuccamaano a.t.thagarudhammapaa.li.m ^a^P4.0801^ea^ osaaretiiti attho. eva.m uddesa.m dento, paripuccha.m dento, yo ca osaarehiiti vuccamaano a.t.tha garudhamme bha.nati, tassa paacittiyena anaapatti. a~n~na.m dhamma.m bha.nantassa dukka.tena anaapatti. ^b^pa~nha.m pucchati, pa~nha.m pu.t.tho kathetii^eb^ti bhikkhunii garudhammanissita.m vaa khandhaadinissita.m vaa pa~nha.m pucchati, ta.m yo bhikkhu katheti, tassaapi ^a^M0.0067^ea^ anaapatti. ^b^a~n~nassatthaaya bha.nanta^eb^nti catuparisati.m dhamma.m desenta.m bhikkhu.m upasa"nkamitvaa bhikkhuniyo su.nanti, tatraapi bhikkhussa anaapatti. ^b^sikkhamaanaaya saama.neriyaa^eb^ti etaasa.m desentassaapi anaapatti. sesa.m uttaanatthameva.
[03]padasodhammasamu.t.thaana.m -- vaacato ca vaacaacittato ca samu.t.thaati, kiriya.m, nosa~n~naavimokkha.m, acittaka.m, pa.n.nattivajja.m, vaciikamma.m, ticitta.m tivedananti.
[06] ovaadasikkhaapada.m pa.thama.m.

[03] 153^b^.^eb^ dutiyasikkhaapade -- ^b^pariyaayenaa^eb^ti vaarena, pa.tipaa.tiyaati attho. ^b^adhicetaso^eb^ti adhicittavato ^a^V0.0060^ea^, sabbacittaana.m adhikena arahattaphalacittena samannaagatassaati attho. ^b^appamajjato^eb^ti nappamajjato, appamaadena kusalaana.m dhammaana.m saataccakiriyaaya samannaagatassaati vutta.m hoti. ^b^munino^eb^ti ``yo munaati ubho loke, muni tena pavuccatii''ti (dha0 pa0 269) eva.m ubhayalokamunanena vaa, mona.m vuccati ~naa.na.m, tena ~naa.nena samannaagatattaa vaa khii.naasavo muni naama vuccati, tassa munino. ^b^monapathesu sikkhato^eb^ti arahatta~naa.nasa"nkhaatassa monassa pathesu sattati.msabodhipakkhiyadhammesu tiisu vaa sikkhaasu sikkhato. ida~nca pubbabhaagapa.tipada.m gahetvaa vutta.m, tasmaa eva.m pubbabhaage sikkhato imaaya sikkhaaya munibhaava.m pattassa muninoti evamettha attho da.t.thabbo. ^b^sokaa na bhavanti taadino^eb^ti taadisassa khii.naasavamunino abbhantare i.t.thaviyogaadivatthukaa sokaa na santi. atha vaa ^b^taadino^eb^ti taadilakkha.nasamannaagatassa evaruupassa munino sokaa na bhavantiiti ayamettha attho. ^b^upasantassaa^eb^ti raagaadiina.m upasamena upasantassa. ^b^sadaa satiimato^eb^ti sativepullappattattaa niccakaala.m satiyaa avirahitassa ^a^P4.0802^ea^. ^b^aakaase antalikkhe^eb^ti antalikkhasa"nkhaate aakaase, na kasi.nugghaa.time, na pana ruupaparicchede. ^b^ca"nkamatipi ti.t.thatipii^eb^ti taasa.m bhikkhuniina.m katha.m ^a^M0.0068^ea^ sutvaa ``imaa bhikkhuniyo ma.m `ettakameva aya.m jaanaatii'ti avama~n~nanti, handa daani etaasa.m attano aanubhaava.m dassemii''ti dhammabahumaana.m uppaadetvaa abhi~n~naapaadaka.m catutthajjhaana.m samaapajjitvaa vu.t.thaaya evaruupa.m iddhipaa.tihaariya.m dassesi -- ``aakaase antalikkhe ca"nkamatipi...pe0... antaradhaayatipii''ti. tattha ^b^antaradhaayatipii^eb^ti antaradhaayatipi adassanampi gacchatiiti attho. ^b^ta~nceva udaana.m bha.nati a~n~na~nca bahu.m buddhavacana^eb^nti thero kira attano bhaatutherassa santike --
[21] ``paduma.m yathaa kokanuda.m sugandha.m,
[27] paato siyaa phullamaviitagandha.m.
[26] a"ngiirasa.m passa virocamaana.m,
[22] tapantamaadiccamivantalikkhe''ti.. (sa.m0 ni0 1.123).

[03]ima.m gaatha.m uddisaapetvaa cattaaro maase sajjhaayi. na ca pagu.na.m kattumasakkhi. tato na.m thero ``abhabbo tva.m imasmi.m saasane''ti vihaaraa nikka.d.dhaapesi, so rodamaano dvaarako.t.thake a.t.thaasi. atha bhagavaa buddhacakkhunaa veneyyasatte olokento ta.m disvaa vihaaracaarika.m caramaano viya tassa santika.m gantvaa ``cuu.lapanthaka, kasmaa rodasii''ti aaha. so tamattha.m aarocesi. athassa bhagavaa suddha.m pilotikakha.n.da.m datvaa ``ida.m `rajohara.na.m rajohara.na'nti parimajjaahii''ti ^a^V0.0061^ea^ aaha. so ``saadhuu''ti sampa.ticchitvaa attano nivaasa.t.thaane nisiiditvaa tassa ekamanta.m parimajji, parimajjita.t.thaana.m kaa.lakamahosi. so ``eva.m parisuddhampi naama vattha.m ima.m attabhaava.m nissaaya kaa.laka.m jaata''nti sa.mvega.m pa.tilabhitvaa vipassana.m aarabhi. athassa bhagavaa aaraddhaviiriyabhaava.m ~natvaa ``adhicetaso''ti ima.m obhaasagaatha.m abhaasi. thero gaathaapariyosaane arahatta.m paapu.ni. tasmaa thero pakatiyaava ima.m gaatha.m mamaayati, so ta.m imissaa gaathaaya mamaayanabhaava.m jaanaapetu.m ^a^P4.0803^ea^ ta.myeva bha.nati. a~n~na~nca antarantaraa aaharitvaa bahu.m buddhavacana.m. tena vutta.m -- ``ta~nceva udaana.m bha.nati, a~n~na~nca bahu.m buddhavacana''nti.

[03] 156^b^.^eb^ ^b^ekato upasampannaayaa^eb^ti ^a^M0.0069^ea^ bhikkhunisa"nghe upasampannaaya, bhikkhusa"nghe pana upasampanna.m ovadantassa paacittiya.m. sesamettha uttaanameva. idampi ca padasodhammasamu.t.thaanameva.
[06] attha"ngatasikkhaapada.m dutiya.m.

[03] 162^b^.^eb^ tatiyasikkhaapade -- ^b^a~n~natra samayaa ovadati aapatti paacittiyassaa^eb^tiaadiisu a.t.thahi garudhammehi ovadantasseva paacittiya.m, a~n~nena dhammena dukka.tanti veditabba.m. ^b^ekatoupasampannaayaa^eb^ti bhikkhunisa"nghe upasampannaaya, bhikkhusa"nghe upasampannaaya pana ovadato paacittiyameva. ito parampi yattha yattha ``ekatoupasampannaa''ti vuccati, sabbattha ayameva attho da.t.thabbo. sesa.m uttaanameva.
[03]kathinasamu.t.thaana.m -- kaayavaacato, kaayavaacaacittato ca samu.t.thaati, kiriya.m, nosa~n~naavimokkha.m, acittaka.m, pa.n.nattivajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, ticitta.m, tivedananti.
[06] bhikkhunupassayasikkhaapada.m tatiya.m.

[03]ida.m panettha mahaapaccariya.m vutta.m paki.n.naka.m -- asammato ce bhikkhu attha"ngate suuriye bhikkhunupassaya.m upasa"nkamitvaa a.t.thahi garudhammehi ovadati, tii.ni paacittiyaani. a~n~nena dhammena ovadato dve dukka.taani, eka.m paacittiya.m. katha.m? asammatamuulaka.m dukka.ta.m, upassaya.m gantvaa a~n~nena dhammena ovadanamuulaka.m dukka.ta.m, attha"ngate suuriye ovadanamuulaka.m paacittiyanti. sammatassa attha"ngate suuriye tattha gantvaa a.t.thahi garudhammehi ovadantassa ekaa anaapatti, dve paacittiyaani. katha.m? sammatattaa ^a^V0.0062^ea^ anaapatti, attha"ngate suuriye ovadanamuulaka.m eka.m, gantvaa garudhammehi ovadanamuulaka.m ekanti dve paacittiyaani. tasseva a~n~nena dhammena ovadato ekaa anaapatti, eka.m dukka.ta.m, eka.m paacittiya.m. katha.m? sammatattaa anaapatti, gantvaa a~n~nena dhammena ovadanamuulaka.m dukka.ta.m, attha"ngate suuriye ovadanamuulaka.m paacittiyanti. divaa ^a^P4.0804^ea^ ^a^M0.0070^ea^ pana gantvaa ovadato sammatassa ca asammatassa ca ratti.m ovadanamuulaka.m eka.m paacittiya.m apanetvaa avasesaa aapattaanaapattiyo veditabbaati.
[06] paki.n.nakakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 164^b^.^eb^ catutthasikkhaapade -- ^b^na bahukataa^eb^ti na katabahumaanaa, na dhamme bahumaana.m katvaa ovadantiiti adhippaayo. ^b^``bhikkhunovaadaka.m ava.n.na.m kattukaamo''^eb^tiaadiina.m ujjhaapanake vuttanayenevattho veditabbo.

[03]^b^upasampanna.m sa"nghena asammata^eb^nti ettha asammato naama sammatena vaa sa"nghena vaa bhaara.m katvaa .thapito veditabbo. ^b^anupasampanna.m sammata.m vaa asammata.m vaa^eb^ti ettha pana bhikkhukaale sammuti.m labhitvaa saama.nerabhuumiya.m .thito sammato, sammatena vaa sa"nghena vaa .thapito bahussuto saama.nero asammatoti veditabbo. sesa.m vuttanayattaa uttaanameva.

[03]tisamu.t.thaana.m -- kaayacittato vaacaacittato kaayavaacaacittato ca samu.t.thaati, kiriya.m, sa~n~naavimokkha.m, sacittaka.m, lokavajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, akusalacitta.m, dukkhavedananti.
[06] aamisasikkhaapada.m catuttha.m.

[03] 169^b^.^eb^ pa~ncamasikkhaapade -- ^b^visikhaayaa^eb^ti rathikaaya. ^b^pi.n.daaya caratii^eb^ti nibaddhacaaravasena abhi.nha.m carati. ^b^sandi.t.thaa^eb^ti sandi.t.thamittaa ahesu.m. sesamettha padato uttaanattha.m, vinicchayato ciivarapa.tiggaha.nasikkhaapade ^a^V0.0063^ea^ vuttanayeneva veditabba.m saddhi.m samu.t.thaanaadiihi. tatra hi bhikkhu pa.tiggaahako, idha bhikkhunii, aya.m viseso. sesa.m taadisamevaati.
[06] ciivaradaanasikkhaapada.m pa~ncama.m.

[03] 175^b^.^eb^ cha.t.thasikkhaapade ^a^M0.0071^ea^ -- ^b^udaayii^eb^ti laa.ludaayii. ^b^pa.t.tho^eb^ti pa.tibalo, nipu.no ceva samattho caati vutta.m hoti. ^b^a~n~nataraa bhikkhunii^eb^ti tasseva puraa.nadutiyikaa. ^b^pa.tibhaanacitta^eb^nti attano pa.tibhaanena katacitta.m, so kira ciivara.m rajitvaa tassa majjhe naanaava.n.nehi vippakatamethuna.m itthipurisaruupamakaasi. tena vutta.m -- ``majjhe pa.tibhaanacitta.m vu.t.thaapetvaa''ti. ^b^yathaasa.mha.ta^eb^nti yathaasa.mharitameva.

[03] 176^b^.^eb^ ^b^ciivara^eb^nti ya.m nivaasitu.m vaa paarupitu.m vaa sakkaa hoti, eva~nhi mahaapaccariyaadiisu ^a^P4.0805^ea^ vutta.m. ^b^saya.m sibbatii^eb^ti ettha sibbissaamiiti vicaarentassaapi chindantassaapi dukka.ta.m, sibbantassa pana paacittiya.m. ^b^aaraapathe aaraapathe^eb^ti suuci.m pavesetvaa pavesetvaa niihara.ne. sace pana sakalasuuci.m aniiharanto diighasuttappavesanattha.m satakkhattumpi vijjhitvaa niiharati, ekameva paacittiya.m. ^b^saki.m aa.natto^eb^ti saki.m ``ciivara.m sibbaa''ti vutto. ^b^bahukampi sibbatii^eb^ti sacepi sabba.m suucikamma.m pariyosaapetvaa ciivara.m ni.t.thaapeti, ekameva paacittiya.m. atha pana ``imasmi.m ciivare kattabbakamma.m tava bhaaro''ti vutto karoti, aa.nattassa aaraapathe aaraapathe ekameka.m paacittiya.m, aa.naapakassa ekavaacaaya sambahulaanipi. punappuna.m aa.nattiya.m pana vattabbameva natthi.

[03]yepi sace aacariyupajjhaayesu attano ~naatikaana.m ciivara.m sibbantesu tesa.m nissitakaa ``aacariyupajjhaayavatta.m vaa kathinavatta.m vaa karomaa''ti sibbanti, tesampi aaraapathaga.nanaaya aapattiyo. aacariyupajjhaayaa attano ~naatikaana.m ciivara.m antevaasikehi sibbaapenti, aacariyupajjhaayaana.m dukka.ta.m, antevaasikaana.m paacittiya.m. antevaasikaa attano ~naatikaana.m aacariyupajjhaayehi sibbaapenti, tatraapi eseva nayo. antevaasikaanampi aacariyupajjhaayaanampi ~naatikaaya ciivara.m hoti, aacariyupajjhaayaa pana antevaasike va~ncetvaa sibbaapenti, ubhinnampi dukka.ta.m. kasmaa? antevaasikaana.m a~n~naatikasa~n~naaya sibbitattaa ^a^V0.0064^ea^, itaresa.m akappiye niyojitattaa. tasmaa ``ida.m te maatu ciivara.m, ida.m bhaginiyaa''ti aacikkhitvaa sibbaapetabba.m.

[03] 179^b^.^eb^ ^b^a~n~na.m^eb^ ^a^M0.0072^ea^ ^b^parikkhaara^eb^nti ya.mki~nci upaahanatthavikaadi.m. sesa.m uttaanameva. chasamu.t.thaana.m -- kiriya.m, nosa~n~naavimokkha.m, acittaka.m, pa.n.nattivajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, ticitta.m, tivedananti.
[06] ciivarasibbanasikkhaapada.m cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 181^b^.^eb^ sattamasikkhaapade -- ^b^pacchaa gacchantiina.m coraa acchindi.msuu^eb^ti pacchaa gacchantiina.m pattaciivara.m coraa hari.msu. ^b^duusesu^eb^nti taa bhikkhuniyo coraa duusayi.msu, siilavinaasa.m paapayi.msuuti attho ^a^P4.0806^ea^.

[03] 182-3^b^.^eb^ ^b^sa.mvidhaayaa^eb^ti sa.mvidahitvaa, gamanakaale sa"nketa.m katvaati attho. ^b^kukku.tasampaade^eb^ti ettha yasmaa gaamaa nikkhamitvaa kukku.to padasaava a~n~na.m gaama.m gacchati, aya.m kukku.tasampaadoti vuccati. tatraaya.m vacanattho -- sampadanti etthaati ^b^sampaado^eb^. ke sampadanti? kukku.taa. kukku.taana.m sampaado ^b^kukku.tasampaado^eb^. atha vaa sampaadoti gamana.m, kukku.taana.m sampaado ettha atthiitipi kukku.tasampaado. kukku.tasampaate itipi paa.tho, tattha yassa gaamassa gehacchadanapi.t.thito kukku.to uppatitvaa a~n~nassa gehacchadanapi.t.thiya.m patati, aya.m kukku.tasampaatoti vuccati. vacanattho panettha vuttanayeneva veditabbo. dvidhaa vuttappakaaropi cesa gaamo accaasanno hoti, upacaaro na labbhati. yasmi.m pana gaame paccuuse vassantassa kukku.tassa saddo anantare gaame suyyati, taadisehi gaamehi sampu.n.nara.t.the gaamantare gaamantare paacittiyanti a.t.thakathaaya.m vutta.m. ki~ncaapi vutta.m, ``gaamantare gaamantare aapatti paacittiyassaa''ti vacanato pana sacepi ratanamattantaro gaamo hoti, yo tassa manussehi .thapitaupacaaro, ta.m okkamantassa aapattiyeva.

[03]tatraaya.m aapattivinicchayo -- sa.mvidhaanakaale hi sace ubhopi bhikkhunupassaye vaa antaraaraame vaa aasanasaalaaya vaa titthiyaseyyaaya vaa .thatvaa sa.mvidahanti, anaapatti kappiyabhuumi ^a^V0.0065^ea^ kiraaya.m. tasmaa ettha sa.mvidahanapaccayaa ^a^M0.0073^ea^ dukka.taapatti.m na vadanti, gacchantassa yathaavatthukameva. sace pana antogaame bhikkhunupassayadvaare rathikaaya a~n~nesu vaa catukkasi"nghaa.takahatthisaalaadiisu sa.mvidahanti, bhikkhuno aapatti dukka.tassa. eva.m sa.mvidahitvaa gaamato nikkhamanti, nikkhamane anaapatti, anantaragaamassa upacaarokkamane pana bhikkhuno paacittiya.m. tatraapi ``pa.thamapaade dukka.ta.m, dutiyapaade paacittiya''nti mahaapaccariya.m vutta.m. gaamato nikkhamitvaa pana yaava anantaragaamassa upacaara.m na okkamanti ^a^P4.0807^ea^, etthantare sa.mvidahitepi bhikkhuno dukka.ta.m, anantaragaamassa upacaarokkamane purimanayeneva aapatti. sace duura.m gantukaamaa honti, gaamuupacaaraga.nanaaya okkamane okkamane aapatti, tassa tassa pana gaamassa atikkamane anaapatti. sace pana bhikkhunii ``asuka.m naama gaama.m gamissaamii''ti upassayato nikkhamati, bhikkhupi tameva gaama.m sandhaaya ``asuka.m naama gaama.m gamissaamii''ti vihaarato nikkhamati. atha dvepi gaamadvaare samaagantvaa ``tumhe kuhi.m gacchatha, asuka.m naama gaama.m tumhe kuhinti, mayampi tatthevaa''ti vatvaa ``ehi daani, gacchaamaa''ti sa.mvidhaaya gacchanti, anaapatti. kasmaa? pubbameva gamissaamaati nikkhantattaati mahaapaccariya.m vutta.m. ta.m neva paa.liyaa na sesaa.t.thakathaaya sameti.

[03]^b^addhayojane addhayojane^eb^ti ekameka.m addhayojana.m atikkamantassa idaani atikkamissatiiti pa.thamapaade dukka.ta.m, dutiyapaade paacittiya.m. imasmi~nhi naye atikkamane aapatti, okkamane anaapatti.

[03] 184^b^.^eb^ ^b^bhikkhu sa.mvidahatii^eb^ti nagaradvaare vaa rathikaaya vaa bhikkhuni.m disvaa ``asuka.m gaama.m naama gatapubbatthaa''ti vadati, ``naamhi ayya gatapubbaa''ti ``ehi gacchaamaa''ti vaa ``sve aha.m gamissaami, tvampi aagaccheyyaasii''ti vaa vadati. ^b^bhikkhunii sa.mvidahatii^eb^ti gaamantare cetiyavandanattha.m gaamato nikkhamanta.m bhikkhu.m disvaa ``ayya kuhi.m gacchathaa''ti vadati. ``asuka.m naama gaama.m cetiyavandanattha''nti. ``ahampi ayya aagacchaamii''ti eva.m bhikkhuniiyeva sa.mvidahati, na bhikkhu.

[03] 185^b^.^eb^ ^b^visa"nketenaa^eb^ti ettha ``purebhatta.m gacchissaamaa''ti vatvaa pacchaabhatta.m gacchanti, ``ajja vaa gamissaamaa''ti vatvaa sve gacchanti. eva.m kaalavisa"nketeyeva ^a^M0.0074^ea^ anaapatti, dvaaravisa"nkete pana maggavisa"nkete vaa satipi aapattiyeva. ^b^aapadaasuu^eb^ti ra.t.thabhede cakkasamaaru.lhaa janapadaa pariyaayanti evaruupaasu aapadaasu anaapatti. sesa.m uttaanamevaati.

[03]catusamu.t.thaana.m ^a^V0.0066^ea^ -- kaayato kaayavaacato kaayacittato kaayavaacaacittato ca samu.t.thaati, kiriya.m, nosa~n~naavimokkha.m, acittaka.m, pa.n.nattivajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, ticitta.m, tivedananti.
[06] sa.mvidhaanasikkhaapada.m sattama.m.

[03] 188^b^.^eb^ a.t.thamasikkhaapade ^a^P4.0808^ea^ -- ^b^sa.mvidhaayaa^eb^ti lokassaadamittasanthavavasena kii.laapurekkhaaraa sa.mvidahitvaa. ^b^uddha.mgaamini^eb^nti uddha.m nadiyaa pa.tisota.m gacchanti.m. yasmaa pana yo uddha.m javanato ujjavanikaaya naavaaya kii.lati, so ``uddha.mgaamini.m abhiruhatii''ti vuccati. tenassa padabhaajane atthameva dassetu.m ``ujjavanikaayaa''ti vutta.m. ^b^adhogaamini^eb^nti adho anusota.m gacchanti.m. yasmaa pana yo adho javanato ojavanikaaya naavaaya kii.lati, so ``adhogaamini.m abhiruhatii''ti vuccati. tenassaapi padabhaajane atthameva dassetu.m ``ojavanikaayaa''ti vutta.m. tattha ya.m titthasampa.tipaadanattha.m uddha.m vaa adho vaa haranti, ettha anaapatti. ^b^tiriya.m tara.naayaa^eb^ti upayogatthe nissakkavacana.m.

[03] 189^b^.^eb^ ^b^gaamantare gaamantare^eb^ti ettha yassaa nadiyaa eka.m tiira.m kukku.tasampaadagaamehi nirantara.m, eka.m agaamaka.m ara~n~na.m, tassaa sagaamakatiirapassena gamanakaale gaamantaraga.nanaaya paacittiyaani, agaamakatiirapassena gamanakaale addhayojanaga.nanaaya. yaa pana yojanavitthataa hoti, tassaa majjhena gamanepi addhayojanaga.nanaaya paacittiyaani veditabbaani. ^b^anaapatti tiriya.m tara.naayaa^eb^ti ettha na kevala.m nadiyaa, yopi mahaatitthapa.t.tanato taamalitti.m vaa suva.n.nabhuumi.m vaa gacchati, tassaapi anaapatti. sabbaa.t.thakathaasu hi nadiya.myeva aapatti vicaaritaa, na samudde.

[03] 191^b^.^eb^ ^b^visa"nketenaa^eb^ti ^a^M0.0075^ea^ idhaapi kaalavisa"nketeneva anaapatti, titthavisa"nketena pana naavaavisa"nketena vaa gacchantassa aapattiyeva. sesa.m pa.thamasikkhaapadasadisameva saddhi.m samu.t.thaanaadiihiiti.
[06] naavaabhiruhanasikkhaapada.m a.t.thama.m.

[03] 192^b^.^eb^ navamasikkhaapade ^a^V0.0067^ea^ -- ^b^mahaanaage ti.t.thamaane^eb^ti bhummatthe upayogavacana.m, mahaanaagesu ti.t.thamaanesuuti attho. atha vaa mahaanaage ti.t.thamaane ``adisvaa''ti ayamettha paa.thaseso da.t.thabbo. itarathaa hi attho na yujjati. ^b^antaraakathaa^eb^ti avasaana.m appatvaa aarambhassa ca avasaanassa ca vemajjha.t.thaana.m pattakathaa. ^b^vippakataa^eb^ti kayiramaanaa hoti. ^b^sacca.m mahaanaagaa kho tayaa gahapatii^eb^ti addhacchikena olokayamaanaa ^a^P4.0809^ea^ there pavisante disvaa tehi sutabhaava.m ~natvaa evamaaha.

[03] 194^b^.^eb^ ^b^bhikkhuniparipaacita^eb^nti bhikkhuniyaa paripaacita.m, gu.nappakaasanena nipphaadita.m; laddhabba.m katanti attho. padabhaajane panassa bhikkhuni~nca tassaa paripaacanaakaara~nca dassetu.m ``bhikkhunii naama ubhatosa"nghe upasampannaa, paripaaceti naama pubbe adaatukaamaana''ntiaadi vutta.m. ^b^pubbe gihisamaarambhaa^eb^ti ettha ^b^pubbe^eb^ti pa.thama.m. ^b^samaarambho^eb^ti samaaraddha.m vuccati, pa.tiyaaditasseta.m adhivacana.m. gihiina.m samaarambho gihisamaarambho. bhikkhuniyaa paripaacanato pa.thamameva ya.m gihiina.m pa.tiyaadita.m bhatta.m, tato a~n~natra ta.m pi.n.dapaata.m .thapetvaa a~n~na.m bhu~njantassa aapatti, ta.m pana bhu~njantassa anaapattiiti vutta.m hoti. padabhaajane pana yasmaa ~naatakapavaaritehi bhikkhussatthaaya asamaaraddhopi pi.n.dapaato atthato samaaraddhova hoti, yathaasukha.m aaharaapetabbato, tasmaa bya~njana.m anaadiyitvaa atthameva dassetu.m ``gihisamaarambho naama ~naatakaa vaa honti pavaaritaa vaa''ti vutta.m.

[03] 195^b^.^eb^ ^b^pakatipa.tiyatta^eb^nti ^a^M0.0076^ea^ pakatiyaa tasseva bhikkhuno atthaaya pa.tiyaadita.m hoti ``therassa dassaamaa''ti. mahaapaccariya.m pana ``tassa a~n~nassaa''ti avatvaa ``bhikkhuuna.m dassaamaati pa.tiyatta.m hotii''ti avisesena vutta.m.

[03] 197^b^.^eb^ ^b^pa~nca bhojanaani .thapetvaa sabbattha anaapattii^eb^ti yaagukhajjakaphalaaphale sabbattha bhikkhuniparipaacitepi anaapatti. sesa.m uttaanameva. pa.thamapaaraajikasamu.t.thaana.m -- kaayacittato samu.t.thaati, kiriya.m, sa~n~naavimokkha.m, sacittaka.m, pa.n.nattivajja.m, kaayakamma.m, ticitta.m, tivedananti.
[06] paripaacitasikkhaapada.m navama.m.

[03] 198^b^.^eb^ dasamasikkhaapade ^a^V0.0068^ea^ -- sabbo paa.liattho ca vinicchayo ca dutiyaaniyate vuttanayeneva veditabbo. ida~nhi sikkhaapada.m dutiyaaniyatena ca upari upanandhassa catutthasikkhaapadena ca saddhi.m ekapariccheda.m, a.t.thuppattivasena pana visu.m pa~n~nattanti.
[06] rahonisajjasikkhaapada.m dasama.m.
[06] samatto va.n.nanaakkamena bhikkhunivaggo tatiyo.

[03] 203^b^.^eb^ bhojanavaggassa pa.thamasikkhaapade -- ^b^aavasathapi.n.do^eb^ti aavasathe pi.n.do. samantaa parikkhitta.m addhikagilaanagabbhinipabbajitaana.m ^a^P4.0810^ea^ yathaanuruupa.m pa~n~nattama~ncapii.tha.m anekagabbhapamukhapariccheda.m aavasatha.m katvaa tattha pu~n~nakaamataaya pi.n.do pa~n~natto hoti, yaagubhattabhesajjaadi sabba.m tesa.m tesa.m daanatthaaya .thapita.m hotiiti attho. ^b^hiyyopii^eb^ti svepi. ^b^apasakkantii^eb^ti ^a^M0.0077^ea^ apagacchanti. ^b^manussaa ujjhaayantii^eb^ti titthiye apassantaa ``titthiyaa kuhi.m gataa''``ime passitvaa pakkantaa''ti sutvaa ujjhaayanti. ^b^kukkuccaayanto^eb^ti kukkucca.m karonto, akappiyasa~n~na.m uppaadentoti attho.

[03] 206^b^.^eb^ ^b^sakkoti tamhaa aavasathaa pakkamitu^eb^nti addhayojana.m vaa yojana.m vaa gantu.m sakkoti. ^b^na sakkotii^eb^ti ettakameva na sakkoti. ^b^anodissaa^eb^ti imesa.myeva vaa ettakaana.myeva vaati eka.m paasa.n.da.m anuddisitvaa sabbesa.m pa~n~natto hoti. ^b^yaavadattho^eb^ti bhojanampi ettakanti aparicchinditvaa yaavadattho pa~n~natto hoti. ^b^saki.m bhu~njitabba^eb^nti ekadivasa.m bhu~njitabba.m, dutiyadivasato pa.t.thaaya pa.tiggaha.ne dukka.ta.m, ajjhohaare ajjhohaare paacittiya.m.

[03]aya.m ^a^V0.0069^ea^ panettha vinicchayo -- ekakulena vaa naanaakulehi vaa ekato hutvaa ekasmi.m .thaane vaa naanaa.thaanesu vaa ``ajja ekasmi.m; sve ekasmi''nti eva.m aniyamita.t.thaane vaa pa~n~natta.m ekasmi.m .thaane ekadivasa.m bhu~njitvaa dutiyadivase tasmi.m .thaane a~n~nasmi.m vaa bhu~njitu.m na va.t.tati. naanaakulehi pana naanaa.thaanesu pa~n~natta.m ekasmi.m .thaane ekadivasa.m bhu~njitvaa dutiyadivase a~n~nattha bhu~njitu.m va.t.tati. pa.tipaa.ti.m pana khepetvaa puna aadito pa.t.thaaya bhu~njitu.m na va.t.tatiiti mahaapaccariya.m vutta.m. ekapuuganaanaapuugaekagaamanaanaagaamesupi eseva nayo. yopi ekakulassa vaa naanaakulaana.m vaa ekato pa~n~natto ta.n.dulaadiina.m abhaavena antarantaraa chijjati, sopi na bhu~njitabbo. sace pana ``na sakkoma daatu''nti upacchinditvaa puna kalyaa.nacitte uppanne daatu.m aarabhanti, eta.m puna ekadivasa.m bhu~njitu.m va.t.tatiiti mahaapaccariya.m vutta.m.

[03] 208^b^.^eb^ ^b^anaapatti gilaanassaa^eb^ti gilaanassa anuvasitvaa bhu~njantassa anaapatti. ^b^gacchanto vaa^eb^ti yo gacchanto antaraamagge ekadivasa.m gata.t.thaane ca ekadivasa.m bhu~njati, tassaapi anaapatti. aagacchantepi eseva nayo. gantvaa paccaagacchantopi antaraamagge ekadivasa.m aagata.t.thaane ca ekadivasa.m bhu~njitu.m labhati. gacchissaamiiti bhu~njitvaa nikkhantassa ^a^P4.0811^ea^ nadii vaa puurati coraadibhaya.m vaa hoti, so nivattitvaa khemabhaava.m ~natvaa gacchanto puna ekadivasa.m bhu~njitu.m labhatiiti sabbamida.m mahaapaccariyaadiisu vutta.m ^a^M0.0078^ea^. ^b^odissa pa~n~natto hotii^eb^ti bhikkhuuna.myeva atthaaya uddisitvaa pa~n~natto hoti. ^b^na yaavadattho^eb^ti yaavadattha.m pa~n~natto na hoti, thoka.m thoka.m labbhati, taadisa.m niccampi bhu~njitu.m va.t.tati. ^b^pa~nca bhojanaani .thapetvaa sabbatthaa^eb^ti yaagukhajjakaphalaaphalaadibhede sabbattha anaapatti. yaaguaadiini hi niccampi bhu~njitu.m va.t.tati. sesa.m uttaanameva. e.lakalomasamu.t.thaana.m -- kaayato ca kaayacittato ca samu.t.thaati, kiriya.m, nosa~n~naavimokkha.m, acittaka.m, pa.n.nattivajja.m, kaayakamma.m ticitta.m, tivedananti.
[06] aavasathapi.n.dasikkhaapada.m pa.thama.m.
