[03]sace pa.tiggaha.nuupaga.m bhaara.m dve tayo saama.neraa denti, ekena vaa balavataa ukkhitta.m dve tayo bhikkhuu ga.nhanti, va.t.tati. ma~ncassa vaa pii.thassa vaa paade telagha.ta.m vaa phaa.nitagha.ta.m vaa navaniitagha.ta.m vaa laggenti, bhikkhussa ma~ncepi pii.thepi nisiiditu.m va.t.tati. uggahitaka.m naama na hoti.

[03]naagadantake vaa a"nkusake vaa dve telagha.taa laggitaa honti, upari pa.tiggahitako he.t.thaa appa.tiggahitako, uparima.m gahetu.m va.t.tati. he.t.thaa pa.tiggahitako upari appa.tiggahitako, uparima.m gahetvaa itara.m ga.nhato uparimo uggahitako hoti. he.t.thaama~nce appa.tiggahitaka.m telathaalaka.m hoti, ta.m ce sammajjanto sammu~njaniyaa gha.t.teti, uggahitaka.m na hoti. pa.tiggahitaka.m ga.nhissaamiiti appa.tiggahitaka.m gahetvaa ~natvaa puna .thapeti, uggahitaka.m na hoti. bahi ^a^V0.0104^ea^ niiharitvaa sa~njaanaati, bahi a.t.thapetvaa haritvaa tattheva .thapetabba.m, natthi doso. sace pana pubbe vivaritvaa .thapita.m na pidahitabba.m; yathaa pubbe .thita.m tatheva .thapetabba.m. sace bahi .thapeti, puna na chupitabba.m.

[03]he.t.thaapaasaada.m orohanto nisse.nimajjhe sa~njaanaati, anokaasattaa uddha.m vaa adho vaa haritvaa .thapetabba.m. pa.tiggahitake telaadimhi ka.n.naka.m u.t.theti, si"ngiveraadimhi ghanacu.n.na.m, ta.msamu.t.thaanameva ^a^P4.0850^ea^ naameta.m, puna pa.tiggaha.nakicca.m natthi.

[03]taala.m vaa naa.likera.m vaa aaru.lho yottena phalapi.n.di.m otaaretvaa upari .thitova ga.nhathaati vadati, na gahetabba.m. sace a~n~no bhuumiya.m .thito yottapaasake gahetvaa ukkhipitvaa deti, va.t.tati. saphala.m mahaasaakha.m kappiya.m kaaretvaa pa.tigga.nhaati, phalaani pa.tiggahitaaneva honti, yathaasukha.m paribhu~njitu.m va.t.tati.

[03]antovatiya.m .thatvaa vati.m chinditvaa ucchu.m vaa timbaruusaka.m vaa denti, hatthapaase sati va.t.tati. vatida.n.dakesu appaharitvaa niggata.m ga.nhantassa va.t.tati. paharitvaa niggate a.t.thakathaasu doso na dassito. maya.m pana ya.m ^a^M0.0116^ea^ .thaana.m paha.ta.m, tato saya.mpatitameva hotiiti takkayaama. tasmimpi a.t.thatvaa gacchante yujjati, su"nkaghaatato pava.t.tetvaa bahipatitabha.n.da.m viya. vati.m vaa paakaara.m vaa la"nghaapetvaa denti, sace pana na puthulo paakaaro, antopaakaare ca bahipaakaare ca .thitassa hatthapaaso pahoti, hatthasatampi uddha.m gantvaa sampatta.m gahetu.m va.t.tati.
[03]bhikkhu gilaana.m saama.nera.m khandhena vahati, so phalaaphala.m disvaa gahetvaa khandhe nisinnova deti, va.t.tati. aparo bhikkhu.m vahanto khandhe nisinnassa bhikkhuno deti, va.t.tatiyeva.

[03]bhikkhu phalini.m saakha.m chaayatthaaya gahetvaa gacchati, phalaani khaaditu.m citte uppanne pa.tiggahaapetvaa khaaditu.m va.t.tati. macchikavaara.nattha.m kappiya.m kaaretvaa pa.tigga.nhaati, khaaditukaamo ce hoti, muulapa.tiggaha.nameva va.t.tati, khaadantassa natthi doso.

[03]bhikkhu pa.tiggaha.naaraha.m bha.n.da.m manussaana.m yaane .thapetvaa magga.m gacchati, yaana.m kaddame laggati, daharo cakka.m gahetvaa ukkhipati, va.t.tati, uggahitaka.m naama na hoti. naavaaya .thapetvaa naava.m arittena vaa paajeti, hatthena vaa ka.d.dhati, va.t.tati. u.lumpepi eseva nayo. caa.tiya.m ^a^V0.0105^ea^ ku.n.dake vaa .thapetvaapi ta.m anupasampannena gaahaapetvaa anupasampanna.m baahaaya.m gahetvaa taritu.m va.t.tati. tasmimpi asati anupasampanna.m gaahaapetvaa ta.m baahaaya.m gahetvaa taritu.m va.t.tati.

[03]upaasakaa gamikabhikkhuuna.m paatheyyata.n.dule ^a^P4.0851^ea^ denti. saama.neraa bhikkhuuna.m ta.n.dule gahetvaa attano ta.n.dule gahetu.m na sakkonti, bhikkhuu tesa.m ta.n.dule ga.nhanti. saama.neraa attanaa gahitata.n.dulesu khii.nesu itarehi ta.n.dulehi yaagu.m pacitvaa sabbesa.m pattaani pa.tipaa.tiyaa .thapetvaa yaagu.m aakiranti. pa.n.dito saama.nero attano patta.m gahetvaa therassa deti, therassa patta.m anutherassaati eva.m sabbaani parivatteti, sabbehi saama.nerassa santaka.m bhutta.m hoti, va.t.tati.

[03]sacepi saama.nero apa.n.dito hoti, attano patte yaagu.m sayameva paatu.m aarabhati, ``aavuso tuyha.m yaagu.m mayha.m dehii''ti eva.m therehi pa.tipaa.tiyaa yaacitvaapi pivitu.m va.t.tati, sabbehi saama.nerassa santakameva ^a^M0.0117^ea^ bhutta.m hoti, neva uggahitapaccayaa na sannidhipaccayaa vajja.m phusanti. ettha pana maataapituuna.m telaadiini chaayaadiina.m atthaaya saakhaadiini ca harantaana.m imesa~nca viseso na dissati. tasmaa kaara.na.m upaparikkhitabba.m.

[03]saama.nero bhatta.m pacitukaamo ta.n.dule dhovitvaa niccaaletu.m na sakkoti. bhikkhunaa ta.n.dule ca bhaajana~nca pa.tiggahetvaa ta.n.dule dhovitvaa niccaaletvaa bhaajana.m uddhana.m aaropetabba.m, aggi na kaatabbo, pakkakaale vivaritvaa pakkabhaavo jaanitabbo. sace duppakka.m hoti, paakatthaaya pidahitu.m na va.t.tati. rajassa vaa chaarikaaya vaa apatanatthaaya va.t.tati, pakkakaale aaropetumpi bhu~njitumpi va.t.tati, puna pa.tiggaha.nakicca.m natthi.

[03]saama.nero pa.tibalo pacitu.m, kha.no panassa natthi, katthaci gantukaamo. bhikkhunaa sata.n.dulodakabhaajana.m pa.tiggahetvaa uddhana.m aaropetvaa aggi.m jaaletvaa gacchaahiiti vattabbo. tato para.m purimanayeneva sabba.m kaatu.m va.t.tati.

[03]bhikkhu yaaguatthaaya suddha.m bhaajana.m aaropetvaa udaka.m taapeti, va.t.tati. tatte udake saama.nero ta.n.dule pakkhipati, tato pa.t.thaaya bhikkhunaa aggi na kaatabbo. pakkayaagu.m pa.tiggahetvaa paatu.m va.t.tati.

[03]saama.nero yaagu.m pacati, hatthakukkuccako bhikkhu kii.lanto bhaajana.m aamasati, pidhaana.m aamasati ^a^V0.0106^ea^, uggata.m phe.na.m chinditvaa harati, tasseva paatu.m na va.t.tati, durupaci.n.na.m naama hoti. sace pana dabbi.m vaa u.lu"nka.m vaa gahetvaa anukkhipanto aalu.leti, sabbesa.m na va.t.tati, saamapaaka~nceva ^a^P4.0852^ea^ hoti durupaci.n.na~nca. sace ukkhipati, uggahitakampi hoti.

[03]bhikkhunaa pi.n.daaya caritvaa aadhaarake patto .thapito hoti, tatra ce a~n~no lolabhikkhu kii.lanto patta.m aamasati, pattapidhaana.m aamasati, tasseva tato laddha.m bhatta.m na va.t.tati. sace pana patta.m ukkhipitvaa .thapeti, sabbesa.m na va.t.tati. tatthajaatakaphalaani saakhaaya vaa valliyaa vaa gahetvaa caaleti, tasseva tato laddha.m phala.m na va.t.tati, durupaci.n.nadukka.ta~nca aapajjati. phalarukkha.m pana apassayitu.m vaa tattha ka.n.dake vaa bandhitu.m va.t.tati, durupaci.n.na.m na hotiiti mahaapaccariya.m vutta.m.

[03]ara~n~ne ^a^M0.0118^ea^ patita.m pana ambaphalaadi.m disvaa saama.nerassa dassaamiiti aaharitvaa daatu.m va.t.tati. siihavighaasaadi.m disvaapi saama.nerassa dassaamiiti pa.tiggahetvaa vaa appa.tiggahetvaa vaa aaharitvaa daatu.m va.t.tati. sace pana sakkoti vitakka.m sodhetu.m, tato laddha.m khaaditumpi va.t.tati, neva aamakama.msapa.tiggaha.napaccayaa na uggahitakapaccayaa vajja.m phusati.

[03]maataapituuna.m atthaaya telaadiini gahetvaa gacchato antaraamagge byaadhi uppajjati, tato ya.m icchati, ta.m pa.tiggahetvaa paribhu~njitu.m va.t.tati. sace pana muulepi pa.tiggahita.m hoti, puna pa.tiggaha.nakicca.m natthi. maataapituuna.m ta.n.dule aaharitvaa deti, te tatoyeva yaaguaadiini sampaadetvaa tassa denti, va.t.tati sannidhipaccayaa vaa uggahitakapaccayaa vaa doso natthi.

[03]bhikkhu pidahitvaa udaka.m taapeti, yaava parikkhayaa paribhu~njitu.m va.t.tati. sace panettha chaarikaa patati, pa.tiggahetabba.m. diighasa.n.daasena thaalaka.m gahetvaa tela.m pacantassa chaarikaa patati, hatthena amu~ncanteneva pacitvaa otaaretvaa pa.tiggahetabba.m. sace a"ngaaraapi daaruuni vaa pa.tiggahetvaa .thapitaani, muulapa.tiggaha.nameva va.t.tati.

[03]bhikkhu ucchu.m khaadati, saama.nero ``mayhampi dethaa''ti vadati. ``ito chinditvaa ga.nhaa''ti vutto ga.nhaati, avasese puna pa.tiggaha.nakicca.m natthi. gu.lapi.n.daka.m khaadantassaapi eseva nayo. vuttokaasato chinditvaa gahitaavasesa~nhi ajahitapa.tiggaha.nameva hoti.

[03]bhikkhu ^a^V0.0107^ea^ gu.la.m bhaajento pa.tiggahetvaa ko.t.thaase karoti, bhikkhuupi saama.neraapi aagantvaa ekagaha.neneva ekameka.m ko.t.thaasa.m ga.nhanti ^a^P4.0853^ea^, gahitaavasesa.m pa.tiggahitameva hoti. sace lolasaama.nero ga.nhitvaa ga.nhitvaa puna .thapeti, tassa gahitaavasesa.m appa.tiggahitaka.m hoti.
[03]bhikkhu dhuumava.t.ti.m pa.tiggahetvaa dhuuma.m pivati, mukha~nca ka.n.tho ca manosilaaya litto viya hoti, yaavakaalika.m bhu~njitu.m va.t.tati, yaavakaalikena yaavajiivikasa.msagge doso natthi.

[03]patta.m ^a^M0.0119^ea^ vaa rajana.m vaa pacantassa ka.n.nanaasamukhacchiddehi dhuumo pavisati, byaadhipaccayaa puppha.m vaa phala.m vaa upasi"nghati, abbohaarikattaa va.t.tati. bhattuggaaro taalu.m aahacca antoyeva pavisati, avisayattaa va.t.tati. mukha.m pavi.t.tha.m pana ajjhoharato vikaale aapatti. dantantare laggassa aamisassa raso pavisati, aapattiyeva. sace sukhuma.m aamisa.m hoti, raso na pa~n~naayati, abbohaarikapakkha.m bhajati.

[03]upaka.t.the kaale nirudaka.t.thaane bhatta.m bhu~njitvaa kakkhaaretvaa dve tayo khe.lapi.n.de paatetvaa udaka.t.thaana.m gantvaa mukha.m vikkhaaletabba.m. pa.tiggahetvaa .thapitasi"ngiveraadiina.m a"nkuraa nikkhamanti, puna pa.tiggaha.nakicca.m natthi. lo.ne asati samuddodakena lo.nakicca.m kaatu.m va.t.tati. pa.tiggahetvaa .thapita.m lo.nodaka.m lo.na.m hoti, lo.na.m vaa udaka.m hoti, raso vaa phaa.nita.m hoti, phaa.nita.m vaa raso hoti, muulapa.tiggaha.nameva va.t.tati. himakarakaa udakagatikaa eva. parihaarikena kataka.t.thinaa udaka.m pasaadenti, ta.m abbohaarika.m, aamisena saddhi.m va.t.tati. aamisagatikehi kapitthaphalaadiihi pasaadita.m purebhattameva va.t.tati.

[03]pokkhara.niiaadiisu udaka.m bahala.m hoti, va.t.tati. sace pana mukhe ca hatthe ca laggati, na va.t.tati, pa.tiggahetvaa paribhu~njitabba.m. khettesu kasita.t.thaane bahala.m udaka.m hoti, pa.tiggahetabba.m. sace sanditvaa kandaraadiini pavisitvaa nadi.m puureti, va.t.tati. kakudhasobbhaadayo honti, rukkhato patitehi pupphehi sa~nchannodakaa, sace puppharaso na pa~n~naayati, pa.tiggaha.nakicca.m natthi. paritta.m udaka.m hoti, raso pa~n~naayati, pa.tiggahetabba.m. pabbatakandaraadiisu kaa.lava.n.napa.n.nasa~nchannaudakepi eseva nayo.

[03]paaniiyagha.te sare.nukaani vaa sava.n.takhiiraani vaa pupphaani pakkhittaani honti, pa.tiggahetabba.m. pupphaani vaa pa.tiggahetvaa ^a^P4.0854^ea^ pakkhipitabbaani. paa.talicampakamallikaa pakkhittaa honti ^a^V0.0108^ea^, vaasamatta.m ti.t.thati ta.m abbohaarika.m, dutiyadivasepi aamisena saddhi.m va.t.tati. bhikkhunaa .thapitapupphavaasitakapaaniiyato saama.nero paaniiya.m gahetvaa piitaavasesa.m tattheva aakirati, pa.tiggahetabba.m. padumasaraadiisu udaka.m santharitvaa .thita.m pupphare.nu.m gha.tena ^a^M0.0120^ea^ vikkhambhetvaa udaka.m gahetu.m va.t.tati. kappiya.m kaaraapetvaa pa.tiggahetvaa .thapita.m dantaka.t.tha.m hoti, sace tassa rasa.m pivitukaamo, muulapa.tiggaha.nameva va.t.tati. appa.tiggahetvaa .thapita.m pa.tiggahetabba.m. ajaanantassa rase pavi.t.thepi aapattiyeva. acittaka~nhi ida.m sikkhaapada.m.

[03]mahaabhuutesu ki.m va.t.tati, ki.m na va.t.tatiiti? khiira.m taava va.t.tati, kappiyama.msakhiira.m vaa akappiyama.msakhiira.m vaa hotu, pivantassa anaapatti. assu khe.lo si"nghaa.nikaa mutta.m kariisa.m semha.m dantamala.m akkhiguuthako ka.n.naguuthako sariire u.t.thitalo.nanti ida.m sabba.m va.t.tati. ya.m panettha .thaanato cavitvaa patte vaa hatthe vaa patati, ta.m pa.tiggahetabba.m. a"ngalagga.m pa.tiggahitakameva. u.nha.mpaayaasa.m bhu~njantassa sedo a"ngulianusaarena ekaabaddhova hutvaa paayaase santi.t.thati, pi.n.daaya vaa carantassa hatthato pattassa mukhava.t.ti.mto vaa pattatala.m orohati, ettha pa.tiggaha.nakicca.m natthi. jhaamamahaabhuutesu ida.m naama na va.t.tatiiti natthi, dujjhaapita.m pana na va.t.tati. sujjhaapita.m manussa.t.thimpi cu.n.na.m katvaa lehe upanetu.m va.t.tati.

[03]cattaari mahaavika.taani asati kappiyakaarake saamampi gahetvaa paribhu~njitu.m va.t.tati. ettha ca dubbacopi asamatthopi kappiyakaarako asantapakkheyeva ti.t.thati. chaarikaaya asati sukkhadaaru.m jhaapetvaa chaarikaa gahetabbaa. sukkhadaarumhi asati alladaaru.m rukkhato chinditvaapi kaatu.m va.t.tati. ida.m pana catubbidhampi mahaavika.ta.m kaalodissa.m naama sappada.t.thakkha.neyeva va.t.tati. sesamettha uttaanameva.
[03]e.lakalomasamu.t.thaana.m -- kaayato ca kaayacittato ca samu.t.thaati, kiriya.m, nosa~n~naavimokkha.m, acittaka.m, pa.n.nattivajja.m, kaayakamma.m, ticitta.m ^a^P4.0855^ea^, tivedananti.
[06] dantaponasikkhaapada.m dasama.m.
[06] samatto va.n.nanaakkamena bhojanavaggo catuttho.

[03] 269^b^.^eb^ acelakavaggassa ^a^M0.0121^ea^ ^a^V0.0010^ea^9 pa.thamasikkhaapade -- ^b^parivesana^eb^nti parivisana.t.thaana.m. ^b^paribbaajakasamaapanno^eb^ti pabbajja.m samaapanno. ^b^deti aapatti paacittiyassaa^eb^ti samatittika.m yaagupatta.m ekapayogena deti, eka.m paacittiya.m. avacchinditvaa avacchinditvaa deti, payoge payoge paacittiya.m. eseva nayo puuvabhattaadiisu. ^b^titthiye atitthiyasa~n~nii^eb^ti maataa vaa pitaa vaa titthiyesu pabbajati, tesa.m maataapitusa~n~naaya dentassaapi paacittiyameva hoti. ^b^daapetii^eb^ti anupasampannena daapeti.

[03] 273^b^.^eb^ ^b^upanikkhipitvaa detii^eb^ti tathaaruupe bhaajane .thapetvaa ta.m bhaajana.m tesa.m santike bhuumiya.m nikkhipitvaa deti, tesa.m vaa bhaajana.m nikkhipaapetvaa tattha deti, patta.m aadhaarake vaa bhuumiya.m vaa .thapetvaapi ``ito ga.nhathaa''ti vattu.m va.t.tati. sace titthiyo vadati ``mayha.m naama ida.m santaka.m, idha na aakirathaa''ti aakiritabba.m. tassa santakattaa sahatthaa daana.m naama na hoti. sesamettha uttaanameva.
[03]e.lakalomasamu.t.thaana.m -- kiriya.m, nosa~n~naavimokkha.m, acittaka.m, pa.n.nattivajja.m, kaayakamma.m, ticitta.m, tivedananti.
[06] acelakasikkhaapada.m pa.thama.m.
[03] 274^b^.^eb^ dutiyasikkhaapade -- ^b^pa.tikkamanepii^eb^ti aasanasaalaayampi. ^b^bhattavissagga^eb^nti bhattakicca.m. ^b^na sambhaavesii^eb^ti na paapu.ni.

[03] 276^b^.^eb^ ^b^anaacaara^eb^nti vuttaavasesa.m kaayavaciidvaaraviitikkama.m. ^b^dassanuupacaara.m vaa savanuupacaara.m vaa^eb^ ^a^V0.0110^ea^ ^b^vijahantassaa^eb^ti ettha yadi .thito vaa nisinno vaa uyyojeti; yo uyyojito, so vijahati, tassa ca aapatti naama natthi. tasmi.m pana vijahantepi atthato itarena vijahitameva hoti. tasmaa yo uyyojeti, tassevaaya.m aapatti. tattha sace ^a^M0.0122^ea^ upacaarabbhantare eko paado hoti, dukka.ta.m. siimaatikkame paacittiya.m. ettha ca dassanuupacaarassa abbhokaase dvaadasahatthappamaa.na.m, tathaa savanuupacaarassa. sace pana antaraa ku.t.tadvaarapaakaaraadayo honti, tehi antaritabhaavo dassanuupacaaraatikkamo, tassa vasena aapatti ^a^P4.0856^ea^ veditabbaa. ^b^na a~n~no koci paccayo hotii^eb^ti .thapetvaa vuttappakaaramanaacaara.m a~n~na.m ki~nci kaara.na.m na hoti.

[03] 277^b^.^eb^ ^b^kalisaasana.m aaropetii^eb^ti ^b^``kalii''^eb^ti kodho; tassa saasana.m aaropeti; kodhassa aa.na.m aaropeti; kodhavasena .thaananisajjaadiisu dosa.m dassetvaa ``passatha bho imassa .thaana.m, nisajja.m aalokita.m vilokita.m khaa.nuko viya ti.t.thati, sunakho viya nisiidati, makka.to viya ito cito ca viloketii''ti eva.m amanaapavacana.m vadati ``appeva naama iminaapi ubbaa.lho pakkameyyaa''ti. sesa.m uttaanameva.

[03]tisamu.t.thaana.m -- kaayacittato vaacaacittato kaayavaacaacittato ca samu.t.thaati, kiriya.m, sa~n~naavimokkha.m, sacittaka.m, lokavajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, akusalacitta.m, tivedananti.
[06] uyyojanasikkhaapada.m dutiya.m.

[03] 279^b^.^eb^ tatiyasikkhaapade -- ^b^sayanighare^eb^ti sayaniyaghare. ^b^yato ayyassa bhikkhaa dinnaa^eb^ti yasmaa bhikkhaa dinnaa, ya.m aagatena laddhabba.m ta.m vo laddha.m; gacchathaati adhippaayo. ^b^pariyu.t.thito^eb^ti raagapariyu.t.thito; methunaadhippaayoti attho.

[03] 280^b^.^eb^ saha ubhohi janehiiti sabhojana.m; tasmi.m ^b^sabhojane^eb^. atha vaa ^b^sabhojane^eb^ti sabhoge. raagapariyu.t.thitassa hi purisassa itthii bhogo itthiyaa ca puriso. tenevassa padabhaajane -- ``itthii ceva hoti puriso caa''tiaadi vutta.m. ^b^mahallake ghare^eb^ti mahallake sayanighare. ^b^pi.t.thasa"nghaa.tassa hatthapaasa.m vijahitvaa^eb^ti tassa sayanighare gabbhassa yo pi.t.thasa"nghaa.to, tassa hatthapaasa.m vijahitvaa; antosayanassa aasanne ^a^M0.0123^ea^ .thaane nisiidatiiti attho. iidisa~nca sayanighara.m ^a^V0.0111^ea^ mahaacatussaalaadiisu hoti. ^b^pi.t.thiva.msa.m atikkamitvaa^eb^ti iminaa majjhaatikkama.m dasseti. tasmaa yathaa vaa tathaa vaa katassa khuddakassa sayanigharassa majjhaatikkame aapatti veditabbaa. sesamettha uttaanameva.
[03]pa.thamapaaraajikasamu.t.thaana.m -- kiriya.m, sa~n~naavimokkha.m, sacittaka.m, lokavajja.m, kaayakamma.m, akusalacitta.m, dvivedananti.
[06] sabhojanasikkhaapada.m tatiya.m.

[03] 284^b^.^eb^ catutthapa~ncamasikkhaapadesu ya.m vattabba.m siyaa, ta.m sabba.m aniyatadvaye vuttanayameva. yathaa ca sabhojanasikkhaapada.m ^a^P4.0857^ea^, evametaanipi pa.thamapaaraajikasamu.t.thaanaanevaati.
[06] rahopa.ticchannasikkhaapada.m catuttha.m, rahonisajjasikkhaapada.m pa~ncama.m.
[03] 294^b^.^eb^ cha.t.thasikkhaapade -- ^b^dethaavuso bhatta^eb^nti ettha ta.m kira bhatta.m abhiha.ta.m ahosi, tasmaa evamaaha.msu. anabhiha.te pana eva.m vattu.m na labbhati, payuttavaacaa hoti.

[03] 295^b^.^eb^ ^b^tena hi bhikkhave pa.tiggahetvaa nikkhipathaa^eb^ti ida.m pana bhagavaa kulassa saddhaanurakkha.natthaaya aaha. yadi ``bhaajetvaa khaadathaa''ti vadeyya, manussaana.m pasaada~n~nathatta.m siyaa. ^b^ussaariyitthaa^eb^ti pa.tihariyittha; ghara.myeva na.m gahetvaa agama.msuuti vutta.m hoti.

[03] 298^b^.^eb^ ^b^santa.m bhikkhu^eb^nti ettha kittaavataa santo hoti, kittaavataa asantoti? antovihaare yattha .thitassa kulaani payirupaasanacitta.m uppanna.m, tato pa.t.thaaya ya.m passe vaa abhimukhe vaa passati, yassa sakkaa hoti pakativacanena aarocetu.m, aya.m santo naama. ito cito ca pariyesitvaa aarocanakicca.m naama natthi. yo hi eva.m pariyesitabbo, so asantoyeva. apica antoupacaarasiimaaya bhikkhu.m disvaa aapucchissaamiiti gantvaa tattha ya.m passati, so ^a^M0.0124^ea^ aapucchitabbo. no ce passati, asanta.m bhikkhu.m anaapucchaa pavi.t.tho naama hoti.

[03] 302^b^.^eb^ ^b^antaraaraama^eb^nti ^a^V0.0112^ea^ antogaame vihaaro hoti, ta.m gacchati. ^b^bhattiyaghara^eb^nti nimantitaghara.m vaa salaakabhattaadidaayakaana.m vaa ghara.m. ^b^aapadaasuu^eb^ti jiivitabrahmacariyantaraayesu sati gantu.m va.t.tati. sesamettha uttaanameva.

[03]kathinasamu.t.thaana.m -- kaayavaacato kaayavaacaacittato ca samu.t.thaati, kiriyaakiraya.m, nosa~n~naavimokkha.m, acittaka.m, pa.n.nattivajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, ticitta.m, tivedananti.
[06] caarittasikkhaapada.m cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 303^b^.^eb^ sattamasikkhaapade -- ^b^mahaanaamo^eb^ naama bhagavato cuu.lapituputto maasamattena mahallakataro dviisu phalesu pati.t.thito ariyasaavako. ^b^bhesajja.m ussanna.m hotii^eb^ti vajato aaharitvaa .thapitasappi bahu hoti.

[03] 306^b^.^eb^ ^b^saaditabbaa^eb^ti tasmi.m samaye rogo natthiiti na pa.tikkhipitabbaa; roge sati vi~n~naapessaamiiti adhivaasetabbaa. ^b^ettakehi bhesajjehi pavaaremii^eb^ti naamavasena sappitelaadiisu dviihi tiihi vaa parimaa.navasena patthena naa.liyaa aa.lhakenaati ^a^P4.0858^ea^ vaa.^b^a~n~na.m bhesajja.m vi~n~naapetii^eb^ti sappinaa pavaarito tela.m vi~n~naapeti, aa.lhakena pavaarito do.na.m. ^b^na bhesajjena kara.niiyenaa^eb^ti missakabhattenapi ce yaapetu.m sakkoti, na bhesajjakara.niiya.m naama hoti.

[03] 310^b^.^eb^ ^b^pavaaritaana^eb^nti ye attano puggalikaaya pavaara.naaya pavaaritaa; tesa.m pavaaritaanuruupena vi~n~nattiyaa anaapatti. sa"nghavasena pavaaritesu pana pamaa.na.m sallakkhetabbamevaati. sesa.m uttaanameva.
[03]chasamu.t.thaana.m ^a^M0.0125^ea^ -- kiriya.m, nosa~n~naavimokkha.m, acittaka.m, pa.n.nattivajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, ticitta.m, tivedananti.
[06] mahaanaamasikkhaapada.m sattama.m.
[03] 311^b^.^eb^ a.t.thame ^a^V0.0113^ea^ -- ^b^abbhuyyaato^eb^ti abhiuyyaato; parasena.m abhimukho gamissaamiiti nagarato niggatoti attho. ^b^uyyutta^eb^nti katauyyoga.m; gaamato nikkhantanti attho.

[03] 314^b^.^eb^ ^b^dvaadasapuriso hatthii^eb^ti cattaaro aarohakaa ekekapaadarakkhakaa dve dveti eva.m dvaadasapuriso hoti. ^b^tipuriso asso^eb^ti eko aarohako dve paadarakkhakaati eva.m tipuriso hoti. ^b^catupuriso ratho^eb^ti eko saarathi eko yodho dve aa.nirakkhakaati eva.m catupuriso hoti. ^b^cattaaro purisaa sarahatthaa^eb^ti aavudhahatthaa cattaaro purisaati aya.m pacchimako.tiyaa catura"ngasamannaagataa senaa naama. iidisa.m sena.m dassanaaya gacchato pade pade dukka.ta.m. ^b^dassanuupacaara.m vijahitvaa^eb^ti kenaci antaritaa vaa ninna.m oru.lhaa vaa na dissati; idha .thatvaa na sakkaa da.t.thunti a~n~na.m .thaana.m gantvaa passato payoge payoge paacittiyanti attho.

[03] 315^b^.^eb^ ^b^ekameka^eb^nti hatthiaadiisu catuusu a"ngesu ekameka.m; antamaso ekapurisaaru.lhakahatthimpi ekampi sarahattha.m purisa.m. ^b^anuyyuttaa^eb^ naama raajaa uyyaana.m vaa nadi.m vaa gacchati; eva.m anuyyuttaa hoti.

[03] 316^b^.^eb^ ^b^aapadaasuu^eb^ti jiivitabrahmacariyantaraayesu sati ettha gato mu~ncissaamiiti gacchato anaapatti. sesamettha uttaanameva. e.lakalomasamu.t.thaana.m -- kiriya.m, nosa~n~naavimokkha.m, acittaka.m, lokavajja.m, kaayakamma.m, akusalacitta.m, tivedananti.
[06] uyyuttasenaasikkhaapada.m a.t.thama.m.

[03] 319^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^P4.0859^ea^ ^a^M0.0126^ea^ -- ^b^attha"ngate suuriye senaaya vasatii^eb^ti ti.t.thatu vaa nisiidatu vaa sayatu vaa sacepi aakaase iddhiyaa ka~nci iriyaapatha.m kappeti, paacittiyameva. ^b^senaa vaa pa.tisenaaya ruddhaa hotii^eb^ti yathaa sa~ncaaro chijjati; eva.m ^a^V0.0114^ea^ ruddhaa hoti. ^b^palibuddho^eb^ti verikena vaa issarena vaa ruddho. sesa.m uttaanameva. e.lakalomasamu.t.thaana.m -- kiriya.m, nosa~n~naavimokkha.m, acittaka.m, pa.n.nattivajja.m, kaayakamma.m, ticitta.m, tivedananti.
[06] senaavaasasikkhaapada.m navama.m.

[03] 322^b^.^eb^ dasame -- uggantvaa uggantvaa ettha yujjhantiiti ^b^uyyodhika.m;^eb^ sampahaara.t.thaanasseta.m adhivacana.m. balassa agga.m jaananti etthaati ^b^balagga.m;^eb^ balaga.nana.t.thaananti attho. senaaya viyuuha.m ^b^senaabyuuha.m;^eb^ senaanivesasseta.m adhivacana.m. ^b^tayo hatthii pacchima.m hatthaaniika^eb^nti yo pubbe vutto dvaadasapuriso hatthiiti tena hatthinaa tayo hatthii. sesesupi eseva nayo. sesa.m uyyuttasenaasikkhaapade vuttanayeneva veditabba.m saddhi.m samu.t.thaanaadiihiiti.
[06] uyyodhikasikkhaapada.m dasama.m.
[06] samatto va.n.nanaakkamena acelakavaggo pa~ncamo.

[03] 326^b^.^eb^ suraapaanavaggassa pa.thamasikkhaapade -- ^b^bhaddavatikaa^eb^ti eko gaamo, so bhaddikaaya vatiyaa samannaagatattaa eta.m naama labhi. ^b^pathaavino^eb^ti addhikaa. ^b^tejasaa teja^eb^nti attano tejasaa aanubhaavena naagassa teja.m. ^b^kaapotikaa^eb^ti kapotapaadasamava.n.narattobhaasaa. ^b^pasannaa^eb^ti suraama.n.dasseta.m ^a^M0.0127^ea^ adhivacana.m. ^b^ananucchaviya.m bhikkhave saagatassaa^eb^ti pa~ncaabhi~n~nassa sato majjapaana.m naama na anucchaviyanti vutta.m hoti.

[03] 328^b^.^eb^ ^b^pupphaasavo^eb^ naama madhukapupphaadiina.m rasena kato. ^b^phalaasavo^eb^ naama muddikaphalaadiini madditvaa tesa.m rasena kato. ^b^madhvaasavo^eb^ naama muddikaana.m jaatirasena kato; makkhikamadhunaapi kariyatiiti ^a^V0.0115^ea^ vadanti. ^b^gu.laasavo^eb^ naama ucchurasaadiihi kariyati. ^b^suraa^eb^ naama pi.t.thaki.n.napakkhittaa; naa.likeraadiinampi rasena kataa suraatveva sa"nkhya.m gacchati, tassaayeva ki.n.napakkhittaaya ma.n.de gahite merayotveva sa"nkhya.m gacchatiiti vadanti. ^b^antamaso kusaggenapi pivatii^eb^ti eta.m sura.m vaa meraya.m vaa biijato pa.t.thaaya kusaggena pivatopi paacittiyanti ^a^P4.0860^ea^ attho. ekena pana payogena bahumpi pivantassa ekaa aapatti. vicchinditvaa vicchinditvaa pivato payogaga.nanaaya aapattiyo.

[03] 329^b^.^eb^ ^b^amajja~nca hoti majjava.n.na.m majjagandha.m majjarasa^eb^nti lo.nasoviiraka.m vaa sutta.m vaa hoti. ^b^suupasampaake^eb^ti vaasagaahaapanattha.m iisaka.m majja.m pakkhipitvaa suupa.m pacanti, tasmi.m anaapatti. ^b^ma.msasampaake^eb^pi eseva nayo. tela.m pana vaatabhesajjattha.m majjena saddhi.m pacanti, tasmimpi anatikkhittamajjeyeva anaapatti, ya.m pana atikkhittamajja.m hoti, ettha majjassa va.n.nagandharasaa pa~n~naayanti, tasmi.m aapattiyeva. ^b^amajja.m ari.t.tha^eb^nti yo ari.t.tho majja.m na hoti, tasmi.m anaapatti. aamalakaadiina.myeva kira rasena ari.t.tha.m karonti, so majjava.n.nagandharasoyeva hoti, na ca majja.m; ta.m sandhaayeta.m vutta.m. yo pana sambhaarapakkhitto, so majja.m hoti, biijato pa.t.thaaya na va.t.tati. sesamettha uttaanameva. e.lakalomasamu.t.thaana.m -- kiriya.m, nosa~n~naavimokkha.m, acittaka.m, lokavajja.m, kaayakamma.m akusalacitta.m, tivedananti. vatthuajaananataaya cettha acittakataa veditabbaa, akusaleneva paatabbataaya lokavajjataati.
[06] suraapaanasikkhaapada.m pa.thama.m.

[03] 330^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^a^M0.0128^ea^ -- ^b^a"ngulipatodakenaa^eb^ti a"nguliihi upakacchakaadigha.t.tana.m vuccati. ^b^uttasanto^eb^ti atihaasena kilamanto. ^b^anassaasako^eb^ti upacchinnaassaasapassaasasa~ncaaro hutvaa. ^b^anupasampanna.m kaayena kaaya^eb^nti ettha bhikkhuniipi anupasampanna.t.thaane .thitaa, tampi khi.d.daadhippaayena phusantassa dukka.ta.m. sesamettha uttaanameva.
[03]pa.thamapaaraajikasamu.t.thaana.m -- kiriya.m, sa~n~naavimokkha.m, sacittaka.m, lokavajja.m, kaayakamma.m, akusalacitta.m, dvivedananti.
[06] a"ngulipatodakasikkhaapada.m dutiya.m.
[03] 335^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^V0.0116^ea^ -- ^b^appakata~n~nuno^eb^ti ya.m bhagavataa pakata.m pa~n~natta.m, ta.m na jaanantiiti attho.

[03] 336^b^.^eb^ ^b^udake hasadhamme^eb^ti udakakii.likaa ^a^P4.0861^ea^ vuccati. ^b^uparigopphake^eb^ti gopphakaana.m uparibhaagappamaa.ne. ^b^hasaadhippaayo^eb^ti kii.laadhippaayo. ^b^nimujjati vaa^eb^tiaadiisu nimujjanatthaaya orohantassa padavaare padavaare dukka.ta.m. nimujjanummujjanesu payoge payoge paacittiya.m. nimujjitvaa antoudakeyeva gacchantassa hatthavaarapadavaaresu sabbattha paacittiya.m. ^b^palavatii^eb^ti tarati. hatthehi tarantassa hatthavaare hatthavaare paacittiya.m. paadesupi eseva nayo. yena yena a"ngena tarati, tassa tassa payoge payoge paacittiya.m. tiirato vaa rukkhato vaa udake patati, paacittiyameva. ^b^naavaaya kii.latii^eb^ti phiyaarittaadiihi naava.m paajento vaa tiire ussaarento vaa naavaaya kii.lati, dukka.ta.m.

[03]^b^hatthena vaa^eb^tiaadiisupi payoge payoge dukka.ta.m. keci hatthena udake khittaaya kathalaaya patanuppatanavaaresu dukka.ta.m vadanti, ta.m na gahetabba.m. tattha hi ekapayogattaa ekameva dukka.ta.m, apica uparigopphake vuttaani ummujjanaadiini .thapetvaa a~n~nena yena kenaci aakaarena udaka.m otaritvaa vaa anotaritvaa vaa yattha katthaci .thita.m udaka.m ^a^M0.0129^ea^ antamaso bindu.m gahetvaa khipanakii.laayapi kii.lantassa dukka.tameva, atthajotaka.m pana akkhara.m likhitu.m va.t.tati, ayamettha vinicchayo. sesamettha uttaanameva.
[03]pa.thamapaaraajikasamu.t.thaana.m -- kiriya.m, sa~n~naavimokkha.m, sacittaka.m, lokavajja.m, kaayakamma.m, akusalacitta.m, tivedananti.
[06] hasadhammasikkhaapada.m tatiya.m.

[03] 342^b^.^eb^ catutthe -- ^b^kathaaya.m nasseyyaa^eb^ti katha.m aya.m dhammo tanti pave.nii nasseyya. ^b^ta.m vaa na sikkhitukaamo^eb^ti yena pa~n~nattena vuccati, ta.m pa~n~natta.m na sikkhitukaamo. ^b^apa~n~nattenaa^eb^ti sutte vaa abhidhamme vaa aagatena.

[03] 344^b^.^eb^ ^b^eva.m^eb^ ^a^V0.0117^ea^ ^b^amhaaka.m aacariyaana.m uggaho^eb^ti ettha gaarayho aacariyuggaho na gahetabbo; pave.niyaa aagato aacariyuggahova gahetabbo. kurundiya.m pana ``lokavajje aacariyuggaho na va.t.tati, pa.n.nattivajje pana va.t.tatii''ti vutta.m. mahaapaccariya.m ``sutta.m suttaanuloma~nca uggahitakaana.myeva aacariyaana.m uggaho pamaa.na.m, ajaanantaana.m kathaa appamaa.nanti vutta.m. ta.m sabba.m pave.niyaa aagatesamodhaana.m gacchati. sesa.m uttaanamevaati.

[03]tisamu.t.thaana.m ^a^P4.0862^ea^ -- kaayacittato vaacaacittato kaayavaacaacittato ca samu.t.thaati, kiriya.m, sa~n~naavimokkha.m, sacittaka.m, lokavajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, akusalacitta.m, dukkhavedananti.
[06] anaadariyasikkhaapada.m catuttha.m.
[03] 345^b^.^eb^ pa~ncame -- ruupuupahaaraadayo manussaviggahe vuttanayeneva veditabbaa. sesa.m uttaanameva. samu.t.thaanaadiini anaadariyasadisaanevaati.
[06] bhi.msaapanasikkhaapada.m pa~ncama.m.

[03] 350^b^.^eb^ cha.t.the ^a^M0.0130^ea^ -- ^b^bhaggaa^eb^ti janapadassa naama.m. ^b^sa.msumaaragira^eb^nti nagarassa. ^b^bhesaka.laavana^eb^nti tannissitavanassa. ta.m pana migaana.m phaasuvihaaratthaaya dinnattaa ^b^migadaayo^eb^ti vuccati. ^b^samaadahitvaa^eb^ti jaaletvaa. ^b^paripaatesii^eb^ti anubandhi.
[03] 352^b^.^eb^ ^b^padiipepii^eb^ti padiipujjalanepi. ^b^jotikepii^eb^ti pattapacanasedakammaadiisu jotikara.ne. ^b^tathaaruupapaccayaa^eb^ti padiipaadipaccayaa.

[03] 354-5^b^.^eb^ ^b^saya.m samaadahatii^eb^ti ettha joti.m samaadahitukaamataaya ara.nisa.n.thapanato pa.t.thaaya yaava jaalaa na u.t.thahati, taava sabbapayogesu dukka.ta.m. ^b^pa.tilaata.m ukkhipatii^eb^ti dayhamaana.m alaata.m ^a^V0.0118^ea^ patita.m ukkhipati, puna yathaa.thaane .thapetiiti attho. eva.m avijjhaata.m ukkhipitvaa pakkhipantasseva dukka.ta.m, vijjhaata.m puna jaalaapentassa paacittiyameva.

[03] 356^b^.^eb^ ^b^tathaaruupapaccayaa^eb^ti .thapetvaa padiipaadiini a~n~nenapi tathaaruupena paccayena samaadahantassa anaapatti. ^b^aapadaasuu^eb^ti du.t.thavaa.lamigaamanussehi upaddavo hoti, tattha samaadahantassaapi anaapatti. sesa.m uttaanamevaati. chasamu.t.thaana.m -- kiriya.m, nosa~n~naavimokkha.m, acittaka.m, pa.n.nattivajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, ticitta.m, tivedananti.
[06] jotisikkhaapada.m cha.t.tha.m.
[03] 364^b^.^eb^ sattame -- ^b^cu.n.nena vaa mattikaaya vaa^eb^ti ettha cu.n.namattikaana.m abhisa"nkhara.nakaalato pa.t.thaaya sabbapayogesu dukka.ta.m.

[03] 366^b^.^eb^ ^b^paara.m gacchanto nhaayatii^eb^ti ettha sukkhaaya nadiyaa vaalika.m ukkiritvaa kataaavaa.takesupi nhaayitu.m va.t.tati. ^b^aapadaasuu^eb^ti bhamaraadiihi ^a^P4.0863^ea^ anubaddhassa udake nimujjitu.m va.t.tatiiti. sesamettha uttaanameva. e.lakalomasamu.t.thaana.m -- kiriya.m, nosa~n~naavimokkha.m, acittaka.m, pa.n.nattivajja.m, kaayakamma.m, ticitta.m, tivedananti.
[06] nahaanasikkhaapada.m sattama.m.

[03] 368-9^b^.^eb^ a.t.thame ^a^M0.0131^ea^ -- ^b^nava.m pana bhikkhunaa ciivaralaabhenaa^eb^ti ettha alabhiiti labho; labhoyeva laabho. ki.m alabhi? ciivara.m. kiidisa.m? nava.m. iti ``navaciivaralaabhenaa''ti vattabbe anunaasikalopa.m akatvaa ``navaciivaralaabhenaa''ti vutta.m; pa.tiladdhanavaciivarenaati attho. majjhe .thitapadadvaye ^b^panaa^eb^ti nipaato. ^b^bhikkhunaa^eb^ti yena laddha.m tassa nidassana.m. padabhaajane pana bya~njana.m anaadiyitvaa ya.m laddha.m ta.m dassetu.m ``ciivara.m naama channa.m ciivaraana''ntiaadi vutta.m. ^b^ciivara^eb^nti ettha ya.m nivaasetu.m vaa paarupitu.m vaa sakkaa hoti, tadeva veditabba.m. teneva ``vikappanupagapacchima''nti ^a^V0.0119^ea^ na vutta.m. ^b^ka.msaniila^eb^nti cammakaaraniila.m. mahaapaccariya.m pana ``ayomala.m lohamala.m eta.m ka.msaniila.m naamaa''ti vutta.m. ^b^palaasaniila^eb^nti yo koci niilava.n.no pa.n.naraso. ^b^dubba.n.nakara.na.m aadaatabba^eb^nti eta.m kappabindu.m sandhaaya vutta.m; na niilaadiihi sakalaciivarassa dubba.n.nakara.na.m. ta~nca pana kappa.m aadiyantena ciivara.m rajitvaa catuusu vaa ko.nesu tiisu vaa dviisu vaa ekasmi.m vaa ko.ne morassa akkhima.n.dalamatta.m vaa ma"nkulapi.t.thimatta.m vaa aadaatabba.m. mahaapaccariya.m ``patte vaa ga.n.thiya.m vaa na va.t.tatii''ti vutta.m. mahaaa.t.thakathaaya.m pana ``va.t.tatiyevaa''ti vutta.m. paa.likappaka.n.nikakappaadayo pana sabbattha pa.tisiddhaa, tasmaa .thapetvaa eka.m va.t.tabindu.m a~n~nena kenacipi vikaarena kappo na kaatabbo.

[03] 371^b^.^eb^ ^b^agga.le^eb^tiaadiisu etaani agga.laadiini kappakataciivare pacchaa aaropetvaa kappakara.nakicca.m natthi. sesa.m uttaanameva. e.lakalomasamu.t.thaana.m -- kiriyaakiriya.m, nosa~n~naavimokkha.m, acittaka.m, pa.n.nattivajja.m; kaayakamma.m, ticitta.m, tivedananti.
[06] dubba.n.nakara.nasikkhaapada.m a.t.thama.m.

[03] 374^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^P4.0864^ea^ -- ^b^tassa vaa adinna^eb^nti ciivarasaamikassa ``paribhu~nja vaa vissajjehi vaa yathaapaccaya.m vaa karohii''ti eva.m vatvaa adinna.m. ^b^tassa vaa avissasanto^eb^ti yena vinayakamma.m kata.m, tassa avissaasena vaa. tena ^a^M0.0132^ea^ pana dinna.m vaa tassa vissaasena vaa paribhu~njantassa anaapatti. sesamettha ti.msakava.n.nanaaya.m vuttanayattaa uttaanamevaati. kathinasamu.t.thaana.m -- kaayavaacato kaayavaacaacittato ca samu.t.thaati, kiriyaakiriya.m, nosa~n~naavimokkha.m, acittaka.m, pa.n.nattivajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, ticitta.m, tivedananti.
[06] vikappanasikkhaapada.m navama.m.

[03] 377-81^b^.^eb^ dasame -- ^b^apanidhentii^eb^ti apanetvaa nidhenti. ^b^hasaapekkho^eb^ti hasaadhippaayo. ^b^a~n~na.m parikkhaara^eb^nti paa.liyaa anaagata.m pattatthavikaadi.m. ^b^dhammi.m katha.m katvaa^eb^ti ``sama.nena naama anihitaparikkhaarena ^a^V0.0120^ea^ bhavitu.m na va.t.tatii''ti eva.m dhammakatha.m kathetvaa dassaamiiti nikkhipato anaapatti. sesamettha uttaanameva. tisamu.t.thaana.m -- kiriya.m, sa~n~naavimokkha.m, sacittaka.m, lokavajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, akusalacitta.m, tivedananti.
[06] ciivaraapanidhaanasikkhaapada.m dasama.m.
[06] samatto va.n.nanaakkamena suraapaanavaggo cha.t.tho.
[03] 382^b^.^eb^ sappaa.nakavaggassa pa.thamasikkhaapade -- ^b^issaaso hotii^eb^ti gihikaale dhanuggahaacariyo hoti. ^b^jiivitaa voropitaa^eb^ti jiivitaa viyojitaa.

[03]sikkhaapadepi ^b^voropeyyaa^eb^ti viyojeyya. yasmaa pana vohaaramattameveta.m; na hettha ki~nci viyojite siisaala"nkaare siisa.m viya jiivitaa voropite paa.nepi jiivita.m naama visu.m ti.t.thati, a~n~nadatthu antaradhaanameva ^a^M0.0133^ea^ gacchati, tasmaa tamattha.m dassetu.m padabhaajane ``jiivitindriya.m upacchindatii''tiaadi vutta.m. imasmi~nca sikkhaapade tiracchaanagatoyeva ``paa.no''ti veditabbo. ta.m khuddakampi mahantampi maarentassa aapattinaanaakara.na.m natthi. mahante pana upakkamamahantattaa akusalamahatta.m hoti. ^b^paa.ne paa.nasa~n~nii^eb^ti antamaso ma~ncapii.tha.m sodhento ma"ngulabiijakepi paa.nasa~n~nii nikkaaru.nikataaya ^a^P4.0865^ea^ ta.m bhindanto apaneti, paacittiya.m. tasmaa evaruupesu .thaanesu kaaru~n~na.m upa.t.thapetvaa appamattena vatta.m kaatabba.m. sesa.m manussaviggahe vuttanayeneva veditabba.m saddhi.m samu.t.thaanaadiihiiti.
[06] sa~nciccapaa.nasikkhaapada.m pa.thama.m.

[03] 387^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^a^V0.0121^ea^ -- ^b^sappaa.naka^eb^nti ye paa.nakaa paribhogena maranti, tehi paa.nakehi sappaa.naka.m, taadisa~nhi jaana.m paribhu~njato payoge payoge paacittiya.m. pattapuurampi avicchinditvaa ekapayogena pivato ekaa aapatti. taadisena udakena saamisa.m patta.m aavi~nchitvaa dhovatopi taadise udake u.nhayaagupatta.m nibbaapayatopi ta.m udaka.m hatthena vaa u.lu"nkena vaa gahetvaa nhaayatopi payoge payoge paacittiya.m. udakaso.n.di.m vaa pokkhara.ni.m vaa pavisitvaa bahinikkhamanatthaaya viici.m u.t.thaapayatopi. so.n.di.m vaa pokkhara.ni.m vaa sodhentehi tato gahitaudaka.m udakeyeva aasi~ncitabba.m. samiipamhi udake asati kappiyaudakassa a.t.tha vaa dasa vaa gha.te udakasa.n.thaanakappadese aasi~ncitvaa tattha aasi~ncitabba.m. ``pava.t.titvaa udake patissatii''ti u.nhapaasaa.ne udaka.m naasi~ncitabba.m. kappiyaudakena pana paasaa.na.m nibbaapetvaa aasi~ncitu.m va.t.tati. sesamettha uttaanameva.
[06] tisamu.t.thaana.m -- kiriya.m, sa~n~naavimokkha.m, sacittaka.m, pa.n.nattivajja.m, kaayakamma.m,

[03] vaciikamma.m, ticitta.m, tivedananti. ettha ca pa.ta"ngapaa.nakaana.m patana.m ~natvaapi suddhacittataaya diipajaalane viya sappaa.nakabhaava.m ~natvaapi udakasa~n~naaya paribhu~njitabbato pa.n.nattivajjataa veditabbaati.
[06] sappaa.nakasikkhaapada.m dutiya.m.

[03] 392^b^.^eb^ tatiyasikkhaapade ^a^M0.0134^ea^ -- ^b^ukko.tentii^eb^ti tassa tassa bhikkhuno santika.m gantvaa ``akata.m kamma''ntiaadiini vadantaa uccaalenti; yathaapati.t.thitabhaavena pati.t.thaatu.m na denti.

[03] 393^b^.^eb^ ^b^yathaadhamma^eb^nti yo yassa adhikara.nassa vuupasamanaaya dhammo vutto, teneva dhammenaati attho. ^b^nihataadhikara.na^eb^nti nihata.m adhikara.na.m; satthaaraa vuttadhammeneva vuupasamita.m adhikara.nanti attho.

[03] 395^b^.^eb^ ^b^dhammakamme dhammakammasa~n~nii^eb^ti yena kammena ta.m ^a^P4.0866^ea^ adhikara.na.m vuupasamita.m, ta~nce dhammakamma.m hoti, tasmi.m dhammakamme ayampi dhammakammasa~n~nii hutvaa yadi ukko.teti, paacittiya.m aapajjatiiti ^a^V0.0122^ea^ attho. etena nayena sesapadaanipi veditabbaani. ayamettha sa"nkhepo, vitthaaro pana ``imesa.m catunna.m adhikara.naana.m kati ukko.tanaa''tiaadinaa nayena parivaare vutto. a.t.thakathaasu ta.m sabba.m aaharitvaa tassevattho va.n.nito. maya.m pana ta.m tattheva va.n.nayissaama. idha aaharitvaa va.n.niyamaane hi su.t.thutara.m sammoho bhaveyyaati na va.n.nayimha. sesamettha uttaanameva. tisamu.t.thaana.m -- kiriya.m, sa~n~naavimokkha.m, sacittaka.m, lokavajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, akusalacitta.m, dukkhavedananti.
[06] ukko.tanasikkhaapada.m tatiya.m.

[03] 399^b^.^eb^ catutthe -- ^b^du.t.thullaa naama aapattii^eb^ti ettha cattaari paaraajikaani atthuddhaaravasena dassitaani, sa"nghaadisesaapatti pana adhippetaa, ta.m chaadentassa paacittiya.m. ^b^dhura.m nikkhittamatte^eb^ti dhure nikkhittamatte. sacepi dhura.m nikkhipitvaa pacchaa aaroceti, na rakkhati; dhura.m nikkhittamatteyeva paacittiyanti vutta.m hoti. sace pana eva.m dhura.m nikkhipitvaa pa.ticchaadanatthameva a~n~nassa aaroceti, sopi a~n~nassaati etenupaayena sama.nasatampi sama.nasahassampi aapatti.m aapajjatiyeva taava, yaava ko.ti na chijjati. kadaa pana ko.ti chijjatiiti? mahaasumatthero taava vadati -- ``aapatti.m aapanno ekassa ^a^M0.0135^ea^ aaroceti, so pa.tinivattitvaa tasseva aaroceti; eva.m ko.ti chijjatii''ti. mahaapadumatthero panaaha -- ``aya~nhi vatthupuggaloyeva. aapatti.m aapanno pana ekassa bhikkhuno aaroceti, aya.m a~n~nassa aaroceti, so pa.tinivattitvaa yenassa aarocita.m, tasseva aaroceti; eva.m tatiyena puggalena dutiyassa aarocite ko.ti chinnaa hotii''ti.

[03] 400^b^.^eb^ ^b^adu.t.thulla.m aapatti^eb^nti avasese pa~ncaapattikkhandhe. ^b^anupasampannassa du.t.thulla.m vaa adu.t.thulla.m vaa ajjhaacaara^eb^nti ettha anupasampannassa sukkavissa.t.thi ca kaayasa.msaggo caati aya.m du.t.thullaajjhaacaaro naama. sesamettha uttaanamevaati. dhuranikkhepasamu.t.thaana.m -- kaayavaacaacittato samu.t.thaati, akiriya.m, sa~n~naavimokkha.m, sacittaka.m, lokavajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, akusalacitta.m ^a^P4.0867^ea^, dukkhavedananti.
[06] du.t.thullasikkhaapada.m catuttha.m.

[03] 402^b^.^eb^ pa~ncamasikkhaapade -- ^a^V0.0123^ea^ ^b^a"nguliyo dukkhaa bhavissantii^eb^ti akkharaani likhantassa a"nguliyo dukkhaa bhavissantiiti cintesu.m. ^b^urassa dukkho^eb^ti ga.nana.m sikkhantena bahu.m cintetabba.m hoti, tenassa uro dukkho bhavissatiiti ma~n~ni.msu. ^b^akkhiini dukkhaa bhavissantii^eb^ti ruupasutta.m sikkhantena kahaapa.naa parivattetvaa parivattetvaa passitabbaa honti, tenassa akkhiini dukkhaani bhavissantiiti ma~n~ni.msu. .da.msaadiisu ^b^.da.msaa^eb^ti pi"ngalamakkhikaayo. ^b^dukkhaana^eb^nti dukkhamaana.m. ^b^tibbaana^eb^nti bahalaana.m. ^b^kharaana^eb^nti tikhi.naana.m. ^b^ka.tukaana^eb^nti pharusaana.m; amanaapataaya vaa ka.tukarasasadisaana.m. ^b^asaataana^eb^nti amadhuraana.m. ^b^paa.naharaana^eb^nti jiivitaharaana.m.

[03] 404^b^.^eb^ ^b^siima.m sammannatii^eb^ti nava.m siima.m bandhati. kurundiya.m pana udakukkhepaparicchindanepi dukka.ta.m vutta.m. ^b^paripu.n.naviisativasso^eb^ti pa.tisandhiggaha.nato pa.t.thaaya paripu.n.naviisativasso; gabbhaviisopi hi paripu.n.naviisativassotveva sa"nkhye gacchati. yathaaha --

[02] ``tena ^a^M0.0136^ea^ kho pana samayena aayasmaa kumaarakassapo gabbhaviiso upasampanno hoti. atha kho aayasmato kumaarakassapassa etadahosi -- `bhagavataa pa~n~natta.m, na uunaviisativasso puggalo upasampaadetabboti. aha~ncamhi gabbhaviiso upasampanno. upasampanno nukhomhi, nanu kho upasampanno'ti. bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m. ya.m bhikkhave maatukucchimhi pa.thama.m citta.m uppanna.m, pa.thama.m vi~n~naa.na.m paatubhuuta.m tadupaadaaya saavassa jaati. anujaanaami, bhikkhave, gabbhaviisa.m upasampaadetu''nti (mahaava0 124).

[03]tattha yo dvaadasamaase maatukucchismi.m vasitvaa mahaapavaara.naaya jaato, so tato pa.t.thaaya yaava ekuunaviisatime vasse mahaapavaara.naa, ta.m atikkamitvaa paa.tipade upasampaadetabbo. etenupaayena haayanava.d.dhana.m veditabba.m.

[03]poraa.nakattheraa pana ekuunaviisativassa.m saama.nera.m nikkhamaniiyapu.n.namaasi.m atikkamma paa.tipadadivase upasampaadenti, ta.m kasmaati? vuccate -- ekasmi.m ^a^P4.0868^ea^ vasse cha caatuddasikauposathaa honti. iti viisatiyaa vassesu cattaaro maasaa parihaayanti. raajaano tatiye tatiye vasse vassa.m ukka.d.dhanti. iti a.t.thaarasasu vassesu cha maasaa va.d.dhanti, tato uposathavasena ^a^V0.0124^ea^ parihiine cattaaro maase apanetvaa dve maasaa avasesaa honti, te dve maase gahetvaa viisativassaani paripu.n.naani hontiiti nikka"nkhaa hutvaa nikkhamaniiyapu.n.namaasi.m atikkamma paa.tipade upasampaadenti. ettha pana yo pavaaretvaa viisativasso bhavissati, ta.m sandhaaya ``ekuunaviisativassa''nti vutta.m. tasmaa yo maatukucchismi.m dvaadasamaase vasi, so ekaviisativasso hoti. yo sattamaase vasi, so sattamaasaadhikaviisativasso. chamaasajaato pana na jiivati.

[03] 406^b^.^eb^ ^b^anaapatti uunaviisativassa.m paripu.n.naviisativassasa~n~nii^eb^ti ettha ki~ncaapi upasampaadentassa anaapatti, puggalo pana anupasampannova hoti. sace pana so dasavassaccayena a~n~na.m upasampaadeti, ta~nce mu~ncitvaa ga.no puurati, suupasampanno. sopi ca yaava na jaanaati, taavassa neva saggantaraayo ^a^M0.0137^ea^ na mokkhantaraayo, ~natvaa pana puna upasampajjitabba.m. sesa.m uttaanameva.
[06] tisamu.t.thaana.m -- kiriya.m, sa~n~naavimokkha.m, sacittaka.m, pa.n.nattivajja.m, kaayakamma.m,
[03] vaciikamma.m, ticitta.m, tivedananti.
[06] uunaviisativassasikkhaapada.m pa~ncama.m.
[03] 407^b^.^eb^ cha.t.the -- ^b^pa.tiyaaloka^eb^nti suuriyaalokassa pa.timukha.m; pacchimadisanti attho. ^b^kammiyaa^eb^ti su"nka.t.thaane kammikaa.
[03] 409^b^.^eb^ ^b^raajaana.m vaa theyya.m gacchantii^eb^ti raajaana.m vaa thenetvaa va~ncetvaa ra~n~no santaka.m ki~nci gahetvaa idaani na tassa dassaamaati gacchanti.

[03] 411^b^.^eb^ ^b^visa"nketenaa^eb^ti kaalavisa"nketena divasavisa"nketena ca gacchato anaapatti. maggavisa"nketena pana a.tavivisa"nketena vaa aapattiyeva. sesamettha bhikkhunivagge vuttanayattaa uttaanatthameva. theyyasatthasamu.t.thaana.m -- kaayacittato kaayavaacaacittato ca samu.t.thaati, kiriya.m, sa~n~naavimokkha.m, sacittaka.m, pa.n.nattivajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, ticitta.m, tivedananti.
[06] theyyasatthasikkhaapada.m cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 412^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^P4.0869^ea^ ^a^V0.0125^ea^ -- ^b^padhuupento nisiidii^eb^ti pajjhaayanto attaana.myeva paribhaasanto nisiidi. ^b^naayyo so bhikkhu ma.m nippaatesii^eb^ti ayyo aya.m bhikkhu ma.m na nikkhaamesi; na ma.m gahetvaa agamaasiiti attho. sesamettha bhikkhuniyaa saddhi.m sa.mvidhaanasikkhaapade vuttanayeneva veditabba.m saddhi.m samu.t.thaanaadiihiiti.
[06] sa.mvidhaanasikkhaapada.m sattama.m.

[03] 417^b^.^eb^ a.t.thame ^a^M0.0138^ea^ -- gaddhe baadhayi.msuuti gaddhabaadhino; gaddhabaadhino pubbapurisaa assaati ^b^gaddhabaadhipubbo,^eb^ tassa gaddhabaadhipubbassa gijjhaghaatakakulappasutassaati attho.

[03]saggamokkhaana.m antaraaya.m karontiiti ^b^antaraayikaa^eb^. te kammakilesavipaakaupavaadaaa.naaviitikkamavasena pa~ncavidhaa. tattha pa~ncaanantariyakammaa kammantaraayikaa naama. tathaa bhikkhuniiduusakakamma.m, ta.m pana mokkhasseva antaraaya.m karoti, na saggassa. niyatamicchaadi.t.thidhammaa kilesantaraayikaa naama. pa.n.dakatiracchaanagataubhatobya~njanakaana.m pa.tisandhidhammaa vipaakantaraayikaa naama. ariyuupavaadaa upavaadantaraayikaa naama, te pana yaava ariye na khamaapenti taavadeva, na tato para.m. sa~ncicca aapannaa aapattiyo aa.naaviitikkamantaraayikaa naama, taapi yaava bhikkhubhaava.m vaa pa.tijaanaati, na vu.t.thaati vaa na deseti vaa taavadeva, na tato para.m.

[03]tatraaya.m bhikkhu bahussuto dhammakathiko sesantaraayike jaanaati, vinaye pana akovidattaa pa.n.nattiviitikkamantaraayike na jaanaati, tasmaa rahogato eva.m cintesi -- ``ime aagaarikaa pa~nca kaamagu.ne paribhu~njantaa sotaapannaapi sakadaagaaminopi anaagaaminopi honti, bhikkhuupi manaapikaani cakkhuvi~n~neyyaani ruupaani passanti...pe0... kaayavi~n~neyye pho.t.thabbe phusanti, mudukaani atthara.napaavura.naadiini paribhu~njanti, eta.m sabba.m va.t.tati. kasmaa itthiruupaa...pe0... itthipho.t.thabbaa eva na va.t.tanti, etepi va.t.tantii''ti. eva.m rasena rasa.m sa.msanditvaa sacchandaraagaparibhoga~nca nicchandaraagaparibhoga~nca eka.m katvaa thuulavaakehi saddhi.m atisukhumasutta.m ^a^V0.0126^ea^ gha.tento viya saasapena saddhi.m sineru.m upasa.mharanto viya paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppaadetvaa ``ki.m bhagavataa ^a^P4.0870^ea^ mahaasamudda.m bandhantena viya mahataa ussaahena pa.thamapaaraajika.m pa~n~natta.m, natthi ettha doso''ti sabba~n~nuta~n~naa.nena saddhi.m pa.tivirujjhanto bhabbapuggalaana.m aasa.m chindanto jinassa aa.naacakke pahaaramadaasi. tenaaha -- ``tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaamii''tiaadi.

[03]^b^a.t.thika"nkaluupamaa^eb^tiaadimhi ^a^M0.0139^ea^ ^b^a.t.thika"nkaluupamaa^eb^ appassaada.t.thena. ^b^ma.msapesuupamaa^eb^ bahusaadhaara.na.t.thena. ^b^ti.nukkuupamaa^eb^ anudahana.t.thena. ^b^a"ngaarakaasuupamaa^eb^ mahaabhitaapana.t.thena. ^b^supinakuupamaa^eb^ ittarapaccupa.t.thaana.t.thena. ^b^yaacitakuupamaa^eb^ taavakaalika.t.thena. ^b^rukkhaphaluupamaa^eb^ sabba"ngapacca"ngapalibha~njana.t.thena. ^b^asisuunuupamaa^eb^ adhiku.t.tana.t.thena. ^b^sattisuuluupamaa^eb^ vinivijjhana.t.thena. ^b^sappasiruupamaa^eb^ saasa"nkasappa.tibhaya.t.thenaati ayamettha sa"nkhepo. vitthaaro pana papa~ncasuudaniya.m majjhima.t.thakathaaya.m (ma0 ni0 1.234 aadayo; 2.42 aadayo) gahetabbo. ^b^eva.m byaakho^eb^ti eva.m viya kho. sesamettha pubbe vuttanayattaa uttaanameva.
[03]samanubhaasanasamu.t.thaana.m -- kaayavaacaacittato samu.t.thaati, akiriya.m, sa~n~naavimokkha.m, sacittaka.m, lokavajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, akusalacitta.m, dukkhavedananti.
[06] ari.t.thasikkhaapada.m a.t.thama.m.

[03] 424-5^b^.^eb^ navame -- ^b^aka.taanudhammenaa^eb^ti anudhammo vuccati aapattiyaa adassane vaa appa.tikamme vaa paapikaaya di.t.thiyaa appa.tinissagge vaa dhammena vinayena satthusaasanena ukkhittakassa anulomavatta.m disvaa kataa osaara.naa; so osaara.nasa"nkhaato anudhammo yassa na kato, aya.m aka.taanudhammo naama, taadisena saddhinti attho. tenevassa padabhaajane ``aka.taanudhammo naama ukkhitto anosaarito''ti vutta.m.

[03]^b^deti vaa pa.tigga.nhaati vaa^eb^ti ekapayogena bahumpi dadato vaa ga.nhato vaa eka.m paacittiya.m. vicchinditvaa vicchinditvaa dentassa ca ga.nhantassa ca payogaga.nanaaya paacittiyaani ^a^V0.0127^ea^. sesamettha uttaanameva. tisamu.t.thaana.m -- kiriya.m, sa~n~naavimokkha.m, sacittaka.m, pa.n.nattivajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, ticitta.m, tivedananti.
[06] ukkhittasambhogasikkhaapada.m navama.m.

[03] 428^b^.^eb^ dasame ^a^M0.0140^ea^ -- ^b^di.t.thigata.m uppanna^eb^nti ari.t.thassa viya etassaapi ayoniso ummujjantassa uppanna.m. ^b^naasetuu^eb^ti ettha tividhaa naasanaa -- sa.mvaasanaasanaa, li"nganaasanaa, da.n.dakammanaasanaati. tattha aapattiyaa adassanaadiisu ukkhepanaa sa.mvaasanaasanaa ^a^P4.0871^ea^ naama. ``duusako naasetabbo (paaraa0 66) mettiya.m bhikkhuni.m naasethaa''ti (paaraa0 384) aya.m li"nganaasanaa naama. ``ajjatagge te aavuso sama.nuddesa na ceva so bhagavaa satthaa apadisitabbo''ti aya.m da.n.dakammanaasanaa naama. aya.m idha adhippetaa. tenaaha -- ``eva~nca pana bhikkhave naasetabbo...pe0... vinassaa''ti. tattha ^b^caraa^eb^ti gaccha. ^b^pire^eb^ti para amaamaka. ^b^vinassaa^eb^ti nassa; yattha te na passaama, tattha gacchaati.

[03] 429^b^.^eb^ ^b^upalaapeyyaa^eb^ti sa"nga.nheyya. ^b^upa.t.thaapeyyaa^eb^ti tena attano upa.t.thaana.m kaaraapeyya. sesa.m ari.t.thasikkhaapade vuttanayeneva veditabba.m saddhi.m samu.t.thaanaadiihiiti.
[06] ka.n.takasikkhaapada.m dasama.m.
[06] samatto va.n.nanaakkamena sappaa.nakavaggo sattamo.

[03] 434^b^.^eb^ sahadhammikavaggassa ^a^V0.0128^ea^ pa.thamasikkhaapade -- ^b^etasmi.m sikkhaapade^eb^ti etasmi.m sikkhaapade ya.m vutta.m, ta.m na taava sikkhissaami. ^b^aapatti paacittiyassaa^eb^ti ettha pana vaacaaya vaacaaya aapatti veditabbaa. ^b^sikkhamaanena bhikkhave bhikkhunaa^eb^ti ovaada.m sirasaa sampa.ticchitvaa sikkhitukaameneva hutvaa aajaanitabba~nceva pucchitabba~nca upaparikkhitabba~nca. sesamettha dubbacasikkhaapade vuttanayeneva padatthato veditabba.m. vinicchayato uttaanameva.
[03]tisamu.t.thaana.m -- kiriya.m, sa~n~naavimokkha.m, sacittaka.m, lokavajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, akusalacitta.m, dukkhavedananti.
[06] sahadhammikasikkhaapada.m pa.thama.m.

[03] 438^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^a^M0.0141^ea^ -- ^b^vinayakatha.m kathetii^eb^ti vinayakathaa naama kappiyaakappiyaaapattaanaapattisa.mvarapahaanapa.tisa.myuttakathaa, ta.m katheti. ^b^vinayassa va.n.na.m bhaasatii^eb^ti vinayassa va.n.no naama pa~ncannampi sattannampi aapattikkhandhaana.m vasena maatika.m nikkhipitvaa padabhaajanena va.n.nanaa, ta.m bhaasati. ^b^vinayapariyattiyaa va.n.na.m bhaasatii^eb^ti vinaya.m pariyaapu.nantaana.m vinayapariyattimuulaka.m va.n.na.m gu.na.m aanisa.msa.m bhaasati. vinayadharo hi vinayapariyattimuulake pa~ncaanisa.mse chaanisa.mse sattaanisa.mse a.t.thaanisa.mse navaanisa.mse dasaanisa.mse ekaadasaanisa.mse ca labhati te sabbe bhaasatiiti attho. katame pa~ncaanisa.mse labhatiiti? attano siilakkhandhasuguttiaadike ^a^P4.0872^ea^. vutta~nheta.m --

[02] ``pa~ncime, bhikkhave, aanisa.msaa vinayadhare puggale -- attano siilakkhandho sugutto hoti surakkhito, kukkuccapakataana.m pa.tisara.na.m hoti, visaarado sa"nghamajjhe voharati, paccatthike ^a^V0.0129^ea^ sahadhammena suniggahita.m nigga.nhaati, saddhamma.t.thitiyaa pa.tipanno hotii''ti (pari0 325).

[03]kathamassa ^b^attano siilakkhandho sugutto hoti surakkhito?^eb^ idhekacco bhikkhu aapatti.m aapajjanto ^b^chahaakaarehi aapajjati^eb^ -- alajjitaa, a~n~naa.nataa, kukkuccapakatataa, akappiye kappiyasa~n~nitaa, kappiye akappiyasa~n~nitaa, satisammosaati.
[03]katha.m ^b^alajjitaaya^eb^ aapatti.m aapajjati? akappiyabhaava.m jaanantoyeva madditvaa viitikkama.m karoti. vuttampi ceta.m --
[21] ``sa~ncicca aapatti.m aapajjati, aapatti.m pariguuhati.
[22] agatigamana~nca gacchati, ediso vuccati alajjipuggalo''ti.. (pari0 359).
[03]katha.m ^b^a~n~naa.nataaya^eb^ aapajjati? a~n~naa.napuggalo hi mando momuuho kattabbaakattabba.m ajaananto akattabba.m karoti, kattabba.m viraadheti; eva.m a~n~naa.nataaya aapajjati.

[03]katha.m ^a^M0.0142^ea^ ^b^kukkuccapakatataaya^eb^ aapajjati? kappiyaakappiya.m nissaaya kukkucce uppanne vinayadhara.m pucchitvaa kappiya~nce kattabba.m siyaa, akappiya~nce na kattabba.m, aya.m pana ``va.t.tatii''ti madditvaa viitikkamatiyeva; eva.m kukkuccapakatataaya aapajjati.

[03]katha.m ^b^akappiye kappiyasa~n~nitaaya^eb^ aapajjati? acchama.msa.m suukarama.msanti khaadati, diipima.msa.m migama.msanti khaadati, akappiyabhojana.m kappiyabhojananti bhu~njati, vikaale kaalasa~n~naaya bhu~njati, akappiyapaanaka.m kappiyapaanakanti pivati; eva.m akappiye kappiyasa~n~nitaaya aapajjati.

[03]katha.m ^b^kappiye akappiyasa~n~nitaaya^eb^ aapajjati? suukarama.msa.m acchama.msanti khaadati, migama.msa.m diipima.msanti khaadati, kappiyabhojana.m akappiyabhojananti bhu~njati, kaale vikaalasa~n~naaya bhu~njati, kappiyapaanaka.m akappiyapaanakanti pivati; eva.m kappiye akappiyasa~n~nitaaya aapajjati.

[03]katha.m ^a^V0.0130^ea^ ^b^satisammosaaya^eb^ aapajjati? sahaseyyaciivaravippavaasabhesajjaciivarakaalaatikkamanapaccayaa aapatti~nca satisammosaaya aapajjati; evamidhekacco ^a^P4.0873^ea^ bhikkhu imehi ^b^chahaakaarehi aapatti.m^eb^ aapajjati.

[03]vinayadharo pana imehi ^b^chahaakaarehi aapatti.m naapajjati.^eb^ katha.m ^b^lajjitaaya^eb^ naapajjati? so hi ``passatha bho, aya.m kappiyaakappiya.m jaanantoyeva pa.n.nattiviitikkama.m karotii''ti ima.m paruupavaada.m rakkhantopi naapajjati; eva.m lajjitaaya naapajjati. sahasaa aapannampi desanaagaamini.m desetvaa vu.t.thaanagaaminiyaa vu.t.thahitvaa suddhante pati.t.thaati. tato --
[21] ``sa~ncicca aapatti.m na aapajjati, aapatti.m na pariguuhati.
[22] agatigamana~nca na gacchati, ediso vuccati lajjipuggalo''ti.. (pari0 359)
[03]imasmi.m lajjibhaave pati.t.thitova hoti.
[03]katha.m ^b^~naa.nataaya^eb^ naapajjati? so hi kappiyaakappiya.m jaanaati, tasmaa kappiyameva karoti, akappiya.m na karoti; eva.m ~naa.nataaya naapajjati.

[03]katha.m ^b^akukkuccapakatataaya^eb^ naapajjati? so hi kappiyaakappiya.m nissaaya kukkucce uppanne vatthu.m oloketvaa maatika.m padabhaajana.m antaraapatti.m ^a^M0.0143^ea^ aapatti.m anaapatti~nca oloketvaa kappiya~nce hoti karoti, akappiya~nce na karoti; eva.m akukkuccapakatataaya naapajjati.

[03]katha.m ^b^akappiyaadisa~n~nitaaya^eb^ naapajjati? so hi kappiyaakappiya.m jaanaati, tasmaa akappiye kappiyasa~n~nii na hoti, kappiye akappiyasa~n~nii na hoti; suppati.t.thitaa cassa sati hoti, adhi.t.thaatabba.m adhi.t.theti, vikappetabba.m vikappeti. iti imehi chahaakaarehi aapatti.m naapajjati. aapatti.m anaapajjanto akha.n.dasiilo hoti parisuddhasiilo; evamassa attano siilakkhandho sugutto hoti surakkhito.

[03]katha.m ^b^kukkuccapakataana.m pa.tisara.na.m hoti?^eb^ tirora.t.thesu tirojanapadesu ca uppannakukkuccaa bhikkhuu ``asukasmi.m kira vihaare vinayadharo vasatii''ti duuratopi tassa santika.m aagantvaa kukkucca.m ^a^V0.0131^ea^ pucchanti, so tehi katassa kammassa vatthu.m oloketvaa aapattaanaapattigarukalahukaadibheda.m sallakkhetvaa desanaagaamini.m desaapetvaa vu.t.thaanagaaminiyaa vu.t.thaapetvaa suddhante pati.t.thaapeti; eva.m kukkuccapakataana.m pa.tisara.na.m hoti.

[03]^b^visaarado sa"nghamajjhe voharatii^eb^ti avinayadharassa hi sa"nghamajjhe ^a^P4.0874^ea^ kathentassa bhaya.m saarajja.m okkamati, vinayadharassa ta.m na hoti. kasmaa? ``eva.m kathentassa doso hoti; eva.m na doso''ti ~natvaa kathanato.

[03]^b^paccatthike sahadhammena suniggahita.m nigga.nhaatii^eb^ti ettha dvidhaa paccatthikaa naama -- attapaccatthikaa ca saasanapaccatthikaa ca. tattha mettiyabhummajakaa ca bhikkhuu va.d.dho ca licchavii amuulakena antimavatthunaa codesu.m, ime attapaccatthikaa naama. ye vaa pana~n~nepi dussiilaa paapadhammaa, sabbe te attapaccatthikaa. vipariitadassanaa pana ari.t.thabhikkhuka.n.takasaama.neravesaalikavajjiputtakaa paruupahaaraa~n~naa.naka"nkhaaparavitara.naadivaadaa mahaasa"nghikaadayo ca abuddhasaasana.m ``buddhasaasana''nti vatvaa katapaggahaa saasanapaccatthikaa naama. te sabbepi sahadhammena sakaara.nena vacanena yathaa ta.m asaddhamma.m pati.t.thaapetu.m na sakkonti, eva.m suniggahita.m katvaa nigga.nhaati.

[03]^b^saddhamma.t.thitiyaa^eb^ ^a^M0.0144^ea^ ^b^pa.tipanno hotii^eb^ti ettha pana tividho saddhammo pariyattipa.tipattiadhigamavasena. tattha tepi.taka.m buddhavacana.m ^b^pariyattisaddhammo^eb^ naama. terasa dhuta"ngagu.naa cuddasa khandhakavattaani dveasiiti mahaavattaaniiti aya.m ^b^pa.tipattisaddhammo^eb^ naama. cattaaro maggaa ca phalaani caati aya.m ^b^adhigamasaddhammo^eb^ naama.

[03]tattha keci theraa ``yo vo, aananda, mayaa dhammo ca vinayo ca desito pa~n~natto, so vo mamaccayena satthaa''ti (dii0 ni0 2.216) iminaa suttena ^b^``saasanassa pariyatti muula''^eb^nti vadanti. keci theraa ``ime ca subhadda bhikkhuu sammaa vihareyyu.m, asu~n~no loko arahantehi assaa''ti (dii0 ni0 2.214) iminaa suttena ^b^``saasanassa pa.tipattimuula''^eb^nti vatvaa ``yaava pa~nca bhikkhuu sammaa pa.tipannaa sa.mvijjanti, taava saasana.m .thita.m hotii''ti aaha.msu. itare pana theraa pariyattiyaa antarahitaaya suppa.tipannassapi dhammaabhisamayo natthii''ti aaha.msu. sace pa~nca bhikkhuu cattaari paaraajikaani rakkha.nakaa honti, te saddhe kulaputte pabbaajetvaa paccantime janapade upasampaadetvaa dasavagga.m ga.na.m puuretvaa majjhime janapadepi upasampada.m ^a^V0.0132^ea^ karissanti, etenupaayena viisativaggaga.na.m sa"ngha.m puuretvaa attanopi abbhaanakamma.m katvaa saasana.m vu.d.dhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m gamayissanti. evamaya.m vinayadharo ^a^P4.0875^ea^ tividhassaapi saddhammassa cira.t.thitiyaa pa.tipanno hotiiti evamaya.m vinayadharo ime taava pa~ncaanisa.mse pa.tilabhatiiti veditabbo.
[03]katame cha aanisa.mse labhatiiti? tassaadheyyo uposatho, pavaara.naa, sa"nghakamma.m, pabbajjaa, upasampadaa, nissaya.m deti saama.nera.m upa.t.thaapeti.
[03]ye ime caatuddasiko, pannarasiko, saamaggiuposatho, sa"nghe uposatho, ga.ne puggale uposatho, suttuddeso, paarisuddhi, adhi.t.thaanauposathoti nava uposathaa, sabbe te vinayadharaayattaa.

[03]yaapi ca imaa caatuddasikaa pannarasikaa, saamaggipavaara.naa, sa"nghe pavaara.naa ga.ne puggale pavaara.naa, tevaacikaa, dvevaacikaa, samaanavassikaa pavaara.naati nava pavaara.naayo, taapi vinayadharaayattaa eva, tassa santakaa, so taasa.m saamii.
[03]yaanipi ^a^M0.0145^ea^ imaani apalokanakamma.m ~nattikamma.m ~nattidutiyakamma.m ~natticatutthakammanti cattaari sa"nghakammaani, taani vinayadharaayattaani.

[03]yaapi caaya.m upajjhaayena hutvaa kulaputtaana.m pabbajjaa ca upasampadaa ca kaatabbaa, ayampi vinayadharaayattaava. na hi a~n~no dvipi.takadharopi eta.m kaatu.m labhati. so eva nissaya.m deti, saama.nera.m upa.t.thaapeti. a~n~no neva nissaya.m daatu.m labhati, na saama.nera.m upa.t.thaapetu.m. saama.neruupa.t.thaana.m paccaasiisanto pana vinayadharassa santike upajjha.m gaahaapetvaa vattapa.tipatti.m saaditu.m labhati. ettha ca nissayadaana~nceva saama.neruupa.t.thaana~nca ekama"nga.m.

[03]iti imesu chasu aanisa.msesu ekena saddhi.m purimaa pa~nca cha honti, dviihi saddhi.m satta, tiihi saddhi.m a.t.tha, catuuhi saddhi.m nava, pa~ncahi saddhi.m dasa, sabbehi petehi saddhi.m ekaadasaati eva.m vinayadharo puggalo pa~nca cha satta a.t.tha nava dasa ekaadasa ca aanisa.mse labhatiiti veditabbo. eva.m bhagavaa ime aanisa.mse dassento vinayapariyattiyaa va.n.na.m bhaasatiiti veditabbo.

[03]^b^aadissa^eb^ ^a^V0.0133^ea^ ^b^aadissaa^eb^ti punappuna.m vavatthapetvaa visu.m visu.m katvaa. ^b^aayasmato upaalissa va.n.na.m bhaasatii^eb^ti vinayapariyatti.m nissaaya ^a^P4.0876^ea^ upaalittherassa gu.na.m bhaasati thometi pasa.msati. kasmaa? appeva naama mama va.n.nana.m sutvaapi bhikkhuu upaalissa santike vinaya.m uggahetabba.m pariyaapu.nitabba.m ma~n~neyyu.m, evamida.m saasana.m addhaniya.m bhavissati, pa~ncavassasahassaani pavattissatiiti.

[03]^b^tedha bahuu bhikkhuu^eb^ti te ima.m bhagavato va.n.nana.m sutvaa ``ime kiraanisa.mse neva suttantikaa na aabhidhammikaa labhantii''ti yathaaparikittitaanisa.msaadhigame ussaahajaataa bahuu bhikkhuu theraa ca navaa ca majjhimaa ca aayasmato upaalissa santike vinaya.m pariyaapu.nantiiti ayamettha attho. ^b^idhaa^eb^ti nipaatamattameva.

[03] 439-40^b^.^eb^ ^b^uddissamaane^eb^ti aacariyena antevaasikassa uddissamaane, so pana yasmaa aacariye attano ruciyaa uddisante vaa aacariya.m yaacitvaa ^a^M0.0146^ea^ antevaasikena uddisaapente vaa yo na.m dhaareti, tasmi.m sajjhaaya.m karonte vaa uddissamaano naama hoti, tasmaa ``uddisante vaa uddisaapente vaa sajjhaaya.m vaa karonte''ti padabhaajana.m vutta.m. ^b^khuddaanukhuddakehii^eb^ti khuddakehi ca anukhuddakehi ca. ^b^yaavadevaa^eb^ti tesa.m sa.mvattanamariyaadaparicchedavacana.m. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- etaani hi ye uddisanti, uddisaapenti sajjhaayanti vaa, tesa.m taava sa.mvattanti yaava ``kappati nu kho, na kappati nu kho''ti kukkuccasa"nkhaato vippa.tisaaro vihesaa vicikicchaasa"nkhaato manovilekho ca uppajjatiyeva. atha vaa ^b^yaavadevaa^eb^ti atisayavavatthaapana.m; tassa sa.mvattantiiti iminaa sambandho, kukkuccaaya vihesaaya vilekhaaya ativiya sa.mvattantiyevaati vutta.m hoti. ^b^upasampannassa vinaya.m viva.n.netii^eb^ti upasampannassa santike tassa tasmi.m vimati.m uppaadetukaamo vinaya.m viva.n.neti nindati garahati. sesamettha uttaanameva.
[03]tisamu.t.thaana.m -- kiriya.m, sa~n~naavimokkha.m, sacittaka.m, lokavajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, akusalacitta.m, dukkhavedananti.
[06] vilekhanasikkhaapada.m dutiya.m.

[03] 444^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^V0.0134^ea^ -- ^b^anvaddhamaasa^eb^nti anupa.tipaa.tiyaa addhamaase addhamaase; yasmaa pana so uposathadivase uddisiyati, tasmaa ``anuposathika''nti padabhaajane vutta.m. ^b^uddissamaane^eb^ti uddisiyamaane ^a^P4.0877^ea^. yasmaa pana so paatimokkhuddesake uddisante uddisiyamaano naama hoti, tasmaa ``uddisante''ti padabhaajane vutta.m. ^b^ya~nca tattha aapatti.m aapanno^eb^ti tasmi.m anaacaare ci.n.ne ya.m aapatti.m aapanno. ^b^yathaadhammo kaaretabbo^eb^ti a~n~naa.nena aapannattaa tassaa aapattiyaa mokkho natthi, yathaa pana dhammo ca vinayo ca .thito, tathaa kaaretabbo. desanaagaamini~nce aapanno hoti, desaapetabbo, vu.t.thaanagaamini~nce, vu.t.thaapetabboti attho. ^b^saadhuka^eb^nti su.t.thu. ^b^a.t.thi.mkatvaa^eb^ti atthikabhaava.m katvaa; atthiko hutvaati vutta.m hoti.

[03] 447^b^.^eb^ ^b^dhammakamme^eb^tiaadiisu ^a^M0.0147^ea^ mohaaropanakamma.m adhippeta.m. sesamettha uttaanameva. tisamu.t.thaana.m -- kiriya.m, sa~n~naavimokkha.m, sacittaka.m, lokavajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, akusalacitta.m, dukkhavedananti.
[06] mohanasikkhaapada.m tatiya.m.
[03] 449^b^.^eb^ catutthe -- ^b^pahaara.m dentii^eb^ti ``aavuso pii.thaka.m pa~n~napetha, paadadhovana.m aaharathaa''tiaadiini vatvaa tathaa akarontaana.m pahaara.m denti.

[03] 451^b^.^eb^ ^b^pahaara.m deti aapatti paacittiyassaa^eb^ti ettha paharitukaamataaya pahaare dinne sacepi marati paacittiyameva. pahaarena hattho vaa paado vaa bhijjati, siisa.m vaa bhinna.m hoti, paacittiyameva. ``yathaaya.m sa"nghamajjhe na virocati, tathaa na.m karomii''ti eva.m viruupakara.naadhippaayena ka.n.na.m vaa naasa.m vaa chindati, dukka.ta.m.

[03] 452^b^.^eb^ ^b^anupasampannassaa^eb^ti gaha.t.thassa vaa pabbajitassa vaa itthiyaa vaa purisassa vaa antamaso tiracchaanagatassaapi pahaara.m deti, dukka.ta.m. sace pana rattacitto itthi.m paharati, sa"nghaadiseso.

[03] 453^b^.^eb^ ^b^kenaci^eb^ ^a^V0.0135^ea^ ^b^vihe.thiyamaano^eb^ti manussena vaa tiracchaanagatena vaa vihe.thiyamaano. ^b^mokkhaadhippaayo^eb^ti tato attano mokkha.m patthayamaano. ^b^pahaara.m detii^eb^ti kaayakaayapa.tibaddhanissaggiyaana.m a~n~natarena pahaara.m deti, anaapatti. sacepi antaraamagge cora.m vaa paccatthika.m vaa vihe.thetukaama.m disvaa ``upaasaka, ettheva ti.t.tha, maa aagamii''ti vatvaa vacana.m anaadiyitvaa aagacchanta.m ``gaccha re''ti muggarena vaa satthakena vaa paharitvaa yaati, so ce tena pahaarena marati, anaapattiyeva. vaa.lamigesupi eseva nayo. sesamettha uttaanameva. samu.t.thaanaadiini panassa ^a^P4.0878^ea^ pa.thamapaaraajikasadisaani, ida.m pana dukkhavedananti.
[06] pahaarasikkhaapada.m catuttha.m.

[03] 454^b^.^eb^ pa~ncame ^a^M0.0148^ea^ -- ^b^talasattika.m uggirantii^eb^ti pahaaradaanaakaara.m dassetvaa kaayampi kaayapa.tibaddhampi uccaarenti. ^b^te pahaarasamuccitaa rodantii^eb^ti te pahaaraparicitaa pubbepi laddhapahaarattaa idaani ca pahaara.m dassantiiti ma~n~namaanaa rodantiiti attho. ``pahaarassa muccitaa''tipi sajjhaayanti, tattha ``pahaarassa bhiitaa''ti attho.

[03] 457^b^.^eb^ ^b^uggirati aapatti paacittiyassaa^eb^ti ettha sace uggiritvaa viraddho pahaara.m deti, avassa.m dhaaretu.m asakkontassa pahaaro sahasaa patati, na paharitukaamataaya dinnattaa dukka.ta.m. tena pahaarena hatthaadiisu ya.mki~nci bhijjati, dukka.tameva.

[03] 458^b^.^eb^ ^b^mokkhaadhippaayo talasattika.m uggiratii^eb^ti ettha pubbe vuttesu vatthuusu purimanayeneva talasattika.m uggirantassa anaapatti. sacepi virajjhitvaa pahaara.m deti, anaapattiyeva. sesa.m purimasadisameva saddhi.m samu.t.thaanaadiihiiti.
[06] talasattikasikkhaapada.m pa~ncama.m.

[03] 459^b^.^eb^ cha.t.the -- ^b^anuddha.msentii^eb^ti te kira saya.m aaki.n.nadosattaa ``eva.m bhikkhuu amhe neva ^a^V0.0136^ea^ codessanti, na saaressantii''ti attaparittaa.na.m karontaa pa.tikacceva bhikkhuu amuulakena sa"nghaadisesena codenti. sesamettha terasakamhi amuulakasikkhaapade vuttanayattaa uttaanameva.
[03]tisamu.t.thaana.m -- kiriya.m, sa~n~naavimokkha.m, sacittaka.m, lokavajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, akusalacitta.m, dukkhavedananti.
[06] amuulakasikkhaapada.m cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 464^b^.^eb^ sattame -- ^b^upadahantii^eb^ti uppaadenti. ^b^kukkucca.m upadahati aapatti paacittiyassaa^eb^ti vaacaaya vaacaaya aapatti. ^b^anupasampannassaa^eb^ti saama.nerassa ^a^M0.0149^ea^. maatugaamena saddhi.m raho ma~n~ne tayaa nisinna.m nipanna.m bhutta.m piita.m, sa"nghamajjhe ida~ncida~nca katantiaadinaa nayena kukkucca.m upadahati, vaacaaya vaacaaya dukka.ta.m. sesamettha uttaanameva. samu.t.thaanaadiinipi ^a^P4.0879^ea^ amuulakasadisaanevaati.
[06] sa~nciccasikkhaapada.m sattama.m.

[03] 471^b^.^eb^ a.t.thame -- ^b^adhikara.najaataana^eb^nti etehi bha.n.danaadiihi uppannavivaadaadhikara.naana.m. ^b^upassuti^eb^nti sutisamiipa.m; yattha .thatvaa sakkaa hoti tesa.m vacana.m sotu.m, tatthaati attho. ^b^gacchati aapatti dukka.tassaa^eb^ti ettha padavaare padavaare dukka.ta.m. ^b^mantenta^eb^nti a~n~nena saddhi.m a~n~nasmi.m mantayamaane; ``mantente''ti vaa paa.tho, ayamevattho.

[03] 473^b^.^eb^ ^b^vuupasamissaamii^eb^ti upasama.m gamissaami, kalaha.m na karissaami. ^b^attaana.m parimocessaamii^eb^ti mama akaarakabhaava.m kathetvaa attaana.m mocessaami. sesamettha uttaanameva.

[03]theyyasatthasamu.t.thaana.m -- kaayacittato kaayavaacaacittato ca samu.t.thaati, siyaa kiriya.m sotukaamataaya gamanavasena, siyaa akiriya.m .thita.t.thaana.m aagantvaa mantayamaanaana.m ajaanaapanavasena, ^a^V0.0137^ea^ ruupiya.m a~n~navaadaka.m upassutiiti imaani hi tii.ni sikkhaapadaani ekaparicchedaani, sa~n~naavimokkha.m, sacittaka.m, lokavajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, akusalacitta.m, dukkhavedananti.
[06] upassutisikkhaapada.m a.t.thama.m.

[03] 474^b^.^eb^ navame -- ^b^sace ca maya.m jaaneyyaamaa^eb^ti sace maya.m jaaneyyaama; cakaaro pana nipaatamattameva. ^b^dhammikaana^eb^nti dhammena vinayena satthusaasanena katattaa dhammaa etesu atthiiti dhammikaani; tesa.m dhammikaana.m catunna.m sa"nghakammaana.m. ^b^khiyyati aapatti paacittiyassaa^eb^ti ettha vaacaaya vaacaaya paacittiya.m ^a^M0.0150^ea^. sesa.m uttaanameva. tisamu.t.thaana.m -- kiriya.m, sa~n~naavimokkha.m, sacittaka.m, lokavajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, akusalacitta.m, dukkhavedananti.
[06] kammapa.tibaahanasikkhaapada.m navama.m.
[03] 481^b^.^eb^ dasame -- ^b^vatthu vaa aarocita^eb^nti codakena ca cuditakena ca attano kathaa kathitaa, anuvijjako sammato, ettaavataapi vatthumeva aarocita.m hoti. sesamettha uttaanameva.

[03]dhuranikkhepasamu.t.thaana.m -- kaayavaacaacittato samu.t.thaati, kiriyaakiriya.m, sa~n~naavimokkha.m, sacittaka.m, lokavajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m ^a^P4.0880^ea^, akusalacitta.m, dukkhavedananti.
[06] chanda.m adatvaa gamanasikkhaapada.m dasama.m.
[03] 484^b^.^eb^ ekaadasame -- ^b^yathaamittataa^eb^ti yathaamittataaya; yo yo mitto, tassa tassa detiiti vutta.m hoti. esa nayo sabbapadesu. sesa.m ujjhaapanakaadiisu vuttanayattaa uttaanatthameva.
[03]tisamu.t.thaana.m ^a^V0.0138^ea^ -- kiriya.m, sa~n~naavimokkha.m, sacittaka.m, lokavajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m akusalacitta.m, dukkhavedananti.
[06] dubbalasikkhaapada.m ekaadasama.m.

[03] 489^b^.^eb^ dvaadasame -- ya.m vattabba.m siyaa, ta.m sabba.m ti.msake pari.naamanasikkhaapade vuttanayameva. ayameva hi viseso -- tattha attano pari.naamitattaa nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m, idha puggalassa pari.naamitattaa suddhikapaacittiyanti.
[03]tisamu.t.thaana.m ^a^M0.0151^ea^ -- kiriya.m, sa~n~naavimokkha.m, sacittaka.m, lokavajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, akusalacitta.m, tivedananti.
[06] pari.naamanasikkhaapada.m dvaadasama.m.
[06] samatto va.n.nanaakkamena sahadhammikavaggo a.t.thamo.

[03] 494^b^.^eb^ raajavaggassa pa.thamasikkhaapade -- ^b^orako^eb^ti parittako. ^b^uparipaasaadavaragato^eb^ti paasaadavarassa uparigato. ^b^ayyaana.m vaahasaa^eb^ti ayyaana.m kaara.naa; tehi jaanaapitattaa jaanaamiiti vutta.m hoti.

[03] 497^b^.^eb^ ^b^pitara.m patthetii^eb^ti antara.m passitvaa ghaatetu.m icchati. ^b^raajantepura.m hatthisammadda^eb^ntiaadiisu hatthiihi sammaddo etthaati ^b^hatthisammadda.m;^eb^ hatthisambaadhanti attho. ^b^assarathasammaddapade^eb^pi ^a^V0.0139^ea^ eseva nayo. ``sammatta''nti keci pa.thanti, ta.m na gahetabba.m. ``ra~n~no antepure hatthisammadda''ntipi paa.tho, tattha hatthiina.m sammadda.m hatthisammaddanti attho, ra~n~no antepure hatthisammaddo atthiiti vutta.m hoti. esa nayo sesapadesupi. ^b^rajaniiyaanii^eb^ti tasmi.m antepure edisaani ruupaadiini.

[03] 498^b^.^eb^ ^b^muddhaavasittassaa^eb^ti muddhani avasittassa. anikkhanto raajaa itoti anikkhantaraajaka.m, tasmi.m ^b^anikkhantaraajake;^eb^ sayanighareti attho. ratana.m ^a^P4.0881^ea^ vuccati mahesii, niggatanti nikkhanta.m, aniggata.m ratana.m itoti aniggataratanaka.m, tasmi.m ^b^aniggataratanake;^eb^ sayanighareti attho. sesamettha uttaanameva.

[03]kathinasamu.t.thaana.m -- kaayavaacato kaayavaacaacittato ca samu.t.thaati, kiriyaakiriya.m, nosa~n~naavimokkha.m, acittaka.m, pa.n.nattivajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, ticitta.m, tivedananti.
[06] antepurasikkhaapada.m pa.thama.m.

[03] 502-3^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^a^M0.0152^ea^ -- ^b^vissaritvaa^eb^ti pamussitvaa. ^b^pu.n.napatta.m^eb^ naama satato pa~nca kahaapa.naa. ^b^kyaaha.m karissaamii^eb^ti ki.m aha.m karissaami. ^b^aabhara.na.m omu~ncitvaa^eb^ti mahaalata.m naama navako.tiagghanaka.m ala"nkaara.m apanetvaa.
[03] 504^b^.^eb^ ^b^antevaasii^eb^ti paricaarako.

[03] 506^b^.^eb^ ^b^aparikkhittassa upacaaro^eb^ti ettha upacaaro naama aaraamassa dve le.d.dupaataa -- ``aavasathassa pana suppapaato vaa musalapaato vaa''ti mahaapaccariya.m vutta.m. ^b^ugga.nhaati aapatti paacittiyassaa^eb^ti ettha jaataruuparajata.m attano atthaaya ugga.nhantassa vaa ugga.nhaapentassa vaa nissaggiya.m paacittiya.m, sa"nghaga.napuggalacetiyanavakammaana.m atthaaya dukka.ta.m, avasesa.m muttaadiratana.m attano vaa sa"nghaadiina.m vaa atthaaya ugga.nhantassa vaa ugga.nhaapentassa vaa dukka.ta.m. kappiyavatthu vaa akappiyavatthu vaa hotu, antamaso maatu ka.n.napi.landhanataa.lapa.n.nampi gihisantaka.m bha.n.daagaarikasiisena pa.tisaamentassa paacittiyameva.

[03]sace ^a^V0.0140^ea^ pana maataapituuna.m santaka.m avassa.m pa.tisaametabba.m kappiyabha.n.da.m hoti, attano atthaaya gahetvaa pa.tisaametabba.m. ``ida.m pa.tisaametvaa dehii''ti vutte pana ``na va.t.tatii''ti pa.tikkhipitabba.m. sace ``pa.tisaamehii''ti paatetvaa gacchanti, palibodho naama hoti, pa.tisaametu.m va.t.tati. vihaare kamma.m karontaa va.d.dhakiiaadayo vaa raajavallabhaa vaa attano upakara.nabha.n.da.m vaa sayanabha.n.da.m vaa ``pa.tisaametvaa dethaa''ti vadanti, chandenapi bhayenapi na kaatabbameva, gutta.t.thaana.m pana dassetu.m va.t.tati. balakkaarena paatetvaa gatesu ca pa.tisaametu.m va.t.tati.

[03]^b^ajjhaaraame vaa ajjhaavasathe vaa^eb^ti ettha sace mahaavihaarasadiso mahaaraamo hoti, tattha paakaaraparikkhitte parive.ne yattha bhikkhuuhi ^a^P4.0882^ea^ vaa saama.nerehi vaa gahita.m bhavissatiiti sa"nkaa uppajjati, taadise eva .thaane ugga.nhitvaa vaa ugga.nhaapetvaa vaa .thapetabba.m. mahaabodhidvaarako.t.thakaamba"nga.nasadisesu pana mahaajanasa~ncara.na.t.thaanesu na gahetabba.m, palibodho na hoti. kurundiya.m pana vutta.m ``eko magga.m gacchanto nimanussa.t.thaane ki~nci bha.n.da.m passati, aaki.n.namanussepi jaate manussaa tameva ^a^M0.0153^ea^ bhikkhu.m aasa"nkanti, tasmaa maggaa okkamma nisiiditabba.m. saamikesu aagatesu ta.m aacikkhitabba.m. sace saamike na passati patiruupa.m karissatii''ti.

[03]^b^ruupena vaa nimittena vaa sa~n~naa.na.m katvaa^eb^ti ettha ruupa.m naama antobha.n.dikaaya bha.n.da.m; tasmaa bha.n.dika.m mu~ncitvaa ga.netvaa ettakaa kahaapa.naa vaa jaataruuparajata.m vaati sallakkhetabba.m. ^b^nimitta^eb^nti la~nchanaadi; tasmaa la~nchitaaya bha.n.dikaaya mattikaala~nchananti vaa laakhaala~nchananti vaa niilapilotikaaya bha.n.dikaa kataati vaa setapilotikaaya kataati vaa evamaadi sabba.m sallakkhetabba.m.

[03]^b^bhikkhuu patiruupaa^eb^ti lajjino kukkuccakaa. lolajaatikaana~nhi hatthe .thapetu.m na labhati. yo pana neva tamhaa aavaasaa pakkamati, na saamike passati, tenaapi attano ciivaraadimuula.m na kaatabba.m; thaavara.m pana senaasana.m vaa cetiya.m vaa pokkhara.nii vaa kaaretabbaa. sace diighassa addhuno accayena saamiko aagacchati, ``upaasaka tava santakena ida.m naama kata.m, anumodaahii''ti vattabbo. sace anumodati, icceta.m kusala.m; no ce anumodati, ``mama dhana.m dethaa''ti codetiyeva, a~n~na.m samaadapetvaa daatabba.m.

[03] 507^b^.^eb^ ^b^ratanasammata.m^eb^ ^a^V0.0141^ea^ ^b^vissaasa.m ga.nhaatii^eb^tiaadiisu aamaasameva sandhaaya vutta.m. anaamaasa.m na va.t.tatiyeva. sesamettha uttaanameva. chasamu.t.thaana.m -- kiriya.m, nosa~n~naavimokkha.m, acittaka.m, pa.n.nattivajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, ticitta.m, tivedananti.
[06] ratanasikkhaapada.m dutiya.m.
[03] 508^b^.^eb^ tatiye -- ^b^tiracchaanakatha^eb^nti ariyamaggassa tiracchaanabhuuta.m katha.m. ^b^raajakatha^eb^nti raajapa.tisa.myutta katha.m. ^b^corakathaa^eb^diisupi eseva nayo.

[03] 512^b^.^eb^ ^b^santa.m bhikkhu^eb^nti ettha ya.m vattabba.m ^a^P4.0883^ea^, ta.m caarittasikkhaapade vuttameva. sace sambahulaa kenaci kammena gaama.m pavisanti, ``vikaale gaamappavesana.m aapucchaamii''ti ^a^M0.0154^ea^ sabbehi a~n~nama~n~na.m aapucchitabba.m. tasmi.m gaame ta.m kamma.m na sampajjatiiti a~n~na.m gaama.m gacchanti, gaamasatampi hotu, puna aapucchanakicca.m natthi. sace pana ussaaha.m pa.tippassambhetvaa vihaara.m gacchantaa antaraa a~n~na.m gaama.m pavisitukaamaa honti, puna aapucchitabbameva.

[03]kulaghare vaa aasanasaalaaya vaa bhattakicca.m katvaa telabhikkhaaya vaa sappibhikkhaaya vaa caritukaamo hoti, sace passe bhikkhu atthi, aapucchitvaa gantabba.m. asante natthiiti gantabba.m. viithi.m otaritvaa bhikkhu.m passati, aapucchanakicca.m natthi, anaapucchitvaapi caritabbameva. gaamamajjhena maggo hoti, tena gacchantassa telaadibhikkhaaya carissaamiiti citte uppanne sace passe bhikkhu atthi, aapucchitvaa caritabba.m. maggaa anokkamma bhikkhaaya carantassa pana aapucchanakicca.m natthi, aparikkhittassa gaamassa upacaaro adinnaadaane vuttanayeneva veditabbo.

[03] 515^b^.^eb^ ^b^antaraaraama^eb^ntiaadiisu na kevala.m anaapucchaa kaayabandhana.m abandhitvaa sa"nghaa.ti.m apaarupitvaa gacchantassapi anaapatti. ^b^aapadaasuu^eb^ti siiho vaa byaggho vaa aagacchati, megho vaa u.t.theti, a~n~no vaa koci upaddavo uppajjati, anaapatti. evaruupaasu aapadaasu bahigaamato antogaama.m pavisitu.m va.t.tati. sesamettha uttaanameva.

[06] nisiidanasikkhaapada.m sattama.m.

[03] 552^b^.^eb^ pa.thamapaa.tidesaniiye taava ^b^pa.tikkamanakaale^eb^ti pi.n.daaya caritvaa pa.tiaagamanakaale. ^b^sabbeva aggahesii^eb^ti sabbameva aggahesi. ^b^pavedhentii^eb^ti kampamaanaa. ^b^apehii^eb^ti apagaccha.

[03] 553-5^b^.^eb^ ^b^gaarayha.m aavuso^eb^tiaadi pa.tidesetabbaakaaradassana.m. ^b^rathikaa^eb^ti racchaa. ^b^byuuha^eb^nti anibbijjhitvaa .thitaa gatapaccaagataracchaa. ^b^si"nghaa.taka^eb^nti catukko.na.m vaa tiko.na.m vaa maggasamodhaana.t.thaana.m. ^b^ghara^eb^nti kulaghara.m. etesu yattha katthaci .thatvaa ga.nhantassa gaha.ne dukka.ta.m, ajjhohaare ajjhohaaraga.nanaaya paa.tidesaniiya.m. hatthisaalaadiisu ga.nhantassaapi eseva nayo. bhikkhunii rathikaaya .thatvaa deti, bhikkhu sacepi antaraaraamaadiisu .thatvaa ga.nhaati, aapattiyeva. ``antaraghara.m pavi.t.thaayaa''ti hi vacanato bhikkhuniyaa antaraghare .thatvaa dadamaanaaya vasenettha aapatti veditabbaa, bhikkhussa .thita.t.thaana.m pana appamaa.na.m. tasmaa sacepi viithiaadiisu .thito bhikkhu antaraaraamaadiisu .thatvaa dadamaanaaya bhikkhuniyaa ga.nhaati, anaapattiyeva.

[03]^b^yaamakaalika.m sattaahakaalika.m yaavajiivika.m aahaaratthaaya pa.tigga.nhaati, aapatti dukka.tassa^eb^. ^b^ajjhohaare ajjhohaare aapatti dukka.tassaa^eb^ti ida.m aamisena asambhinna.m sandhaaya vutta.m, sambhinne pana ^a^V0.0146^ea^ ekarase paa.tidesaniiyameva. ^b^ekato upasampannaayaa^eb^ti bhikkhuniina.m santike upasampannaaya. bhikkhuuna.m santike upasampannaaya pana yathaavatthukameva.

[03] 556^b^.^eb^ ^b^daapeti na detii^eb^ti a~n~naatikaa a~n~nena kenaci daapeti ta.m ga.nhantassa anaapatti. ^b^upanikkhipitvaa detii^eb^ti bhuumiya.m .thapetvaa ``ida.m ayya tumhaaka.m dammii''ti deti, eva.m dinna.m ``saadhu bhaginii''ti sampa.ticchitvaa taaya eva vaa bhikkhuniyaa a~n~nena vaa kenaci pa.tiggahaapetvaa bhu~njitu.m va.t.tati. ^b^sikkhamaanaaya^eb^ ^a^M0.0158^ea^^b^ saama.neriyaa^eb^ti etaasa.m dadamaanaana.m ga.nhantassa anaapatti. sesamettha uttaanameva.

[03] 562^b^.^eb^ tatiye -- ^b^ubhatopasanna^eb^nti dviihi pasanna.m upaasakenapi upaasikaayapi. tasmi.m kira kule ubhopi te sotaapannaayeva. ^b^bhogena haayatii^eb^ti edisa~nhi kula.m sacepi asiitiko.tidhana.m ^a^V0.0147^ea^ hoti, bhogehi haayatiyeva. kasmaa? yasmaa tattha neva upaasikaa na upaasako bhoge rakkhati.

[03] 569^b^.^eb^ ^b^gharato niiharitvaa dentii^eb^ti aasanasaala.m vaa vihaara.m vaa aanetvaa denti. sacepi anaagate bhikkhumhi pa.thama.myeva niiharitvaa dvaare .thapetvaa pacchaa sampattassa denti, va.t.tati. bhikkhu.m pana disvaa antogehato niiharitvaa diyyamaana.m na va.t.tatiiti mahaapaccariya.m vutta.m. sesamettha uttaanameva ^a^M0.0159^ea^. e.lakalomasamu.t.thaana.m -- kiriya.m, nosa~n~naavimokkha.m, acittaka.m, pa.n.nattivajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m ticitta.m, tivedananti.

[03] 573^b^.^eb^ ^b^pa~ncanna.m pa.tisa.mvidita^eb^nti pa~ncasu sahadhammikesu ya.mki~nci pesetvaa khaadaniiya.m bhojaniiya.m aaharissaamaati pa.tisa.mvidita.m katampi appa.tisa.mviditamevaati attho. ^b^aaraama.m aaraamuupacaara.m .thapetvaa^eb^ti aara~n~nakasenaasanaaraama~nca tassa upacaara~nca ^a^P4.0888^ea^ .thapetvaa; upacaarato nikkhanta.m antaraamagge bhikkhu.m disvaa vaa gaama.m aagatassa vaa pa.tisa.mvidita.m katampi appa.tisa.mviditameva hotiiti veditabba.m. ^b^sace saasa"nka.m hoti saasa"nkanti aacikkhitabba^eb^nti kasmaa aacikkhitabba.m? aaraame core vasante amhaaka.m naarocentiiti vacanapa.timocanattha.m. ^b^coraa vattabbaa manussaa idhuupacarantii^eb^ti kasmaa vattabba.m? attano upa.t.thaakehi amhe ga.nhaapentiiti vacanapa.timocanattha.m.

[03]^b^yaaguyaa pa.tisa.mvidite tassaa parivaaro aahariyyatii^eb^ti yaaguyaa pa.tisa.mvidita.m katvaa ``ki.m suddhayaaguyaa dinnaaya puuvabhattaadiinipi etissaa yaaguyaa parivaara.m katvaa dassaamaa''ti eva.m ya.m ki~nci aaharanti, sabba.m pa.tisa.mviditameva hoti. ^b^bhattena pa.tisa.mvidite^eb^tiaadiisupi eseva nayo. asuka.m naama kula.m pa.tisa.mvidita.m katvaa khaadaniiyaadiini gahetvaa gacchatiiti sutvaa a~n~naanipi tena saddhi.m attano deyyadhamma.m aaharanti, va.t.tati. yaaguyaa pa.tisa.mvidita.m katvaa puuva.m vaa bhatta.m vaa aaharanti, etampi va.t.tatiiti kurundiya.m vutta.m.

[03] 575^b^.^eb^ ^b^gilaanassaa^eb^ti ^a^V0.0148^ea^ appa.tisa.mviditepi gilaanassa anaapatti. ^b^pa.tisa.mvidite vaa gilaanassa vaa sesaka^eb^nti ekassatthaaya pa.tisa.mvidita.m katvaa aaha.ta.m, tassa sesaka.m a~n~nassaapi bhu~njitu.m va.t.tati. catunna.m pa~ncanna.m vaa pa.tisa.mvidita.m katvaa bahu.m aaha.ta.m hoti, a~n~nesampi daatu.m icchanti, etampi ^a^M0.0160^ea^ pa.tisa.mviditasesakameva, sabbesampi va.t.tati. atha adhikameva hoti, sannidhi.m mocetvaa .thapita.m dutiyadivasepi va.t.tati. gilaanassa aaha.taavasesepi eseva nayo. ya.m pana appa.tisa.mviditameva katvaa aabhata.m, ta.m bahiaaraama.m pesetvaa pa.tisa.mvidita.m kaaretvaa aaharaapetabba.m, bhikkhuuhi vaa gantvaa antaraamagge gahetabba.m. yampi vihaaramajjhena gacchantaa vaa vanacarakaadayo vaa vanato aaharitvaa denti, purimanayeneva pa.tisa.mvidita.m kaaretabba.m. ^b^tatthajaataka^eb^nti aaraame jaatakameva; muulakhaadaniiyaadi.m a~n~nena kappiya.m katvaa dinna.m paribhu~njato anaapatti. sace pana ta.m gaama.m haritvaa pacitvaa aaharanti, na va.t.tati. pa.tisa.mvidita.m kaaretabba.m. sesamettha uttaanameva.
[03]kathinasamu.t.thaana.m -- kiriyaakiriya.m, nosa~n~naavimokkha.m, acittaka.m, pa.n.nattivajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, ticitta.m, tivedananti.
